title: Among Us
description:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-10 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship. 

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.
descriptionHTML:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-10 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship.

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.
summary: Join your crewmates in a multiplayer game of teamwork and betrayal!
recentChanges:
Added Anonymous Voting option
- All votes appear as grey

Added Task Bar Modes
- Always mode works like normal.
- Meeting mode only updates the bar during meetings.
- Invisible mode removes the task bar entirely.

MIRA: Comms sabotage clears the security logs.

Added symbols to fix wires task.
Added cosmetics to meeting screen.

Various bug fixes.
comments: A very fun game! Great at passing time, however, there are a couple problems. Sometimes I get kicked out for hacking, even though I'm not nearly tech savvy enough to hack, and it often kicks me out of a game for other various reasons, the most frequent being "you are running an old version of the game" or similar. But I can't or don't need to update. It's frustrating but if that gets fixed the game gets a 5 star rating from me!

I think this is amazing!! Really love it!! My problem is when in free play if you the imposter vent in front of a teammate they will act clueless! To me it doesn't make sense. Also, to those who are saying that it always says it's full even though it's not u took it as a lot of people also joined so now there's no more room. Hope this helps!! In conclusion, I think free play should be upgraded a lot. And the full player symbol is just enough people joining. Have a awesome day!! üòÅ

Extremely fun and an overall great experience but i have some issues. When you want to play publiclly you cant. The rooms are always full and you can barely play. Also, if you leave a game too many times you can't join any other game for 5 or 10 minutes. This really annoys me because you can run into some really toxic players, or get in to a game that has setting you hate. I love this game but would really appreaciate if you change or just tweak those a little bit. Overall great game though. üòÅ

It's a very good game and entertaining. But there are a lot of bugs and glitches. For example : if i try to join a public server like with 3 peopls sometimes it says "the server is full." I dont know why and it always happens when I try to join a server like 9-6 peoples and also says the same thing. I understand that people might started the game already but ALWAYS!? It didn't happened when i just installed the game..and also other glitches. Please fix these problems..

The game is good and all. But ever since the last update, I've getting trouble staying in the game after a round is finished. I tried both the beta and public version and the game somehow is still shutting down after a game is finished. Maybe it's compatibility issue with my pixel 3a? Since I don't see anyone talking about this. But overall the game is fun and interesting, if you are into solving mystery and stuff. Random lobbies...meh, you would get frustrated.

title: FGTeeV Goozy
description:
--- CAN YOU SAVE THE FGTEEV FAMILY AND SURVIVE THE HOUSE OF DR. JAX? ---

Explore a house full of weird technology and slimy surprises as you attempt to save the FGTeeV family. Take control of the powerful Multitool to help on your adventure around the mysterious house of Dr. Jax. The Multitool is your ultimate weapon when it comes to solving the many puzzles that exist in house.

Keep your eyes open because something is always lurking around! What is that slimy creature? Where did it come from? Where is Dr. Jax? 

Step into the world of Goozy and prepare for an out of this world adventure! 

--- HIGHLIGHTS ---
‚àô Goozy features the FGTeeV Family as they come to Smart Phones and Tablets like never before!
‚àô Jump out of your seat while playing this scary game of hide and seek.
‚àô Hide to survive! The longer you can stay alive, the better chance you have at discovering all the secrets the house has to offer!
‚àô Use the Multitool and your memory to solve puzzles.

developerAddress: 51321 Avenida Bermudas, Unit 1033, La Quinta, CA 90053
recentChanges:
-Atomic Lock Pick issue with accidental failures fixed
-Various bug fixes and polish
comments: I was exited to play the game but when I try to play it, it sends me back to PlayStore and it just goes black after the OP and it doesn't work properly. I'm not mad at the game the music is really calming to me though. But try to fix it I see a bit of reviews like this but I'll keep trying to play it. Thanks, Fgteev! Edit: Ape Chase work though!

So..I'm your biggest fan and it's awesome! But it's just super glitchy but it's okie...but I kinda want to add in something...You can actually make yourself look like a alien so if it comes near you ,you can dress up as a alien and fool it ,Thank you for listening to this and well..I hope you do add it but bye! I'm gonna go play it >:D

My son and I are huge fans. We have been playing the game and there hasn't been any blue goo on the walls for the blue gun tool at all in any room. There was an update for the game and we updated it and checked the game out again but still no blue goo on the walls. Plz fix this so we can play the game because without that we don't get all flies we need or rooms. Thanks so much.

My son is a huge fan of FGTEEV, half his wardrobe is FGTEEV shirts and he watches their channel every day, and when he found out they had a game out we downloaded it right away. He absolutely loves this game! He also got me playing it too! This game is so much fun and well made. A few glitches but being a new game it's expected. I highly recommend this game especially if your child loves FGTEEV! Support an amazing family!

Super Good. I love this game so much. It can improve much, however. Like finding a map inside of the game, or finding slime shades, or maybe to get more lives a heart plushie which could give you lives? Either way, this game is super cool, and scary! I will be recording this on my channel.

title: Bazooka Boy
description:
Blast through levels and destroy everything before you with a bunch of amazing weapons! Collect all and master their different and unique qualities! Send your enemies flying, explode their bases and crush their buildings! Satisfying destruction and unlimited possibilities to shoot your way to victory! Fun ragdoll enemies and crazy explosions with levels upon levels of awesome content and challenges, go and wipe out all the enemies to win!

Flashy exploding effects and awesome physics make each level a unique action puzzle. 

Can you solve them all without crushing yourself with a bad shot?
descriptionHTML:
Blast through levels and destroy everything before you with a bunch of amazing weapons! Collect all and master their different and unique qualities! Send your enemies flying, explode their bases and crush their buildings! Satisfying destruction and unlimited possibilities to shoot your way to victory! Fun ragdoll enemies and crazy explosions with levels upon levels of awesome content and challenges, go and wipe out all the enemies to win!

Flashy exploding effects and awesome physics make each level a unique action puzzle.

Can you solve them all without crushing yourself with a bad shot?
summary: Blast your way to victory and wipe out the enemies with crazy fun explosions!
recentChanges: Minor bug fixes and improvements
comments: Like the game. It's a fun time waster BUT unless you like watching HOURS of ads do not download. Play a level, watch a 30 second ad. Lose a level, watch a 30 sec ad. Change a weapon, watch an ad. Ads, ads, ads, ads, ads, and did I mention ADS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

The mechanics if the game a pretty decent and it is a nice casual game. The biggest drawback to this game is that the advertisement to gameplay ratio is about 4:1. It takes about 15 seconds to beat a level, then you can watch a 30 second ad to boost your earnings, then watch an ad to gain an additional small boost. After 5 levels, you earn a piece of gear then you watch 1 to 3 advertisements to acquire the item, then you watch an ad every 3rd or 4th level anyways.

Very addicting and fun game. It's fairly glitchy with some types of guns with explosive ammo though, but that can make thing interesting and more fun sometimes. The only reason I didnt give 5 stars is because once you get all the guns there is no use for the money you earn in game. I have over 400 billion dollars and nothing else to upgrade or spend it on.

The game is fun; but I'm now on level 1301 with over 3 billion points. There's nothing left to upgrade; andthe levels are just the same thing over and over. The ads aren't a problem because I just skip them anyway. The game needs an update with newer levels/enemies/map configurations, or something. Overall, a good game. Just needs something else to keep it from being a plateau.

Its fun, the ads are a bit annoying, but that's what airplane mode is for. Also, it has a tendency to glitch pretty often, weapons not working properly, and damage not reacting like it normally does, especially balloons. After a while, it gets boring though. I've literally played it to level 781, and they are just recycled levels, nothing new or slightly different. It IS a fun game, basically Angry Birds with Blood. A great game to pass time. I have over 20 million coins and nothing to buy.

title: Kick the Buddy
description:
Kick buddy arrives on Google Play

Explode, destroy, fire, shoot, smash, freeze, toss, send the power of the Gods and don't even think about stopping. You now have a virtually limitless arsenal to beat: rockets, grenades, automatic rifles, and even a nuclear bomb!

We present to you Kick the Buddy ‚Äî it‚Äôs more than just a relaxing game it‚Äôs more than stress game. It‚Äôs a top interactive action game. Among all stress relief games, Kick Buddy is a relaxing game where you can slap the doll and forget about your anger. It's a fun game to play when bored.

Do you want to beat the boss, or maybe slap and bash the ragdoll?
Want to smash all around you in this destroying game?
Want more kicks?

Even if you're a relatively stress-free person you need to chill out at some point in stress games like ours.
descriptionHTML:
Kick buddy arrives on Google Play

Explode, destroy, fire, shoot, smash, freeze, toss, send the power of the Gods and don't even think about stopping. You now have a virtually limitless arsenal to beat: rockets, grenades, automatic rifles, and even a nuclear bomb!

We present to you Kick the Buddy ‚Äî it‚Äôs more than just a relaxing game it‚Äôs more than stress game. It‚Äôs a top interactive action game. Among all stress relief games, Kick Buddy is a relaxing game where you can slap the doll and forget about your anger. It's a fun game to play when bored.

Even if you're a relatively stress-free person you need to chill out at some point in stress games like ours.
summary: Smash and hit the buddy in our stress-relief game. Unlimited weapon arsenal.
recentChanges:
We are ready to make your game experience even greater! Bugs are fixed and game performance is optimized. Enjoy!

Our team reads all reviews and always tries to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements.
comments: Legit disappointed the moment I started to play this game. This is my first time playing and the amount of ads is just ridiculous. Just by clicking the ribbon an ad pops up. Then I have no choice but to watch an ad after I killed buddy. I know how important ads are for apps, but can't you minimize the amount of ads in this game? This game is actually enjoyable though, the only problem is the ads.

Generally, this game is really fun. Buuuut, there's just too much ads that fill up the game. Like I would kill buddy but then have to watch a 30 second ad. Idk about the graphics. I guess it's ok just like the gameplay. Also, when I'm in the middle of torturing buddy, an ad just pops up and I have to wait half a minute. One more complain is one of the ads when I have to watch the entire thing and it just shows a minigame. When I play the first level, it baits me into playing the next one.

Really an amazing game, incredibly fun even, but all the ads, they just kill the whole thing, I don't think I have ever seen a mobile game with as many ads as this one, please, please calm down with the ads, or atleast make it so you can buy things without needing to be connected to the internet, please, the ads are ruining an amazing game

This game is full of potential, though it has some issues, some big some small. Here they are: 1.too many ads. This is the worst problem with the game by far. Yes, they are personalised, but there are too many of them, ranging around 1 per 20-30 seconds and at the end of killing buddy. 2. Glitches. Sometimes there is a possibility that you cannot load into the game and it stays at a certain amount for a long time if not, permanently. 3.Slow Progression. 4.Gets boring over time(1hr). 5/10

They should rename it to ads. I've never come across a game with so many ads. I've only played it 5 minutes now and seen 8 ads, 5 of which were 30 seconds long no skip. If half my playtime is ads then I do not want to play this game. There's even a pop up ad at the bottom that blocks whatever is on the floor and if you click out of it, a google screen takes its place. I used to love this when I was little but it's unplayable now. Also I think they used bots to inflate ratings, look at reviews.

title: Hide 'N Seek!
description:
The good old classic hide & seek. Play either as a seeker or as a hider and build your shelters from cars or office desks, hide in the water, in the hay pile, in the cornfield, in the boss' office and most importantly, push others in the seeker's vision field. Try to be kind though.

Features:
‚àô Beautiful and unique 3D visuals
‚àô Play either as seeker or hider
‚àô Complete freedom to play however you like
‚àô High performance
‚àô Fun, relaxing and addictive
descriptionHTML:
The good old classic hide & seek. Play either as a seeker or as a hider and build your shelters from cars or office desks, hide in the water, in the hay pile, in the cornfield, in the boss' office and most importantly, push others in the seeker's vision field. Try to be kind though.

Features:

summary: Find or be found. Up to you!
recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements
comments: Its good but the only trouble I had was moving around or maybe it's just because I'm on mobile or something I guess. Oh yeah and also the ads too because at the end of every game it will like force ads, it's kinda annoying but at least the ads don't play as much in game it plays the ads in game for me once or twice a day. And I agree with Kenzie Staten.

Horrible controls, horrible ads, horrible app. This game will ask you if you want to watch an ad to get a useless skin and if you pass it gives an ad anyway. The controls are a Satan spawn and instead of staying in one spot and be reasonably sized, its super tiny. Its not customizable in the settings, and you always end up going the complete opposite direction because it moved the controller for no reason. Don't download. Please for your own sake don't downlaod.

Wow, it's actually really fun! But there is one problem, and it's the ads!! They're are way to many ads. There aren't and glitches, or at least for me. And overall it's a fun game, but again there are way to many ads so that is the reason I'm giving it a 4 star. Please fix it to were there aren't that many ads if u can, So I hope u fix this because I will be giving it a 5 star if the ads lower. If u aren't bothered by lots of ads then this game is deffintly for you! üñ§

I would give this app 5 stars if it didn't make me watch ads every 30 seconds. Would give it 0 stars if I could. If someone saves you, you literally have to watch a 30 second to 1 minute ad every time. I get that the developers need to eat, but this is ridiculous. Plus, like Joaquin said, this game has wack controls. If you like games that bombard people with ads and have uncontrolable controls, this is the game for you.

Really great game! Fun and addictive! I think there should be more skins though. I love playing this game and It is brilliant for when I'm bored! I think that the controls are a little difficult to use, however, and I constantly need to remove my finger from the screen to adjust myself. Please improve the controls. Thanks

title: Call of Duty¬Æ: Mobile
description:
Official CALL OF DUTY¬Æ designed exclusively for mobile phones. Play iconic multiplayer maps and modes anytime, anywhere. 100 player Battle Royale battleground? Fast 5v5 team deathmatch? Sniper vs sniper battle? Activision‚Äôs free-to-play CALL OF DUTY¬Æ: MOBILE has it all.

FREE TO PLAY ON MOBILE

Console quality HD gaming on your phone with customizable controls, voice and text chat, and thrilling 3D graphics and sound. Experience the thrill of the world‚Äôs most beloved shooter game, now on your phone for easy on-the-go fun.

BELOVED GAME MODES AND MAPS

Play iconic multiplayer maps from Call of Duty¬Æ: Black Ops and Call of Duty¬Æ: Modern Warfare¬Æ, available for the first time for free. Or squad up with friends in a brand new 100-person battle royale survival map. Join the fun with millions of players from all around world!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR UNIQUE LOADOUT

As you play CALL OF DUTY¬Æ: MOBILE you will unlock and earn dozens of famous characters, weapons, outfits, scorestreaks and pieces of gear that can be used to customize your loadouts. Bring these loadouts into battle in Battle Royale and thrilling PvP multiplayers modes like Team Deathmatch, Frontline, Free For All, Search and Destroy, Domination, Hardpoint and many more.

COMPETITIVE AND SOCIAL PLAY

Use skill and strategy to battle to the top in competitive Ranked Mode or to win the most Clan prizes as you play with friends. Compete and fight against millions of friends and foes in this thrilling free to play multiplayer shooter.

CHOICE AND COMPLEXITY

Whether in gameplay, events, controls, or loadouts, CALL OF DUTY¬Æ: MOBILE offers complexity and depth in an ever-changing experience.

Have what it takes to compete with the best? Download CALL OF DUTY¬Æ: MOBILE now!

Santa Monica, California, 90405
recentChanges: Play all night long with Call of Duty: Mobile, Season 12: Going Dark. Experience the newest season in night mode. Hackney Yard map makes its COD Mobile debut. Pick a faction to join in the Knights Divided themed event. Battle in night ops with Price ‚Äì Dead of Night and Ghost ‚Äì Jawbone, plus more with the Going Dark battle pass.
comments: It is a very good game I have ever played. It has not only got that u can play with your own friends and talk with them but when u play with others u just make some new friends. I have played the game since it came. Every season there is a improvement. Now the game reached Season 12 but still it has not stopped improving. The game improves everything. It maybe graphics, costumes, guns. A new season u see new things. Please install the game if u are a gaming fan

The game is really,really good it gets constant updates,it has new events almost all the time.But it has two flaws 1. It's a little pay to win. 2.Because of the pay to win, people can look down on u in the chat for being a "noob".Also it has some hackers,the most I saw that hackers do so far is just teleport throughout the map and kill you one shot. Overall,it's a very,very great game that you can play in your spare time,and if you get bored it has different modes,maps and ways to play.üíï

This is it, Activision. It's high time that you finally optimize the game for all mobile devices. The game's whole community is very eager for an update that is devoid of any new gimmicks, and removes the existing bugs, glitches, network issues, frame drops, etc. It's really serious this time. Just a major stability update, and continue the streak for each season. We have no huge expectations for Season 13, so there's no problem if you delay or even cancel it. Thanks.

Best mobile shooter ever, i just wish that they would stop ripping us off. A very expensive app, Crates are expensive if your trying to get what you really want out of it. Gun draws are great, but its like paying $20 for a calling card And spending more money just to get to the character or weapon. Its not really a draw, its rigged to always give you the small rewards first, that sucks.

So after playing this for the first time I was questioning the expectations and almost gave up. But man I'm glad I didn't. This is the #1 best online game that exists. The scope and sniping, soldiers and optics is above a+. The modes and communication with people around the world is amazing. I'm praying for a call of duty mobile black ops. GO COD!

title: Scribble Rider
description: Roll, Swim, Stick and Fly with the ultimate 'All-Terrain' vehicle!
descriptionHTML: Roll, Swim, Stick and Fly with the ultimate 'All-Terrain' vehicle!
summary: Roll, Swim, Stick and Fly with the ultimate 'All-Terrain' vehicle
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: It's a really great concept but here's a couple problems. 1. The games main principle is that the terrain will force you to create different wheel shapes on the fly to beat the race, I have managed to make it to stage 10 with only ever using one wheel. 2. While only using a single wheel design I haven't lost a single race except for 3. In one race (perhaps a glitch) I was by myself on a very short stretch and despite retrying it several times with different wheel designs and failed regardles

Far too easy. I literally make star-shaped wheels on every track and hardly ever have to alter them during the race. You can just win 10 - 15 races in a row without any effort or thought. Then you might come across a level where a section needs straight line wheels...

Like most phone apps this game was created to generate ad revenue. To get around the ads I suggest shutting off your phones wifi and LTE. The game play is as advertised and it is pretty fun. Once you unlock all of the cars, characters and line things the maps start to repeat themselves. Overall it took two days to complete and beat this entire game. It was run but it is not worth the space it takes on my phone and on top of everything I despise apps like this that are created solely for ad rev

Bad game or its just for me that there are many buys , after level 3 the AI player playing with me dosent move it dosent compete and just sits at the beggening of the track the whole game because of no tires. Good game concept but no fun with bugs ...please fix them. And also then the ai player was playing in the first levels he was very slow so there was no one.

1 star for having an ad after "every race" this is a fun game. But nobody wants to be forced to watch that many ads. And to put them in after each "short" race makes it seem as if your trying to force people to pay fir the game. Yet you make money from the ads also.... Double dipping much? Let people play 3 or 4 levels then make them watch an ad. Give them a chance to like the game and want to pay for it.

title: slither.io
description:
Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?

If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!

In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!

Download now and start slithering! Good luck!
descriptionHTML:
Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?

If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!

In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!

Download now and start slithering! Good luck!
summary: Play online with people all over the world! Can YOU become the longest player?
recentChanges:
Added cosmetic support

Improved gameplay speed
comments: I guess its great and also at the same time not that much-? Well it is a quite good game. When I play online everything is so laggy at the point it makes me want to quit the game, even though my wifi is pretty good. I think you should fix it wait no you should really fix it because I'm sure others are having this kind of issue and wants it fixed, thank you.

Awesome game. A tip; learn to cut other snakes off and collect the loot quick, when in a frenzy (huge snakes around you) the game will slow down and there's a reason for it, be patient and spin in a secure small area and all the snakes will kill each other off than collect your loot and be cautious of random snakes randomly spinning out of control. Learn to be patient and you'll grow.

The new update is awful. Ads with half naked cartoons rubbing on each other cheating on their spouse. Forced to watch for at least 30 seconds and it asked my kids to play with the naked cartoons. Super inappropriate for children. Now this game needs a rating. Also It lags all over the place now. Thanks for sucking out all the fun, I had played for 5 years.

Ok, the concept is cool, graphics are good. But, but something's not right. An ad everytime you're being killed. It's not cool! It's soo annoying! Imagine each and every time!!! Even when you play against AI and lost, AN AD POPS! And the game play is not that good, it's just laggin' laggin' and..... laggin' when you try to play online. I can bare with ads but I can't bare with this game with "LAG". The best name for this game should be "Lagger. io". Please improve the game play..

So one of my favourite parts is where you can make your own snake I absolutely love that part another I like that you can pick the joystick the classic or the arrow mode really coolüòé! But the graphics could use a lot work like.....Making the graphics more --- y'know, more 3D, 'cuz I don't really like the look of 2D graphics so much.... Game-play is fine------- but one question: Are We Playing Against REAL Players Or The AI? (AI stands for Artificial Intelligence) plz answer my question.Bye-Bye!

title: PUBG MOBILE METRO ROYALE
description:
The official PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS designed exclusively for mobile. Play free anywhere, anytime. PUBG MOBILE delivers the most intense free-to-play multiplayer action on mobile. Drop in, gear up, and compete. Survive epic 100-player classic battles, payload mode and fast-paced 4v4 team deathmatch and zombie modes. Survival is key and the last one standing wins. When duty calls, fire at will!

FREE ON MOBILE - Powered by the Unreal Engine 4. Play console quality gaming on the go. Delivers jaw-dropping HD graphics and 3D sound. Featuring customizable mobile controls, training modes, and voice chat. Experience the most smooth control and realistic ballistics, weapon behavior on mobile.

MASSIVE BATTLE MAPS - From Erangel to Miramar, Vikendi to Sanhok, compete on these enormous and detailed battlegrounds varying in size, terrain, day/night cycles and dynamic weather ‚Äì from urban city spaces to frozen tundra, to dense jungles, master each battleground's secrets to create your own strategic approach to win. 

DEPTH AND VARIETY ‚Äì From the 100-player classic mode, the exhilarating payload mode to the lightning-fast Arcade and 4v4 Team Deathmatch modes, as well as the intense Zombie modes. There is something for everyone! There is something for everyone. Play Solo, Duo, and in 4-player Squads. Fire your weapon to your heart's content! Be a lone wolf soldier or play with a Clan and answer the duty calls when help is needed! Offers FPS (First-Person Shooter) and TPS (Third-Person Shooter) play, lots of vehicles for all the different terrains in the game and an arsenal of realistic weapons. Find your perfect ride and pieces to cruise towards the final circle! 

ALWAYS GROWING - Daily events & challenges, and monthly updates delivering new gameplay features and modes that keep PUBG MOBILE always growing and expanding. Our powerful and serious anti-cheating mechanisms ensure a fair and balanced gaming environment where everyone plays by the rules.

* Requires a stable internet connection.
* PUBG MOBILE recommended system requirements: Android 5.1.1 or above and at least 2 GB memory. For other devices can try out PUBG MOBILE LITE

recentChanges:
ROYALE PASS S16
1. Metro-Themed Interface & Rewards: Get Artyom or Anna at Lv. 1, the new Night Terror Set awaits at Lv. 100!
2. New Metro Events: Unlock the adventure, get great rewards.
3. Group Up with Friends: Purchase RP to group up with friends, and level up together for extra rewards!

comments: Please read. I have played this game for around 2-3 years also dabbled with the console version. The fact that the devopers could create such an amazing game for mobile is surreal, the graphics are cutting edge, gameplay is uncomparable to anything else, everything is easily explained and it's easy to get to grips with. There are players who gain advantages from paying for the game of course however, if you play well and right you can reap benefits and rewards from how you play, it's very fair.

What is this? It used to be so good. Now its just like pixel gun 3d. A few unnecessary updates in a futile attempt to improve your game. Follow some good examples. Notice the mistake in your irrelevant updates and remove them. I've read reviews and I notice you guys only respond to ones with cheating involved. What are you guys trying to do now? Trust me, with these updates, you guys are far from beating other games. You will never measure up to games who actually care about their veterans.

Was having fun with Metro, spent hours earning to buy armor and weapons. Went into a game with top tier armor, teammate purposely threw grenade at me, knocked me down and teabagged me instead of reviving me. Lost everything. Haven't played since. Also, started getting shot from distances you can hardly see, so you have no idea where you're being shot from, which can be extremely frustrating. Fun concept, and can have a lot of fun without spending any money which is cool.

The game become so sick ü§Æ. There is no security. I do not recommend downloading it or buying from them. no response when you report for some issues. The company does not respect the players and does not listen to them. They supports cheaters on social networking sites. I see here the responses to people's comments as text that they copy and paste to respond. Zero professionalism, and also there is many problems in System as sounds and graphics since last update. Tencent is really a failure. ü§Æ

It's a great game but it's got a long way to go from being as clear and smooth as it is on console or PC but overall it's pretty great especially if you can't play your console. But that being said, your fps settings in graphics need to be worked on for phones not as great as newer iPhones or Androids. Bc my game doesn't have good graphics settings and work on making it were you get into a match were it's more your ranked players instead of people who are 10x your rank. Also good job so far tho

title: Hitmasters
description:
Have you ever dreamt of becoming a spy? Start with simple puzzles and then advance to some challenging levels! Tons of weapons await you in the game arsenal. Try them all!

Make decisions wisely. One mistake and your enemies catch you! Don't leave them a chance. Or... just start over again.

comments: It was great til I fiqured something out... so in one level I shot 2 out of 3 bullets random. I shot the barrel and it gives me an instant game over. The barrel kills the guys and it would have completed that level. So what? If I dont get to use all the bullets? It made me more raged than anything else. I dont want to met the later levels where all bullets will be needed to be used. Screw it.

This is a very fun game. Once you play it you cant stop. You can customize your character and weapons. They also have different modes you can play. They also have a daily spin every day to earn rewards and gain more things. The actual levels itself are very fun and creative. Overall... a very good game.

This game has two types of ads. First one is the ads which gives you rewards and the second type is the ads which are annoying and don't give you anything back. They just appear anywhere even when you're trying to get a reward by watching an ad. I'll give this game 5 stars if there wasn't two types of ads. We players are aware that developers need to add advertisements to gain some financial benefits. But you can do that having only one type of ads. That's more than enough. Anyone can see that.

I understand about all the ads in this game but it's good that if you turn off mobile data the ads remain closed so no need to buy No ads and why I gave this game 5 stars is because I love toxic mode so much and gravity mode to and also this game has good graphics and good targeting and stuff and thanks to Playgendary Limited for making this game.

Bombarded with ads but it's a mobile game. The game is visually pleasing and has a nice design. However there is no difficulty scaling whatsoever. Instead of the game getting harder with each level it just gets more creative in terms of how you're killing the badies. For example, I'm on level 55 and there's only one possible place I can shoot and I only need one bullet, there's a chain reaction and you win the round. This makes the game boring stale and repetitive. Good concept poor execution

title: aquapark.io
description: Reach to the end of the water slide, try to be the first. Bump other players during the race and have fun playing this colorful and sunny water slide game.
descriptionHTML: Reach to the end of the water slide, try to be the first. Bump other players during the race and have fun playing this colorful and sunny water slide game.
summary: Best water slide game
recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: The game is fun and competitive at first, and I really liked it. But with all the lag you can't aim or even see where you're going which is important to this game. And of course who can forget the ad everytime you die or win. I never cared much because I know whatever gets money is worth doing but an ad every five seconds? And even on on the title screen? There is just no need and to me it really lows the quality of the gameplay itself.

okay so, its a really good game from what i have played and heard but i did see someone vomplain that you play against bots. I personally dont see it as an issue, as many games do it and get away with it. And as many have said, you can turn off internet to avoid ads which i think is good for a dev to let you do, as some devs dont. Amazing game, would reccomend to anyone for a fun time killer!

The game tries to make it seem like you're playing against other players, but you're not. If you pay attention to player names you will see the same names over and over again no matter when you play. Plus, it functions exactly the same even in airplane mode! By the way, this is the trick if you want to play without ads. Anyways I got suspicious when all the other players arrive behind me within seconds of me landing somewhere, almost like there was some rubber banding going on...

It is a really great game, though it could have some more levels and also when somebody pushes me out i can't land back because a glitch does not let me finish the game, most of the time it doesn't happen. Please fix this glitch. Who ever is reading this review please download this game because it is really great

I'll give it a 5/5 stars. its a really fun game i've had no problems. No glitches and if your having trouble with ads just turn off your internet or the bars on your divice. It wont give any ads at all. The graphics are nice and nothing has lagged. Overall i would recomend this game to others.

title: Hunter Assassin
description:
Control the assassin and hunt down your targets one by one.  Use your surroundings and shadows to stay hidden from flashlights. 

Targets with automatic machine guns can be lurking around each corner. Attack them swiftly and escape without being spotted. 

Each eliminated target drops valuable gems. Use gems to unlock faster assassins.

Can you unlock the fastest assassin?


Subscription Terms

VIP Membership offers a weekly subscription, you will have a 3-days FREE trial period, after this period you will be charged $7.99. After buying the subscription, you will unlock the following features: Ninja Assassin character, all ads removing, 5000 gems and permanent +100% level gem earning. This is an Auto-renewable subscription. The subscription is renewed unless you turn it off 24 hours before the period ends. Your account will be charged for renewal as well. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. 

For more information, check the links below:

Policy - http://rubygamestudio.com/privacypolicy.html
Subscription Terms - http://rubygamestudio.com/subscription-terms-hunterassassin.html

The prices are set for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency.


To cancel your Subscription Please visit: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481


Contacting Us
If there are any questions regarding these terms, you may contact us using the information below.

comments: Very good game üëç I like everything about this game. BUT there is 1 problem... It's the prize thing. When you win few rounds you can get the prize thing for watching the ad.. but when I press the ad button it doesn't let me. The screen just froze and I have to get out of the game and get in again. It's so annoying. So pls fix these problems.

This game is really good, but the reason Im giving it a 4 star is because IT BOMBARDES YOU WITH ADS! I understand that you need to make money somehow, but even when don't want to watch an ad to continue, IT STILL MAKES ME WATCH AN AD, and it doesn't even make me continue. Please make it so there are less ads, because right now, there are more ads than actual gameplay.

game concept is really good , its sad we live in a time were if you dont pay real money the games are full of ads , i understand the need to make money , but every 5 sec9nds an ad come on it makes you not wantcto play at all, i play 3 levels only and im already thinking uninstall because its annoying . the ads last longer than tbe rounds in the game , absurd , sad, and not worth downloading.

This game is amazing. I only gave it four because it is very easy and gets boring as you pass more levels with no unique and difficult level. It is interesting and lovely... SUGGESTIONS FOR THE DEVELOPERS: -Make a mission with time challenge -Make some AI troops that are alert to their surroundings. -Make troops to notice when we pick a key -Make us miss the game by putting a power bar so that we won't get to play the game unless we buy or unless we wait for 5min or more...

The app started out really good but now when it offers to double the coins or collect my prize the screen freezes up. Ive also topped out it seems as far as difficulty, im on level 98 already and it was pretty quick. Pretty good game to waste time and if you dont mind exiting the game after winning the level to play the next level then its a good game

title: Johnny Trigger - Action Shooting Game
description:
Johnny Trigger ‚Äì International Man of Mayhem!

Stylish, deadly and smooth as a billiard ball, Johnny Trigger is a man on a mission in this non-stop platform shooter game where the action never ends. 

Do you have what it takes to bring down the underground world of the mafia? ‚ÄúLess talk, more bullets‚Äù ‚Äì that‚Äôs Johnny‚Äôs motto as he runs, jumps, spins, slides and keeps on shooting till every bad guy‚Äôs bitten the dust.

üî• Trigger warning ‚Äì Johnny‚Äôs on his way! üî•

‚öà Thousands of levels of murderous mayhem to fight through, each demanding a unique tactical solution and speedy trigger fingers! Johnny never stops moving, so when the bad guys line up in your sights, you‚Äôve got just once chance to get shooting. 

‚öà Be careful not to hit hostages, though. After all you‚Äôre the hero of this game, not some crazed killer! Should you accidentally end the life of an innocent civilian, it‚Äôs back to square one.

‚öà Hit those hard-to-reach scumbags with the power of physics! Trick shots, ricochets, explosions and gravity are all part of Johnny‚Äôs crime-fighting arsenal‚Ä¶

‚öà ...along with guns galore! Cause serious havoc with 57 unique weapons to collect ‚Äì 11 pistols, 12 SMGs, 9 automatic rifles, 10 superguns üî´ and 4 Ultimate guns with fearsome capabilities guaranteed to give the bad guys a nasty shock. For the completist, there‚Äôs also 5 base guns, 3 bundle guns and 3 VIP guns. Basically, a shedload of guns to collect, cherish and slaughter gangsters with.

‚öà On the subject of sheds, collect keys to unlock Johnny‚Äôs 10 awesome base rooms and get hammering to turn them into luxurious hideaways. Turns out our action hero‚Äôs quite the handyman in his free time.

‚öà Sweet graphics and a banging soundtrack ‚Äì Johnny‚Äôs world would be a great place to chill if it weren‚Äôt for all those pesky gangsters lurking round every corner. Just think how nice it‚Äôll be once you‚Äôve massacred every last one of them!

‚öà More than 20 different stylish skins to help Johnny go undercover in the murky underworld of organized crime, and then blast the living hell out of it!

‚öà Boss battles demand all of Johnny‚Äôs wits and sharp shooting as you take down the lords of the underworld in a leaping, spinning storm of bullets.

üí£ Looking for action? Here‚Äôs Johnny! üí£

Dive straight in and get shooting! Johnny Trigger‚Äôs short but immensely satisfying levels make it the perfect action game to fill a short break between meetings, lectures or lessons. And if you‚Äôve got a little more time, there‚Äôs so much to collect and a new challenge round every corner.

 So what are you waiting for? Those bad guys aren‚Äôt going to beat themselves, you know.

The game is very fun. The ads are reasonably spaced out, about one every 2-3 levels. The gameplay is fun, and you are able to pick how you want to play. The different guns don't have that much of an impact on the difficulty, allowing you to pick your favorite gun, regardless of how much damage it says it does, because everyone except the occasional boss goes down in one hit.

Great for those idle moments at the various jobs I've worked. It's a fun twist of a platform runner type of game. The different gun sounds are also quite entertaining. Not to mention hearing "HEADSHOT" the way the game does it is satisfying. Wouldn't recommend if you're looking for something complex, but other than that I enjoy it.

Honestly, I got bored of this after a while so I deleted it, but I hot it back today and it's just how I remember it. It's a pretty fun game. It's simple but fun. Turn in airplane mode if you don't want any ads but you won't get any skins or free guns. Other than that I'm done rating for now. All in all I think this would be a good download for you
It's very cool game for it in my game level 13 it's different because alot of soldiers any ok but Its till ok my problem is the adds are not cool and I can quiet the game when there's an add

title: Stealth Master - Assassin Ninja Game
description:
Are you a good ninja?

Have you only learned about these mysterious martial arts from ancient Japanese legends? Don't you think that's the less interesting way? Don't let your daily routine bore you: download the breakthrough action game Stealth Master! Test your professional assassin skills üî™ and take on the risky challenge of completing bloody missions. 

‚òõ Dive deep into the unique life of the best ninja ever and kill as many bad guys as you can! Countless deadly weapons, plenty of innovative features, and billions of dollars ‚Äì that's just half of the totally secret world that is waiting for you right now! 

To become an outstanding ninja‚Ä¶

Attend the best university for ninjas, write a thesis on how to kill in 5 seconds, and start searching for employers‚Ä¶ No, don't worry, it's just a joke! But who knows, maybe that was true way back in ancient times, like 2010. That's not how things work today, though!  

In the modern world, future ninjas rely on stealth üê±‚Äçüë§ and download the game for killers:

‚óè Bloody missions that gradually get harder: more bad guys and more "targets". Yes, it will take more time and more effort on your end! 
‚óè A wide variety of special features: you can purchase extras like weapons, super abilities, or armor. Buy as much as you can afford ‚Äì no limits!
‚óè Each individual weapon is unique and has its own style. Some weapons are so good that you can kill several bad guys at once with them. 
‚óè Up to all levels within one contract for assassinating the big boss.
‚óè Every contract offers you a totally new and interesting location. 
‚óè Integrated "keys": some doors you have to open by yourself. Guess how!
‚óè Oh! There's one important thing you should know: you can easily be killed. Take care!

Another cool plus is that you can change your good looks and become a different hero, and there are 4 characters available. But remember: first, you were born as a ninja! 

Is it that real?

Even though it's just virtual reality, it will definitely give you goosebumps! 

The tense atmosphere is created with the help of upbeat music, realistic "broken vase" sounds, and game design in the style of "Mama, I'm a criminal". Besides, you'll never know what's waiting for you on the next level‚Ä¶ 

A little advice for future ninjas.

First of all, the big boss is a target that's not so easy to kill üí£. Be patient and make several attempts! Second, collect as much money as you can (actually, this is just good practical advice). Third, enemies in the game can be easily killed with a one shot. Don't waste your precious time on other parts of their bodies! And last but not least: be a good person and only fight the bad guys! 

‚òõ Psssst! Listen to me‚Ä¶ Some of your friends are already on their way to becoming a ninja! What are you waiting for? Download the game and start your bloody mission!

In the modern world, future ninjas rely on stealth üê±‚Äçüë§ and download the game for killers:

‚óè Bloody missions that gradually get harder: more bad guys and more "targets". Yes, it will take more time and more effort on your end!
‚óè A wide variety of special features: you can purchase extras like weapons, super abilities, or armor. Buy as much as you can afford ‚Äì no limits!
‚óè Each individual weapon is unique and has its own style. Some weapons are so good that you can kill several bad guys at once with them.
‚óè Up to all levels within one contract for assassinating the big boss.
‚óè Every contract offers you a totally new and interesting location.
‚óè Integrated "keys": some doors you have to open by yourself. Guess how!
‚óè Oh! There's one important thing you should know: you can easily be killed. Take care!

Another cool plus is that you can change your good looks and become a different hero, and there are 4 characters available. But remember: first, you were born as a ninja!

Is it that real?

Even though it's just virtual reality, it will definitely give you goosebumps!

The tense atmosphere is created with the help of upbeat music, realistic "broken vase" sounds, and game design in the style of "Mama, I'm a criminal". Besides, you'll never know what's waiting for you on the next level‚Ä¶

A little advice for future ninjas.

First of all, the big boss is a target that's not so easy to kill üí£. Be patient and make several attempts! Second, collect as much money as you can (actually, this is just good practical advice). Third, enemies in the game can be easily killed with a one shot. Don't waste your precious time on other parts of their bodies! And last but not least: be a good person and only fight the bad guys!

‚òõ Psssst! Listen to me‚Ä¶ Some of your friends are already on their way to becoming a ninja! What are you waiting for? Download the game and start your bloody mission!
summary: Find and kill your target! Take your katana and become the best killer.

comments: Hii, The app maker! Everything is going well but the reason behind I give 4 stars is, when someone is killing me the vibration is playing on. Even when I install the game and don't know how to play, then someone was killing me, same vibration was playing. And more ads are coming.. If it would be problem free, I would be given the 5 stars.. So, it's not a problem free that's why I give 3 stars.‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Fairly realistic organized crime stronghold invasion situations , and play with a healthy dose of fantasy thrown in. Controls are sometimes hard to maneuver. And there is a superannoying bug in the app where the door key mysteriously vanishes just as the hero is trying to go through the final door leading to the elevator, leaving him stranded, and chasing his tail. This bug has happened several times now--resulting in a necessary Uninstall and reinstall every time. Fix this distrous bug

Fantastic so far!! You should give the main character the eyesight range, like the enemies. Also, please make some of the weapons realistic, for example, the rifle should be long-range because the enemies have it and they could see far

Game isn't bad. Its fun but trying to get a gun or kunai knife is nearly impossible. It takes nearly a half hour or more to get one. The new hostage level sucks majorly. No way to control them. They blindly walk into lasers and die.

very good game you've made but maybe if there were less ads it would be pretty fine but its easy and it isnt hard l can beat harder mode more so pls have a hard mode but its kinda bad in a couple of seconds theres a ads thats in 30 mins and if you liked ads ofc you would downloud it pls make less ads l hate bunch if ads...

comments: The game starts of great, good graphics, good controls, and good action. You go through each country, then it stops no more countries to go. This is when it gets boring, same old missions day after day. When checking for the next country it says watch this space coming soon, it's now been nearly two weeks. I keep checking and watching and doing the missions each day and claiming the tax. But thats it if things don't change then I'm sorry but I will have to delete the game.

I love this game, the only thing I don't like is the many ads it haves, and how you have to pay real money to break the piggy bank, and I'm on level three, and the ads have increased, the ads are to long, come on, 31 seconds ads? If you put shorter ads, and don't have to pay real money to break piggy bank, I'll give you five stars. Now all of a sudden, the game is cutting of when I start playing, please solve that problem ASAP

Can't progress any further beyond Japan. The game kept prompting no Internet connection when there is Internet connection. I tried downloading my old data, uninstalling and reinstalling it, and the problem only worsen. Now even some of the bows can't load. And I even tried deleting my old game file on 'Play Games' and starting again, and it still resulted in the same thing. It ruin the entire experience for me.

This is one of the best mobile games that I have ever played. The concept is amazing. The graphics are slightly off, like when you shoot someone and where the blood goes. I cannot wait until the France update comes out. Please do that soon. Great timekiller, actually has a really good level of difficulty. All in all, I love it.

Plays like all the other sniping games with upgrades, energy, guys with florescent colored suitecases or headphones. Swap the rifle with a bow or pistol for a double crossbow and you've got this game. Honestly, this game looks amazing. The modeling is top notch. Your ninja dude looks rad. I wished there were more variety of ninja activities to choose from beyond shooting people.. throwing stars? A swordfight? How about infiltrating an enemy organization undercover as a sleeping cell?

comments: This WAS like the best sniper game I've ever played, but it seems you guys have dropped the ball!! It keeps telling me I need to update it, I just updated it, and it still keeps saying I need to update it, not only that, you still haven't added the other levels, it's been saying more coming soon for over a year, what's the deal, are you just done with it???

Laughing so hard that it took over 13 million fake reviews to get a 4.4 star rating...Soooooo many ads and slow progress....biggest waste of a download. Free to play, at a snail crawl of a speed. Can't even get past first teir with constant headshots without having to pay for something or watching ads...the makers probably made so much money off me having the game for a total of about 30 min

Great game during playtime which is very limited. Lots of opportunities require time including energy refill and upgrades of equipments. It keeps trying to push sell premium subscription which I know is not worth the money judging from the other comments here. It gave me an idea though to explore the other sniper games in the market.

Typical MONEY grab game. You can get through things, but it takes time and a LLOT of grinding. Watch a ton of ads, for meager special loot to buy/rush items to your inventory or accumulate special weapons. You are hit constantly with try this weapon out, offer you a discount and wouldn't you know, never enough in your loot to purchase outright but can be yours if willing to shell out $$$. Sick of these type of games

I like this game a lot. You can play the campaign (city to city) without paying $, just have to wait for lives to fill up. The real fun comes in PVP and World OPS though. To play PVP does require you to have diamonds (one of the 2 main forms of currency for online play) if you want to be any good and seriously compete with others around the world. Mainly to respawn and buy lives/energy to continue playing, which costs money. They have daily deals. But it's still basically a "pay to play" game.

‚óâ PASS THROUGH THE OBSTACLES!

How far can you go in this challenging city operation! Dodge wrecking balls, trash containers, and lots of variations of sand piles and be sure to cross the finish line with as many people as possible.

‚óâ LOAD YOUR GUNS FOR FINAL CLASH!

Get your gang moving and shooting their way out until you reach the gate at the end of the level. Shoot down the robbers in the ultimate battle and don't let them escape with helicopter!

comments: Way too many ads. Interstitial ads, banner ads, you have to wait to get rewards each stage until you look at the ad bonus option, this game is kinda fun but I can't enjoy it because it seems like it's just a vehicle for advertising. It's so in the way that there is no way the developers didn't notice how overbearing and intrusive they are. This is shameless. It overrides any other redeeming qualities of the game, it is, so bad.

The game is good not great but the real problem is ads. You get double for watching but even if you pick not to watch the ad it still gives you a ad to watch. I understand that for a free game you need to get payed for your inspiration and time but that's way too many ads. Tired of games with more ads then game play.

Too many ads. Very laggy and in need of major change to the graphics and smooth game play. Why they would add skins before making the game playable past level 4 is beyond me. Good concept though, if they made the ads less annoying and had significantly more quality of life updates it would be good. I will keep the game for a few months, if I see no visible game play improvements I will delete and find a new game.

So many ads. Look, I get the need for ad revenue in a F2P game, but come on. I played 3 levels, and I got hit with a 30 second unskippable ad, a 20 second unskippable ad, and another 30 second unskippable ad. I spent more time watching ads than playing the game. I didn't even select to get extra coins from watching ads. They played regardless of what I chose. The game has an ok premise, but all the ads makes it sure that I'll never download a game from this developer again.

Could be a good game but adverts at every turn. X3 reward? Watch an ad. No probs. Don't want the X3 reward? We'll play you an ad! I'm all up for watching ads to keep the games free, but there is a limit when the ads make the game unplayable. This is yet another game that tops that limit!!

comments: Very fun game. This is probably the funnest mobile game I've ever played. This game is VERY addicting, and VERY fun. If you haven't downloaded this, download it right now. I think it would improve the game if there was a mode where like 4 or more stickman fought it off. I would love it if you could please put a mode like that into the game. The only conplaint I have is that I dont like how the fights now end when ever you touch the water/lava. I think it was WAY better before that got added.

This game is amazing! It's a good game with little ads, it has a huge variety of weapons and maps to choose from, and a lot of contet! To make this game even better maybe you can add more hats, weapons, maps, and maybe even online multiplayer! I give this game an 11/10! Here's some weapons you could add: Baseball bat, Box, Knife, Mech suit, Spike gloves, Chair, Yoyo, and a banana. Overall you should definitely download this game if you haven't already!

it's a fun game but I love everything but I wish there was more weapons like ice guns and stuff another thing is that I would like a online mode and friends. So recently I haven't seen any bugs or glitches so far and the ads you can get rid of them. I have been playing for 2 years now. This review was 1 hole year ago It's Now 2020. Good game. Create more games you only have 2. Hey Mr. Develeper can you actually listen to me because We need an update with more weapons and career. More players.

Great fun, hilarious physics. I love that there is such a wide varity of weapons, skins, and maps to choose from. I wish it was less easy to die from map hazards because sometimes a game will end in a few seconds because me or the cpu will die. It would also be nice if there was a wave system in the survival mode instead of just a continuos stream of enemies.

This is amazing. I played on a friends iPad and I loved it. The simple to understand but hardish to control battle style is a blast and evens the some op weapons out. I've mained cards as it is just so much fun, want to keep enimies back? Sticky card. Want to deal damage? Explosion card. About to fall off the edge? Place swap card. Anywho this game is just amazing and good gameplay. 5/5. Simply amazing.

comments: Addictive, amazing selection and variety of guns to collect in different colours. It would be better If you had your own profile on the game, and shows how many headshots you've got, how many guns you own, what level you are. Collecting coins is brilliant, always a chance to have coins, and the pendents are amazing too, being able to pick which one is on your gun. Some things would make it better. Like almost after every time you play a level or upgrade anything and even just to get an upgrade your gun or you wont get it! Awesome Game. But i'm only giving 3 star's due to the fact that each little guy requires 10 shot's to the head to kill them. That's a bit extemejand turns me off from playing.

title: Garena Free Fire: BOOYAH Day
description:
Free Fire is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 49 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in wild, or become invisible by proning under grass or rifts. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive and answer the call of duty.

[Survival shooter in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for legendary airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]

descriptionHTML:
Free Fire is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 49 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in wild, or become invisible by proning under grass or rifts. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive and answer the call of duty.

[Survival shooter in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for legendary airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Fast and Lite gameplay - Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will you go beyond the call of duty and be the one under the shining lite?

comments: Game was fun and entertaining for a while but then it started to slow down as i had unlocked all the content or close to it. One day i try to open the game and it doesn't open, hasnt opened for weeks. Now when it finally reopens after several reinstallations, all my data is gone. Bs especially since i spent the money to have no ads for a more streamlined experience. Don't waste your time with this trash. So glitchy.

Terrible extremely ad heavy. I was trying to actually play it as it seemed fun, but as I was playing not once not twice but THREE times I get an ad in the middle of the game AS MY ARROW IS STILL FLYING to the enemy. Then after the round ended, another ad. Instant delete.

Seems fun. What I've played of it anyway. Anytime I go to claim my prize it just freezes and won't let me. I restart the game, redo level two, same thing all 5 times. I would love to play more of it though.

Good game, it bugs out after level 200 and after completion of a level it gets stuck on loading screen. Also had bought no ads and they have come back with this bug. Don't want to reinstall in case all progress is lost

The number of ads and trigger for ads is ridiculous. This game loads ads if you don't give it an input for 20 seconds, between stages, and even when you tell it to skip ads because you aren't interested in 100 extra coins. What's also bad? The game constantly crashes during it's loading screen. You can't go thirty seconds without an ad or a crash.

title: Talking Tom Hero Dash - Run Game
description:
One of the most fun endless runner games! Players join Talking Tom and his heroic friends on a mission to run, get gold and rebuild the world! Playing this new action game will make anyone a true superhero!

‚òÖ ANYONE CAN BE A SUPERHERO: Talking Tom, Talking Angela and their super friends all have amazing unique superpowers that they can use while running! Players can also try using their high-tech superhero gadgets!

‚òÖ DEFEATING RACCOON GANGS: Besides collecting gold coins and avoiding obstacles, hitting raccoons will earn players some extra rewards!

‚òÖ RACCOON BOSS FIGHTS: Players can unlock Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger by saving them in action-packed Raccoon Boss fights!

‚òÖ RUNNING THROUGH AWESOME WORLDS: Players will fight the raccoons among skyscrapers, alongside tropical surf beaches, through Chinese-inspired villages, and in mysterious desert temples.

‚òÖ EXCITING STUNTS: In this fun game, each running world is a unique adventure. Players can dash and leap between rooftops, swing on cranes, and run along cruise ships, but they need to watch out for swimming pools!

‚òÖ RESCUING AND REBUILDING: Raccoons are destroying and polluting the world and it‚Äôs up to players to drive them away so that you can clean up and rebuild. Once each location is fixed up, it‚Äôs time to face the Raccoon Boss. After players defeat him, it‚Äôs on to the next running world! What‚Äôs it going to be? A surf beach? Or maybe a temple?

‚òÖ UNLOCKING SUPERHERO OUTFITS: Players can unlock heroic runner outfits piece by piece and customize each superhero. Dashing!

‚òÖ SPECIAL EVENTS: Explore new ways of playing, and complete missions to earn awesome rewards.

Players who love Talking Tom Gold Run and other running or superhero games are going to want Talking Tom Hero Dash in their collection too!

PLAY FOR FREE!

This app contains:

title: Tomb of the Mask
description:
Tomb of the Mask is an arcade game with an infinite procedurally generated vertical labyrinth. Seeking for adventure you get into a tomb where you find a strange mask. You put it on and suddenly realize that you can now climb walls - easily and promptly. And that's when all the fun begins. 

You'll face a variety of traps, enemies, game mechanics and power-ups. And as far as time doesn't wait, get a grip and up you go.

comments: This game is addictive! Since I have only five lives I can't get bored of it, and I love the new challenges they continue to add to the game as I get further and further, there are however flaws as well, there aren't many things to buy with your money, so now I have tons of money but nothing to buy with it except powerups which I rarely use. Another flaw is the ads, they are SO FREQUENT! I think the game could use more customization options for your trail and character color, good game though!

I genuinely love this game. A lot of the reviews are dropping stars because of the adds, but personally I feel as if that's not fair. The gameplay is so addictive and fun, and while it is true that there are no more features added after level 100 or so, it still somehow manages to be entertaining. As someone who finds repetition boring, this game is a miracle. I just reached level 200 and there are no more levels after that. Even still I still truly enjoyed this game.

I love this game! I think its addictive, eye catching, interesting, and over all a great game! But, I deleted a while ago (because I finished it) and when I saw that it had been updated I downloaded it. Sadly, I found out I lost ALL my stuff, this really made me upset. I dont know if I had to save something or the game just doesn't let you save but please tell me there is a way to get my stuff back! Like I said good game just really disappointed.

I enjoyed the beginning of it. but like any other puzzle games, it sadly ends. 350 levels, that's all it takes to finish this game, and you will not like it since somewhere level 200, there are no more new things to introduce. In the end, I love it. It's just sad because I'm pretty sure you can add more gimmicks, like door switches, boss battles... well, the game doesn't have a plot in the first place,. so there's that. I enjoyed the journey, kinda.

Ads, ads, ads. Ya don't want 'em? Too bad. If i'm reviewing the concept? This is a fantastic game, somewhat a mix of escape games and pinball. The little sprite is cute, and the graphics are simplistic, but very well-made. If I'm reviewing the gameplay? (For summary, see title.) This is an awful game. Lurking behind these "honest" ads is a whole mess.

RUNNING ACTION: Players can have epic fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chasing after the robber who stole the gold and unlocking new worlds is an incredible adventure! Who has what it takes to run through all the worlds and win? With enough running and racing, anyone can become the best runner there is. It‚Äôs time to go for gold! Players can also complete missions to get cool rewards!

ROBBER RUN AND CHASE: The sneaky raccoon thief stole the gold! Players can get the gold bars back and use them to build and upgrade amazing homes for Talking Tom and Friends! The finished homes will then unlock new worlds they can explore and go racing through! Let‚Äôs run for fun!

RACCOON BOSS: The big bad raccoon boss will try to stop players at any cost! They have to run and dodge obstacles and take down the robber‚Äôs truck in an awesome boss fight. Kicking chili bombs at him will make him give up eventually!

THE BEST ENDLESS RUNNING FUN IS IN TALKING TOM GOLD RUN!

comments: So cool game I love it, We get to unlock new characters and levels. But my problem is that when I go to the water land while I'm running then with the character "Neon Angela" then I can see her underwear which I don't like at all!! But it is a amazing game, so keep up the good work!! You should install it, it's a amazing game!!

It's a very pleasurable game anybody can try it ... Though it is similar to subway surfers but it is a bit tougher and the best thing is that there is not an issue of lives and there are more options of watching add and resuming the game , in most of the games you won't find this feature available for most of the time but here u can play it without any worrries regarding that...! Which is cool

Well i have mixed feelings, even though the map is constantly changing after a while its gets boring , also i dont understand why the helmet should have a timer why not an item that used when i hit something not for only a short amount of time. The magnet and other stuff i understand but i have these 2 issues with the game currently in rest its somehow good. The last thing which isnt my concern since i can beat the water challenge but this game is focusing on young audience, and for them irritat

"Talking Tom Gold Run" is getting better, the graphics, game experience and everything is so good and perfect. I really love it and reccomend it for all ages, there's few things that need to improve but other than that it is perfect and fun.

This is an amazing app! I love how its wifi free too! Idon't have any problems with it, though, sometimes the app IS a bit glitchy, but that has only happened a few times. At the moment, i am on the second tom up! I DO have a few things you could add to this game such as double jump and add more themes like underwater. I like the under ground bits where you turn up in a whole new world like the skateboard one, in the air, the sewers and ESPECIALLY UNDER WATER!

title: Fruit Ninja 2 - Fun Action Games
description:
After 10 years, Fruit Ninja is back, jam packed with more fruit slicing than you can poke a blade at!  Whether your reflexes are sharp, wisdom is deep, or you just really hate organic food, Fruit Ninja 2 promises to give you fun, engaging games in action packed slices of time. So what are you waiting for? Draw your blade and prepare to slice!

FEATURES:
- Go solo with original modes like Arcade, Zen or Classic or change it up with Minigame Shuffle and the rhythm slicing mode, Fruitar Hero
- Want to share the fun with your friends?  Jump into real-time multiplayer modes with players from all across the world to slice your way to be a Fruit Ninja Champion!
- Maximise your combos, blitz and critical points by mixing and matching all new blades and powerups
- Express your inner ninja with new characters, character skins and taunt packs
- Relax and take in the beauty of the different locations, each arena with their own visuals and soundtrack

Privacy policy: http://halfbrick.com/pp
Terms of service: http://halfbrick.com/tos

developerAddress: 23 Musgrave Road, Red Hill, Queensland 4059, Australia
recentChanges: - Bug fixes
comments: Amazing Even if the game lags and the pre registering rewards wasnt given to me the game is better than the old one ... cuz they ruined the old one ... the old one was good before the 10th year update and its unplayable and ruined the satisfying experience of slicing the 2d fruit.. now its 3d and unsatisfactory but this game is all we got now ... bummer

Fairly fun, but so many things are still broken. Especially your servers, if it "can't connect" it's an automatic loss of items, even upon victory. If you want every item to be verified, then buy more server space. Otherwise, make it verify less often and give players the benefit of the doubt rather than punish players because your servers don't work. Oh, and I paid for an item on the assumption that it removes ads. I still get the occasional 5 second interstitial ad, which is unacceptable.

It's a fun game, but the Minigame Shuffle has a lot of problems. It's crashing a lot, and I'm losing progress and tickets. Also it's not clear what I get with the Season Pass, and if it's a monthly payment or a one time only. And sometimes the blade just don't cut, specially against other users.

Fun game. Classic and Arcade mode is buggy. When I hit a bomb or when the attempt is finished and I get game over, the game does not load the exp earned screen and stays in the Classic/Arcade mode screen. I have to quit the session to exit Classic/Arcade mode, but I don't get the points I earned for that run. Fix this ASAP. This is unacceptable.

The ranked or any multiplayer modes are all littered with bots that uses power ups so frequently even though the game claimed they have the same level of power up as me. Making bots hard so they feel like humans are the biggest mistake or flaw I could found in this game, second is the currency. You get them but it's in the slowest pace I've ever seen in any mobile game I encountered.

title: Brawl Stars
description:
Fast-paced 3v3 multiplayer and battle royale made for mobile! Play with friends or solo across a variety of game modes in under three minutes.

Unlock and upgrade dozens of Brawlers with powerful Super abilities, Star Powers and Gadgets! Collect unique skins to stand out and show off. Battle in a variety of mysterious locations within the Brawliverse!

BATTLE IN MULTIPLE GAME MODES
- Gem Grab (3v3): Team up and out-strategize the opposing team. Collect and hold 10 gems to win, but get fragged and lose your gems.
- Showdown (Solo/Duo): A battle royale style fight for survival. Collect power ups for your Brawler. Grab a friend or play solo - be the last Brawler standing in the rowdiest battle royale yet. Winner take all!
- Brawl Ball (3v3): It's a whole new Brawl game! Show off your soccer/football skills and score two goals before the other team. There are no red cards here.
- Bounty (3v3): Take out opponents to earn stars, but don‚Äôt let them pick you off. The squad with the most stars wins the match!
- Heist (3v3): Protect your team‚Äôs safe and try to crack open your opponents‚Äô. Navigate the map to sneak, blast and blow your way clear to the enemies treasure.
- Special Events: Limited time special PvE and PvP game modes.
- Championship Challenge: Join Brawl Stars' esports scene with in-game qualifiers!

UNLOCK AND UPGRADE BRAWLERS
Collect and upgrade a variety of Brawlers with powerful Super abilities, Star Powers and Gadgets! Level them up and collect unique skins.

BRAWL PASS
Complete quests, open Brawl Boxes, earn Gems, pins and an exclusive Brawl Pass skin! Fresh content every season.

BECOME THE STAR PLAYER
Climb the local and regional leaderboards to prove you‚Äôre the greatest Brawler of them all!

CONSTANTLY EVOLVING
Look out for new Brawlers, skins, maps, special events and games modes in the future.

PLEASE NOTE! Brawl Stars is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 9 years of age to play or download Brawl Stars.

Features:
- Team up for real-time 3v3 battles against players from across the world
- A fast-paced multiplayer battle royale mode made for mobile
- Unlock and collect new, powerful Brawlers - each with a signature attack and Super ability
- New events and game modes daily
- Battle solo or with friends
- Climb to the top of the leaderboards in global and local rankings 
- Join or start your own Club with fellow players to share tips and battle together
- Customize Brawlers with unlockable skins
- Player-designed maps offer challenging new terrain to master

From the makers of Clash of Clans, Clash Royale and Boom Beach!

Support:
Contact us in-game via Settings > Help and Support ‚Äî or visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/brawl-stars/

Privacy Policy: 
http://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
http://supercell.com/en/terms-of-service/

Parent‚Äôs Guide:
http://supercell.com/en/parents/
