comments: I love this game very much( even if I don't get brawlers often). It has many interesting modes which never gets old and is always fun. The one major thing I don't like in this game is that the value for some things in shop is too much like 150 gems etc. There are so many people who don't want to use money to get gems in the game. My request to supercell is to reduce the value of skins, pin packs etc a little bit so that everyone can have it. Thank you supercell, keep making brawl stars better :)

This is by far one of the best games I have ever played. The controls are smooth and there is fresh new content almost every month. Also I like the fact that Supercell listens to their community. I would rate it a lot more if I could. Another fact is that in Brawl Stars, special passes in the game which can be bought without spending any actual money. This is completely different from other Supercell games like Clash Royale. Overall I would highly recommend this game to u. üëçüèª Happy Brawling

One of the only games that could keep me playing for years on end. The only negative is the match making. Many times you'll be matched against clearly more experienced teams and you'll have teammates that are new but have similar character rankings. Sometimes there's nothing similar at all and one team will be substantially outmatched. Fun otherwise.

The lag is real bad, and I've noticed that its kind of a pay to win game. You have to pay to buy the gems for the brawl pass which gives you the good stuff unless you wanna work your but off to get 180 gems also, I think they should stop taking trophies away when they lose because when I started I found it hard to start because so many trophies were being taken away. When I started liking one brawler a lot but I couldn't because I lost to many trophies.

THIS GAME IS SOOOO COOL!! I got it a few years or months ago I guess and at first, the game wasn't as popular and the gameplay was hard for me so I left. I can back on it by curiousity and I completely fell in love whit the style ! The characters are adorable and the way the attacks are put is unique ! Continue like this, this game is so fun (:

title: Johnny Trigger - Sniper Game
description:
The next generation of sniper games.

Traditionally such popular games force us to run after the target and hide around the corner to stay safe. As the result, you usually get stressed and nervous because of constant risk to the life of your hero. However, not this time because sniper games have been modified and advanced.

For sure bad guys still could shoot you, but not as easy as it used to be in the early days. Now you a highly experienced assassin who knows the most suitable location for an excellent shot. What is it? You are going to stay onto the roof of nearby building and watch the next target to kill. 

Look, the target is right behind that old tree! Be quite and focused, nothing should distract you from the mission. 

Great! Now you are a professional shooter, our warmest congratulations! 

Three tips to become the best assassin ever.

1) Pay attention to the number of bullets you have! On the average four bullets are available for you during one level. Not that bad, yep? However, keep in mind that sometimes you are required to kill up to four targets üéØ. The last, fourth target, is the boss and he cannot be killed by one single bullet. An insight for you ‚Äì the 3d shot is likely to end with this guy. 

2) The single shot is the only way to fulfill the mission successfully. It seems to be a bit complicated to aim from the roof and that is why the game provides you with gun sight. 

3) Hurry up! Bad guys are also not that stupid and they are not waiting for your shot‚Ä¶It means your target are alive and can run fast, hide in the building and even take a car and drive away. Oh! One more thing is necessary to know ‚Äì these guys do have guns too and even can kill you. Do not be a slowpoke! 

The breakthrough in sniper games is proud of few distinctive features.üí£

‚öà Variety of locations: from bakery to gas station. The new locations appears at the next level, which consists of fifteen sublevels.

 ‚öà Wide range of guns you can buy with earned money. Your budget is increasing after every successful mission. You see, there is still plenty of scope for improvement in your power.

‚öà There are innocent people who are under the risk of being killed. Do not be confused!

‚öà The real evil or the main target is a person with small suitcase. He will always try to escape, but do not let him do it! Otherwise, you will fail the mission and need to restart again. 

‚öà As an incredible shooter, you will get golden keys in order to exchange them for extra money or details of the super gun. 

üî• Now it is time for you to choose: whether to stick to the ancient sniper games or download ¬´JT Sniper¬ª and experience something extremely different from all stuff you know before!  One, two, three‚Ä¶shoot!

developerAddress: 220088, Republic of Belarus, Minsk, Antonovskaya 14b, office 300
recentChanges:
Johnny rolls up with the thrilling arsenal upgrade:
- NEW EPIC GUNS! Addition of 5 impressive guns for adequately impressive encounters! Behold the ULTIMATE FIREPOWER!
- EPIC SKINS! If you are looking for the best looks for your firearms, epic skins are the one truly Johnny way to go!
comments: Great string of advertisements peppered with a game here and there. I only gave it two stars because every now and then while watching the adds, I've got to click on the screen a couple times to make the bad guys go away. Seriously though, I understand adds. I really do. But ten minutes of gaming and I get about 3 minutes play time and 7 minutes of watching the SAME annoying advertisements. Honestly, I'll never install these because I know they're going to be just as full of advertising.

A funny little game but the ads make this game absolutely unplayable. You get 1 or 2 levels before being forced to watch another 30 second ad which is ironic as it means you'll watch more ads then have actual game time. To top it off, ads run in a pip while you are playing. Devs need to understand that while revenue is important, there is a point where it becomes counterproductive and people like me will simply delete the game and find one that isn't so ridiculous.

This game was a good time killer. Fun enough to pay to remove ads. But I can't access the game anymore because a new pop-up has appeared requiring you to consent to giving up your personal data for advertising to be able to access the game. I shouldn't have to consent to this to be able to play, especially after I've paid to have ads removed. I'm going to need my money back or this pop-up removed.

The game itself is pretty cool but it seems to have a flaw. The crosshairs on the scope seems to escape your control as you move it around looking for your mark, I don't know about Dev. But it seems to me also that this can be fixed. If you can fix that I have no problem giving you 5 stars.

This is not a sniper game, it is an ad watching game...seriously. A level takes a few seconds and then an ad. They even stick ads inside the levels. Under all those ads is a lightly fun game that could be great, but the purpose here is to absolutely annoy you with ads to remove them for $2.99 before you realize how weak the actual game is. Just avoid.

comments: Not what I expected. I thought I'd be able to play against players. But the game is making me play a lot of games against AI which is dumb. Levels are all same and dumb. I have Hitmasters, which is made by same people I think. That game has its issues too, but it's more fun. What I want to play is a game with this kind of mechanic against players. With same kind of levels as in Hitmasters. Obstacles, strategy, thinking about what you gonna do next. And option to pay for skins of course.

Everything about this game is great. But the only reason it's getting 4 stars is because of a weird reoccurring glitch. Sometimes when I watch and add to unlock a chest, the screen starts flashing white when the add is over. This doesn't effect me but could effect others that might suffer from epilepsy. That's my only problem. If this would be fixed I'd give it 5 stars.

Pretty decent game for the most part... Kind of like artillery but way more entertaining. The characters are all parodies of popular characters from literature, History and comic books.(RobinHood, a Russian Cosmonaut and Loki) The Shovel Demon is my favorite which Kinda pisses me of because; Most of the characters are locked either by coins, gems or real cash. aparently you can win certain characters in a roulette game but i'm pretty sure it's rigged.

in my opinion, this game gets 4 stars. Dont get me wrong this game is REALLY fun and addictive but the amount of bugs and glitches is crazy like (when the bot shoots a impossible shot) and, the member thing is very expensive in my opinion. but the worst thing about this game is the VIP I used one of the ppl u get with it. Once and it didn't work I got a head shot it didn't work and I was disappointed bc I payed yea plz fix it :D

I have 3 problems. The first problem is the game keeps getting stuck everytime I play it and the second problem is everytime I enter the game it goes back to apps. The final problem is while I'm playing in z days it gets stuck n says the game isn't responding. I'm also pretty sure your game almost gave my phone a virus. It's an awesome game but I wouldn't recommend this game to a friend unless you want your phone to get a virus. Please fix these bugs or i will delete this game.

title: Dude Theft Wars: Open World Sandbox Simulator BETA
description:
Welcome to Dude-o-polis!
A beautiful city where all the awesome and perfect dudes live!


Jack used to live a normal dude life when one day he found out that life can be so much more fun in Dude-o-polis. You can drive around the town in any car you want and drift your way while you freeroam around the towns, parks and fields and a 3D City full of bliss, buy any weapon you like with cash and become a Gangstar, tease, annoy or SLAP other dudes,
 Troll People with grenades and watch them "RUN",  explore beautiful buildings or just spend your day slacking on your smartphone!

ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN:
Dude Theft Wars is an open world sandbox game and a life simulator as well as a perfect Dude Simulator. The main objective is to enjoy the beautiful city and things it offers on a pleasant sunny day. You can do what you like to do. Explore the City in a shopping cart or shoot at garbage on a sunny day, say hello to your neighbor, enter any building and steal their cash or join a mafia gang and go on a heist stealing around cash &  money and spend it to buy weapons or sports cars with cash or go crazy and shoot some dude with crazy weapons and start a battle royale to form a gangster squad mafia and become the best mafia gangstar ! comments: A very good game, but the thing thats keeping this game to its best is frustrating discoveries, only 2 minigames, and only 1 missions. The first one let me explain on an example; i go to the restricted area where they say there are aliens and all i saw was a spacecraft, a tank and a few vehicles, and a 5-star criminal promotion. The same with the zombie lab, and no tons of missions to be super rich, and few interactive things. Make cutscenes too, that is entertaining. Have some insight inshort.

The game is great it is just that their is a glitch for me. So on the level where you have to make 3000 pounds for Kiril it dosent work for me it doesnt give me the objective it just keeps saying talk to Kiril as my objective and the first time when i did have the objective it kicked me out of game and didnt save all the money i had. Pls fix this. Other than those issues i think you should make it so you can upgrade your house, maybe make it multiplayer,make your character and race modew/ people

It is enjoyable. But very glitchy. Have to improve the idea of being able to see your enemies on the map. And stop being shot continuously even when the enemies are halfway across the map. Also. The hey gang. Is just about impossible to beat. Plus after 30mins of playing it kicks you off.

I do love this game its absolutely amazing, but I must ask if you could add different movie variations of "Dudes" for instance Predator or Ghost Rider and give them some sort of special ability, now I know that's technically not what the game itself is, and with all the work your putting into it now already makes it a super fun and addicting game, I just thought of that idea dn decided to ask you guys about it but thank you for making a Great game üòÅ

AMAZING!!!! ü§ó I love everything about this App, But maybe could you make it where you can Eat or Drink, And where you can use things, and where you can edit your Clothes and stuff like that, where there are games and other apps on the phone in the games like, Texts, Calls, Stuff like that to make it more Fun üòò

The NERF battle is ON!
Can you Tag everyone without being Caught?
Grab your Nerf Blaster and Prank 'em all!

BECOME THE BEST PRANKSTER!
Tag everyone in sight, don't get caught and, above all, have fun!

UNLOCK ALL THE NERF BLASTERS!
Collect Nerf Blasters to become the ultimate prankster! Unlock them all as you progress in the game.

PERSONALIZE YOUR CHARACTER
Unlock all the fun Characters and Skins. Play as a Ninja, a Clown or even a Robot!

comments: The game has a nice concept. So lets start with 5 stars. Every problem is 1 star deducted. First, i always get unwanted ads after a level, but can never get something for free with an ad. 1 star deducted. Two, there is no challenge. On complete multiple levels on my first day, and died once PURPOSEFULLY to see what would happen. Another star. Please fix these and maybe you'll keep 5 stars.

It's a great game till i reached level 161. Then it just freezes and hangs when I'm about to win the round. I'm just stuck at this level because of this. Even if i want to subscribe to this game, i won't dare to now..
Whenever I try to watch an ad for extra coins or a gun it doesn't work, but when I hit no thanks the next add loads and plays with no problem
It was a great game until I got to level 89. It freezes when I'm close to beating the last player. I've tried restarting my game and my phone, neither worked, it still froze.
The ads never load so you can never get free upgrades and game gets old being stuck with a slow gun. And I have samsung 10 should play circles around this game

title: Super Mario Run
description:
A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.

You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!

Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.

‚ñ†World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser‚Äôs clutches! 
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

After rescuing Princess Peach, a nine-course special world, World Star, will appear.

‚ñ†Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

‚ñ†Toad Rally
Show off Mario‚Äôs stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow. 

‚ñ†Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

‚ñ†What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

„Éª All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

„Éª Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

„Éª More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

„Éª More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

„Éª More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

„Éª Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply. May contain advertisements.

summary: Control Mario with just a tap!
recentChanges: Implemented bug fixes.
comments: At first glance this may seem like a disappointment to some, not being a fully controllable Mario game on phones. However after spending some time with it, the one handed aspect and being a running genre/platformer hybrid works quite well. Very easy to pick up and play, and has plenty of aesthetics of a full Mario game. While the 10 dollar full game price may seem like a lot, it opens up a ton of content that makes it worth it. To me it's a solid amount of Mario for a phone.

i like this game alot to be honest! it's actually pretty entertaining in my opinion, however, i took 2 stars of because the the HUGE pay wall. you must pay to play the levels after world 1, controlled ads would be fine if you needed to make money from this! also you must pay to not have to wait to play the next set of remix 10 levels. this is my favorite part of the game and i have to wait? like i said, controlled ads would be fine.

I love this Super Mario game because I learned to play it. I doesn't contain ads, but I can still play it for free. In the world tour, I let Mario save Princess Peach from Bowser because in the beginning, Mario realized that Princess Peach was kidnapped by Bowser. In the rally, I collect more coins than the opponent. In Remix 10, I'll let Mario save Daisy.

This game started out to be great but after world 1 you have to pay to keep playing. Like, what about us broke people. I feel like this would still be an awesome game even if you had to watch a couple adds. You should still have some way of playing without paying even if it's hard to get there. Those are the reasons why I'm giving the game one star then deleting it.

This game is an abomination, you spend ten bucks for the most crappy campaign in any game I've ever seen, and there nothing to do after that. You get this crappy online mode where you have to try and beat course as fast and stylish as possible but most of the time the levels they pick are ones were if you go to fast you die and end up losing all your important Toads, it picks the same maps over and over and over and there's never a new good one. Save your ten bucks, this game is complete trash.

title: FRAG Pro Shooter
description:
Get ready to discover FRAG PRO SHOOTER, a free shooter game by Oh BiBi! Play explosive 1v1 duels against players from all over the world with this amazing FPS designed for your phone. 

BECOME A TOP FRAG SHOOTER!
- Join more than 50 million players worldwide.
- Meet other players for short but crazy battles!
- Control your character in first person or third person views.
- Discover the new co-op mode! Cooperate with another player to defeat your opponents!

PERSONALIZE YOUR GAMEPLAY FOR 1v1 MATCHES
- Switch between your 5 characters and gain the advantage!
- Being dead isn't that bad: regain life instantly with another character!
- Build your battle team to fit your game style: attack, defense, etc...

CREATE YOUR OWN TEAM
- Over 80 characters for building your dream team and becoming the best shooter.
- Customize your characters with powerful and exciting skins!
- Upgrade your characters to make them even more awesome!

MAKE FRIENDS, RIVALS, AND BECOME A SUPERSTAR!!
- Expand your FAN BASE to become popular!!
- Join a club or create your own to make your team famous!
- Record and share your games and decks, and check out others‚Äô to become better!

TIPS
- Every character has their strengths and weaknesses: try them all to see which ones are best for you!
- Attack the enemy target to get lots of points, but beware of ambushes!
- Check your missions for amazing rewards!

FRAG PRO SHOOTER is a match for any rival PC or console game. It has everything a shooter needs: FPS (first person shooter) and TPS (third person shooter) options, auto shoot, and all the controls are adjustable to fit your playing style! It‚Äôs no secret that FRAG PRO SHOOTER has more than 50 million players, so come join the fun!

comments: One of the best games i play on my phone, but only 2/5 because there are to many ads... you want to watch an add to open a chest? Too bad after each chest one add so watch 2 for one chest... win a chest from the game and you waited 3h to open it? Here you win an add... it s sad because they really could make the game to chose if u want to see adds and to have boost or cards for this... even if u finish a task u sill get an add.. every step u make, u win an add.. this is really anoying,

This game has potential to be one of the best mobile games but, like every other game its a pay to win. As long as you have the robot with the baseball bat you literally can't lose, you just hit someone one time and send them flying out of the arena. It ruined this game for me. Unistalled & Disappointed

I keep having this problem that sometimes whenever I click on battle button it doesn't battle. This is the only problem I have. Please fix it. All the other things are good. The graphics are good, the characters are awesome and the game is LEGENDARY. And only legends get to play this game.

It is best game to play in free time. I also play this game in free time. This game's graphics are good but not realistic. But this game's sound effects and character's special power animation is very good. This game's characters are very cool. But some characters are not any body it has a robot type body. Sometimes her characters power was exchanged.

It's an Amazing game! I would play this game 247 hours a day. When a few months passed I got really bored, and I dicided to delete the game. The gameplay is amazing though, its really easy to control. The graphics are a passing A+. I love this game, and I think you will love it too. I think I was not patient with the game, and dicided to delete it. I wont get it back though, sorry!

title: Knock'em All
description:
The most impressive game of 2020 so far! 
Jump from building to building and shoot the dummies to destabilize them and make them fall from the top!

The best players manage to chain sections together by stepping on them in just a few seconds. 

Simple and intuitive controls and addictive gameplay mechanics.

recentChanges:
- New icon.
- Overall performance optimizations.
comments: Well. Im now at level 4200. YES. THATS FOUR THOUSANDS TWO HUNDRED and NORHING has changed. Fun game if your sitting in a waiting room or waiting for a bus because when you leave suddenly, you don't loose anything. Very repetitive, after 2000 levels you would think it would get harder. Only options is to change the color of the balls and the gun. Still, very repetitive. I've resorted to just shooting arms and legs off to try and make the game a bit more challenging. Not working.

This is a great time killer game. Only complaint is that there are about 10 different levels that just keep repeating. The fun is not that it is challenging, but in watching the dummies explode and body parts go flying everywhere. I wish the developers would add a wider variety of levels so at least you may be surprised at what's coming at you. Also add more variety to the dummies as there are only 3 types now. Highly recommended if you have some time to kill and don't want to think too hard.

Who knew that shooting the legs off robots could be such fun? I could almost give up pulling the wings off flies or punching disabled kids!! Update: Was so impressed by recent updates that I paid to go ad free. The most fun you can have with robots that doesn't result in the heart attack of a sibling!
Games good for a while, but lacks depth. It needs to be expanded on, clear a building or city block. Each level needs to last a lot longer and have a clear adjective.
I moderately boring game that requires a new ad every level and levels take about 5 or 10 seconds. Yes, you generally spend twice as much time or more watching ads as you do playing the game.

title: Snowball.io
description:
The most addictive game with the simplest control ever.
Make a snowball bigger and bump it to opponents to flick them off the play field. 
You can make one giant snowball or a  number of small balls... and you can bump it directly to the opponent or snipe them with it... it is totally up to you.

How to control: swipe to the direction you want to move, and lift your finger to shoot the snowball.

How to control: swipe to the direction you want to move, and lift your finger to shoot the snowball.
summary: Push Off Your Opponents
recentChanges:
* Improved user experience.
* Fixed bugs
comments: Bad but good!! I personally hate the ads but the game in general is good. This is my go to game try to fix the bugs and glitches as best as you can it is very fun and maybe make a feature where you can play with friends. And also another suggestion make some kind of tournament for certain platforms to play and for the prize make a new and cool skin for the winner of each platform. Another suggestion is that you have more people queued in each match. This is my go to game in my spare time. G job

This game is great... In theory. It's controls are fine, the premise is cool. That in itself would warrant at least four stars. My only gripe with this game is that it likes to exit itself and freeze from time to time. It just exits to the home screen and I don't know why. Just fix that but and this game will be complete!

This is a really fun game.the only reason that it's not 5 stars is because it's impossible to find the secret skin.i think this is a great game.a few other things I would like is if you could play online.another cool thing that I hope to see in the future is more skins.this is a WONDERFUL game overall.i highly recommend it

I love this app soooooooo much I play it every single day a d if you give it 1 star because it has ads well you should shut you mouth because that is so stupid and I know the game is better than the ads but they are there so they can tell you new apps a show stuff. So I'm sorry ( bye felicia)

When i first downloaded the game it was excellent very few ads because i turned off my wifi but a few hours later i tried playing the game and the freaking thing just does nothing but show a black screen with an ad on the right. every time now this hapens whats the point in downloading a game like this wjen this is all the developers can offer?

title: Draw Joust!
description:
Build your ride, and joust it out with your opponent! Do you have what it takes to win the tourney?

- Axes, spears, cannons, swords, all sorts of weapons attachable to your cart
- Dozens of cart types
- Multiple Arenas
- Endless enemies
descriptionHTML:
Build your ride, and joust it out with your opponent! Do you have what it takes to win the tourney?

- Axes, spears, cannons, swords, all sorts of weapons attachable to your cart
- Dozens of cart types
- Multiple Arenas
- Endless enemies
summary: Draw the strongest cart!
recentChanges: Minor bug fixes
comments: So they recently updated the game and ruined the experience. Prior to update my rating was a solid 4/5 but now its barely a two. Mainly due to increased ad count. There is an Ad between each match.(normal) There is an ad to use the special weapon (new). There is an ad everytime u level up (new) so now it seems the coin system is useless. It is possible to watch 3 separate ads between a match which doesn't last long itself.
Game mechanics are way off. As you are playing your character will start floating away making it impossible to win

I LOVE this game and have become SO addicted! I love how it's an offline game and it's simple but entertaining for when I'm not connected to wifi, and even when I am. The only thing I could say could be improved is the amount of ink you get. The bosses have GIANT vehicles and I'm on level 550 and dont have much ink. The ink cost so much after you buy about 5 lots and it doesnt give you that much. Overall, I love this game!
So in the top left corner you can see how the opponents car and figure out what you can make to destroy it best this game is amazingly good üëç üëå üíØ

It's pretty simple and addicting. I just wish it were more challenging. Right now the AI reacts to whatever you're doing. It won't charge on its own or anything, you basically control both your car and the other car. You can also overpower yourself to the point of almost everything being too easy to be any fun. Wall-less maps are pretty much worthless because you can just ram the other car off immediately. Stronger and more intelligent enemies would be a great addition.

title: I, The One - Action Fighting Game
description:
Kick enemies & knock them out of the arena in the online fighting simulator!

You‚Äôre on the top of the roof. What will you do? Kick, punch, knockout ‚Äî fight for the survival of course! There's only room for one boxer in this ring. So take it!

I, The One is an accurate fighting simulator, where you choose your mini city fighter and enter the battle arena. Defeat enemies with epic boxing moves, use karate skills and give deadly MMA punches! The goal is to push rivals out of the battlefield. For each punch, you‚Äôll get points that will make the next one more powerful!

ü•ä Top features ü•ä

‚Ä¢ Join online PvP fights against players from all across the globe
‚Ä¢ Kick harder & get points for more powerful punches
‚Ä¢ Choose from a variety of battle arenas and modes with real action
‚Ä¢ Use boxing and MMA moves to defeat other players in the fighting ring
‚Ä¢ Unlock new skins, boxing gloves, boosts and other features to upgrade your street fighter
‚Ä¢ Play in both portrait and landscape modes

ü•ä How to play ü•ä

‚Ä¢ In landscape mode use a joystick and attack button
‚Ä¢ In portrait mode move by turning a virtual joystick in the required direction and release it to perform an attack

Ready to be the champion of this boxing arena? Unleash your fighting rage and beat ‚Äòem up!

comments: The worst part of this game is when you press the punch button literally three seconds after the character would throw a punch. I thought maybe the game setting. But I changed it and it just stay. So..sorry. uninstall

This game is so bad!!! Tbe punching speed,getting up speed,and character movement is SO BAD!!! Everuthing is so slow! You cant turn your character around so I always get hit from behind and the level 7 backflip kick is so bad you can even get a hit with it! Would NOT RECOMMEND!
Amazing! I really like the different modes, the level attacks and everything else! Its just kinda weird that there's no multilayer mode...

Funny game. Anyway, I find that power does nothing or close to that for player, with max power guy an max equipment i don't feel much difference, where AI has advantages there even witout power items.. and too much adds.

First of all, its good. Secondly, this game would hit sky high to the charts if there were gamemodes such as Survival Mode, Time Attack, etc. And this game really needs the Local and online Multiplayer. Its a good game after all. And the only problem is, things get boring the farther you get on the game, because first only few maps secondly few equipments and the last, few modes. And the soccer thing is no sense btw, only a map with balls in it.

title: Murder us
description:
With "Murder us" you will be able to play online with 3-10 players while you fix the spaceship to win, but be careful and stay alert because among you there are one or two murderers who will not stop until they kill them all!
To win, the crew must complete all the tasks or discover and vote, together with their crewmates, on the assassins and thus eliminate them from the ship.
The rooms can be:
-Online Public to play with people from all over the world.
-Online Private to be able to play only with your friends.
You can choose between 2 maps already created or create your own map with the incredible level editor.

The assassins, to win, must assassinate the crew and sabotage the different tasks causing chaos, this will facilitate the murders and also, they will be able to create alibis to deceive the other crew members.

summary: Discover the assassin or eliminate the crew. Play online with friends.
comments: It's an ok game. Just an amount us rip off. I do like the build a map feature however. I think you should expand the game upon that feature. There should be a complete level designer and it should let you save your custom maps and play them again later on. It's ok, but if you expand the level creator, it could be a lot better. Also I don't like how when a game is over, you have to make a new one.

This game is horrible. The sabotages are just normal tasks that you do, and depending on which task it is the imposter(s) can win easily. You cant change which color you are, there are way to many glitches, and the graphics are ridiculously bad. Also please dont copy other games, especially if the game isnt even good or made correctly.

Played one round. hated it. Bots. Bots. BOTS. literally nobody understands what is happening inside the game and when someone kills in front of people and it gets reported there all like: wHeRe?? WhO?? everyone is a bot. the tasks are horrible. It's tasks for idiots and it's not deatailed at all. If you're having a h**l of a time playing this stupid game I have 7 words to fix your problem: uninstall and get among us. It's free. This game Is a poorly executed copy of an amazing game. just. STOP.

dont listen to the 5 star bots. this game is JUST. A. RIP. OFF of among us. just get the real game. its not expensive to get. Among Us is a free game like this one but among us was made first. The chat is only in Spanish and I feel like everyone is a bot. The tasks are WAY to simple and ads appear everytime you leave. I wish I can rate this less than 1 star üò°

Alrighty. This is a blatant rip-off of Among Us. It's basically a copy-paste of it, with an exception of a downgrade with the graphics and clunky controls. It copies the lobby, the whole crewmate vs impostor concept, it dumbs down the tasks to where it's not even fun, it copies the whole spaceship setting, and the list goes on. I saw a review stating that Among Us is the rip-off. Please check your facts! This game came out just a little bit ago, and Among Us has been around for two years!

title: Draw Duel
description: Use your drawing skills in 1v1 duels!
descriptionHTML: Use your drawing skills in 1v1 duels!
summary: Drawn to death
developerAddress:
1100 Page Mill Road
Palo Alto, CA 94304
recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: I really liked it, it's only been 5 minutes playing this game but each round you play after you win or lose, you always get an ad. I thought by turning off my Wi-fi and turning airplane mode on would reduce the amount of ads I get. But it doesn't let you play, the enemy just sits there, and you do no damage to them. Overall 2/3 of this game you play is ads.

The ads nothing like the real game. The ai jist swings its sword in a circle at about 2 feet per hour. You barely need to move to win a level. And pretty much any time you click or do anything they will SLAP you with a 30 second ad. If it was enjoyable without the ads I would just turn off my data and just play the game but its not even a good game.

I agree with the top three ratings.The game is a good time waster.But after each level,POW,ad!The levels aren't even hard. The bots don't really do anything.Just point your sword straight,and,wada bing pang pow,you win!And while the ads I get are skippable after five seconds,they are still anoying.And you can turn wifi and data off,but like I said earlier,there's nothing to the game!2 stars.Lion Studios sucks,end of discussion.

I played for less than 5 minutes and got bombarded by nearly as many ads. Its not a terrible game, but having an ad after literally everything makes in unplayable garbage. To be clear, I was so offended by how much of my time this game is willing to waste with non-game content i looked it up through my apps to write this and uninstalled. 5 minutes.

First off, this games is fin and addictive but too bad there are way too many ads popping up constantly. I recommend to the devs: GET rid of the ads during gameplay, Just keep the ones that appear when you want an extra power up or an extra upgrade but don't put ones while playing chapters.

title: Bed Wars
description:
Bed War is a team-up PVP game that has gathered a large number of players in Blockman GO. Players protect their base ‚Äî‚Äî the Bed, and use all the resources they have to destroy others' beds to win the final victory.
Here are the rules for this game:
- It will divide 16 players into 4 teams. They will be born on 4 different islands. The island has its own base with a bed. Players in the team can be revived as long as the the bed exists.
- The island will produce irons, golds, and diamonds, which used to exchange for equipment from merchants in the island.
- Use the equipment and blocks in hands to collect more resources on the center island.
- Build bridge to enemy's island, destroy their bed, and kill them.
- The last surviving team wins the final victory.

This game is owned by Blockman GO. Download Blockman GO to play more interesting games.

If you have any reports or suggestions, please feel free to contact us via indiegames@sandboxol.com

comments: Best game ever all other games are just a copy of Minecraft , but you are something more different than minecraft. But it has some issues you can use money to reborn , it is only possibly to people who can buy it. And they can always win the games, that's the reason why I am giving you only 4 stars. But if you solve this problem I will give you 5 stars.

This game is awesome and very fun to play. I really liked it. My one of the favorite game. It's very easy to control and the bestest thing I found is that there are real players, no computers, real people play the game. Really this game deserve five stars. This game is very challenging also and I love challenging games. But one problem I found is that it takes a lot of time to start and ya we have to click manier times for starting the game. But pls download the game, this is really Superb game.

After looking at the reviews, I saw that around 40% of people are saying they are getting hacked in the game, I'd recommend to download it but just stay more careful, like, leave the game if someone is hacking and you notice, and leave the game if someone in the chat says there is a hacker in the server, thanks.

It's extremely fun and all but some people on this game use a chromebook like my friend and I and the controls are more complicated because we have to use our mouse to move the joystick or click the buttons. The invisibility potion also won't hide you items in hand it also won't let me hit anyone invisible which I find very annoying.

Bed wars...kind of fun game but I only have one problem from the game. The joystick, when I always walk on the bridge (The one with wool that players can buy from game) it always go to the right side of my joystick!!! So I fall down when the joystick let me go to the right. Please fix this bug!!!!

title: Mario Kart Tour
description:
‚ñ†Challenge players worldwide in multiplayer!
You can race against up to seven other players, whether they're registered as in-game friends, nearby, or scattered around the world.

Multiplayer races can be customized with a variety of rules, such as individual or team races, kart speed, and number of item slots. You can play however you want!

‚ñ† Mario Kart takes a world tour!
Mario and friends go global in this new Mario Kart as they race around courses inspired by real-world cities in addition to classic Mario Kart courses! These destinations will be featured in tours that rotate every two weeks! In addition to courses based on iconic locales, some of your favorite Mario Kart characters will get variations that incorporate the local flavor of cities featured in the game!

‚ñ† Endless Mario Kart fun at your fingertips!
The Mario Kart series known and loved by many is ready to take the world by storm ‚Äì one smart device at a time! With just one finger, you can steer and drift with ease and sling devastating items as you go for the gold in cups filled with new and classic Mario Kart courses.

‚ñ† Nab 1st place with items and Frenzy mode!
In Mario Kart Tour you have access to an arsenal of powerful items that can mix things up on the racetrack! Turn up the heat by activating the new Frenzy mode, which gives an unlimited supply of a certain item and makes you invincible! Make the most of the ensuing chaos, as Frenzy mode only lasts a short time!

‚ñ† Collect drivers, karts, badges, and more!
Earn Grand Stars by racing or fire off the featured pipe to receive more drivers, karts, and gliders! You can also proudly display badges, earned by completing certain challenges, next to your in-game name!

‚ñ† Bonus challenge courses put a twist on traditional races!
In certain races, 1st place isn't always the goal. With names like "Vs. Mega Bowser" and "Goomba Takedown," these bonus challenge courses demand a different approach to gameplay and strategy!

‚ñ† Race to increase your online rank!
Boost with the best of 'em! Your high scores will determine how you compare to other players all over the world. Keep practicing and trying out different combinations of drivers, karts, and gliders to increase your score and rise to the top!

Note: A Nintendo Account is required to play Mario Kart Tour.

* Free-to-start; optional in-game purchases available. Persistent Internet, compatible smartphone, and Nintendo Account required. Data charges may apply.
* For information about our ads, please see the ‚ÄúHow we use your information‚Äù section of the Nintendo Privacy Policy.
* May include advertising.

User Agreement:
https://support.mariokarttour.com/application_eula

¬© 2019 Nintendo
Mario Kart is a trademark of Nintendo.

recentChanges:
„ÉªAdjusted the number of Greeting Coins received and the animation when receiving them.
„ÉªAddressed known issues.
comments: This is awesome, it has old courses from the oldest games and newer courses from the most recent it's amazing, but the rubies are way, WAY too expensive to the point they're not worth it. But you dont need them to enjoy the game! While a lot of people say it's pay to play it's really not. I have a large amount of high-end drivers, karts, and gliders, and rubies now and haven't spent a penny on the game. I don't play more than maybe 5-10 minutes a day at most. If I even play for the day.

I like this game. I really do! I play it a lot, and there's no doubt that there have been vast improvements since launch; with the exception being the gacha element. It's so laughably stingy with how it doles out high-end gear, especially once you've cleaned up all the challenges (the fastest way to earn 'rubies'). Once you've completed these the only real way to obtain rubies is through the ranked challenges, which routinely pits you against players who have spent money to level up unfairly.

Game play is great. It's extremely pay to win and for some reason extremely expensive. It's not even real multiplayer, so you're paying a lot for a solo experience. Don't pay for this game. Update: gotten better since I wrote original. Went 2 to 4 stars. Still very pay to win, but they've gotten a little better. I do pay for the gold pass, which if you play the game a lot is worth it. They could be a little more generous with gems and such, but I'll take what they have now. Still a good game.

This game is great for Mariokart on the go. The gameplay has been updated to work well for quick gameplay bursts. I love how so many courses are being revamped for this release, all of them looking much better in HD. The music and visuals are great, and playing it feels very close to playing it on a console (especially thanks to landscape mode!) The only criticism I have for this game is constantly encouraging you to spend money, however, I haven't spend any money and have enjoyed the game.

The game is quick, fun and really addictive! Anyone can be good at this, doesn't take any special skills to get a grip on the wheels and you are off. Only drawback I'd say is how much work it takes to get rubies which inturn are used for getting all sorts of karts, drivers and gliders. I'd recommend getting the gold pass if you are a daily player and want to score better, it gives you 2 times as much gifts as you would get without it.

title: Miraculous Ladybug & Cat Noir
description:
An OFFICIAL Miraculous Ladybug app - don‚Äôt let any old red with black polkadot games fool you! This superhero running game is the real deal!
 
Join Miraculous Ladybug and Cat Noir on their Paris rescue mission, in this challenging, addictive & super fun runner! 
 
Paris, your beloved city, is in trouble, and only you can save it from destruction! Turn into the awesome superheroes Miraculous Ladybug and Cat Noir and jump into the Miraculous universe. Run through the streets of Paris, jump and avoid obstacles and defeat villains. 
 
Everyone thinks you‚Äôre just an awkward teenager. But you‚Äôve got a SECRET. You may be a run-of-the-mill teen by day, but by night you become a superhero. The City of Love is in danger of being taken over by the mysterious supervillain Hawk Moth and his evil Akumas. It‚Äôs up to a superhero like you to run and save the day. 
 
* Run, jump and leap over rooftops & run through alleyways to save the day
* Dodge obstacles in your running path 
* Play either as superhero Marinette & Ladybug or Adrien & Cat Noir
* Collect tokens & other surprises as you run and jump, exploring Paris
* Collect awesome power-ups along your running path
* Face off with dangerous villains Dark Cupid, Stormy Weather, The Bubbler & more
 
Alright superhero, are you ready to run, jump and fight to save Paris? Hawk Moth is already running to wreak havoc. Rescue the City of Love!

comments: This is my favorite game, it's a lot like subway surfers, but based off the tv show, Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir. It gets harder after each level, and I love challenging myself with each level. I recomend whoever watches this show to play it, and whoever doesn't know it to go watch it and play this game! I love each character in the game and think they look a lot like them. I would love to see more then 80 levels and more characters after season 4 or the movie. üòäüëç

The game is fun. I like the graphics... great time waster... it's a standard run game. No special extras. Just run and try to finish the track without slamming into things. But it's good. Not $32 a week good. Who was the genius that thought that was a good idea? Seriously. Bigger games with more to offer either charge a flat fee or $10 a month on the high end. $32 a month for a run game? No. I would pay $7 a month for access to the VIP characters, but not a month.

This game is so fun and so enjoyable,i love it how you can run like a miraculous super hero because this is what a miraculousfan loves.#MIRACULOUSFAN.Although i have some trouble issues about the lags,when you like got the exp or magnet thing,i lag and i also expirience those situations that i can't move my hero to the place where i wanted to.Pls fix this crazy labs and thank u cause u are brilliant making this game so that leads me to 3 stars...stay safe and more ratings to u crazy labs‚ô°

Ok this might be a little judgmental. 1. The characters don't blink. 2. It sometimes glitch. 3. The characters have to have their own powers. Like Cat Noir having cataclysm, Ladybug having her lucky charm, Rena Rouge having her Mirage Tokens. 4. They all sound like Marinette when they bump. Thats all i can say.

I love this game, Actually I have downloaded it atleast 10times in my phone I love the way u decorated it and the characters I'm giving you 4 stars instead of 5 stars because when I used to download it first time(2 years ago) and that time I have cleared all 80 level but till now the level are norlt upgraded we want new level new villians and also twists...

title: Rope Hero: Vice Town
description:
Meet the biggest update of the free game about the funny blue super hero. We made huge improvements and additions. The updated world has become even more interesting and exciting. We have improved the quality of graphics, completely redesigned the huge open world and increased its size.

Now it's time to become a real super hero. It's time to be strong, fast, and fearless. Start your mission right now and rise to the top of fame. Try your hand at an exciting 3D third-person shooter with RPG elements, get a new gaming experience and new emotions playing the new version.

Use your power to free the city from crime. The main character still has to fight evil by playing interesting quests. The hero will fight with gangsters and other evil that filled this city. The hero will win fame and gain huge popularity in the city. Also, the hero is waiting for exciting chases and fights with various bosses.

Your character still has super powers. He has an unlimited super rope in his Arsenal, as well as the ability to make mega jumps and landings, the ability to move around buildings, and many more interesting things. With the help of a rope, the hero can quickly move through the buildings of the city, move over the buildings and be aware of what is happening on the city streets.

We have significantly expanded the game store, as well as discounts on products. The game has updated the range of ammunition for the player, you can customize your character using any sets. This makes it unique among others.

The game has updated the set of vehicles, appeared beach SUV, bike, improved pink tank, helicopter, plane. The game has a large number of improved vehicles for movement, everyone can choose their own transport to taste.

Your super hero in the game has a huge Arsenal of cool pieces. Try the most popular of them, you can get them in the game store.

Skateboard-this thing is always available to the player, with it you can more interesting to move around the city, perform interesting tricks and maneuvers.

An improved version of the parachute, it has more controllability, with the help of the updated parachute, the hero will be able to perform more extreme tricks.

GLIDER-an addition to the super hero costume that allows him to fly on jet propulsion, like a fast military aircraft. This thing helps to move very quickly on the map, to get away from prosecution. The jet wings are equipped with a weapon system that extends the functionality and allows you to return fire.

Selfie stick-allows you to take photos of interesting moments in the game and share them with your friends. This funny thing can also be a great means of self-defense. Since a real super hero is always on the alert.

The game has expanded the Arsenal of weapons, new SCI-FI blasters and classic powerful guns.

Especially helps the hero in quests new super hero weapons.

Freezer-a gun that allows you to freeze opponents for a while. This gun allows you to freeze tanks, robots, cars.

GRAVIGUN-cool weapon that allows you to attract enemies to yourself. This is a great thing, the possibilities of its use are limited only by the imagination of the player.

FLAMETHROWER - a powerful gun that shoots fire, with it you can set fire to everything in the city that you want.

DANCE GUN - a fun thing, with the help of it, the player can make all their opponents dance. With this thing, you can have great fun in the 3D city.

We hope you will like the new version of the game very much.

comments: The advertisement for this game is very deceiving. It gets boring and repetitive very quickly. There's no choices/action options (all you do is tap when green), it would be great if the developer could implement it. More stunts that are better andongor would make the game more interesting. Also, there are lots of ads, I get that the game is free and ads are what make them free but one after every level is overdoing it.

You will have a better experience if you're not using wifi or on airplane mode, because the ads are nonstop. The big reason why I rate it 3 stars is because my phone heats up very quickly and loses battery very quickly. Nonetheless, a good game

This game is pretty fun but there could be two fixes for the game 1.when you jump into the cube thing it says epic replay but can it show the entire game play please 2.if we can have different views instead of first person like we can change the view and can we have more movement please like some levels we can actually control how we move instead of just tapping but other then that game is amazing so thats why i put five stars

I'm on level 114 and even the ads don't bother me it's really awesome.
Really good. Just the problem is that there should be some setting to remove the green circle so that we jump on our selves to make it fun and replay should be shown completely.

title: Draw Defence
description:
An army is at your disposal. Simply draw your forces to set up a defense line and protect your castle!

Gameplay:
Different drawing, different forces. Draw your best formation to counter enemy attack.
Drawing consumes ink, make sure you use it wisely.
Upgrade your ink and warriors regularly to ensure maximum damage output.
Conquer unique bosses and have them fight for your side.

Game features:
When your warriors are in trouble, use magic skills to solve your problem.
The higher your ink level, the faster it regenerates. 
When you are overwhelmed by enemy forces, try simply drawing as many warriors as you can.
Unlock 7 unique bosses to fight for you.
4 army classes + 2 magic spells.

title: Zooba: Free-for-all Zoo Combat Battle Royale Games
description:
Get ready for an adventure with Zooba: a fun free action-packed online multiplayer survival game! Zooba is a great free multiplayer survival battle royale game and combines MOBA play style (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena) to gives players an adrenaline-filled battle royale survival adventure! Zooba is a fast-paced online multiplayer survival game, download it and play for free!
 
Choose your favorite animal characters.
Brawl for free online with your friends in multiplayer adventure survival games.
Win prizes and upgrade your animals.
 
KEY FEATURES:
- Fight it out in different free multiplayer survival arenas
- Fun game controls
- Win prizes and upgrade your characters
- Stunning graphics
- Enjoy free fun with friends in multiplayer battle royale survival games
- Become the zoo‚Äôs battle royale adventure superstar!
 
Download Zooba for a great free online multiplayer battle royale game experience, whether you are a beginner or novice survival battle royale game fan! Zooba offers fun survival play modes and endless hours of free multiplayer excitement. Zooba is an online survival adventure game that offers action, unique gameplay, and an awesome free multiplayer survival adventure experience!

comments: This is a great game, I loved it. When I play with BRUCE,BUCK,DUKE game gets pause for a second this happened all the time in the fight, sometimes this makes me lose the trophies. Also it's making me feel bored to play with same characters again and again...I have opened many gold crates where no new character showed-up. Please fill more excitement to this game!! => I'm surprised that why didn't you guys add, * RHINO * HIPPOPOTAMUS * ELEPHANT characters!!!!

Great game but has quite a few problems. FIX THE MATCHUPS!! Almost every review tells you to fix them. Also has a lot of problems with the server. Many small bugs and glitches. You won't believe it but I was actually pushed outside the zoo once ü§£ü§£. Please fix them. I want to keep Playing Zooba

OK, so this game is extremely fun to play. I read the reviews saying that it's laggy, but it's not! I did not even need to pay in the game to mostly win. And it's art designs and characters are of high standards(although the whole game could be rated as 4 stars). Even though it basically copied Fortnite, it has features that make it interactive. So, unless you have connection problems etc. , I highly recommend you to play Zooba.

It was okay in the beginning , after some time , out of nowhere the game started getting disconnected on it's own..It gets disconnected at the moment when you are winning a battle and would reconnect when you lose it ...Pls fix this this, I have given 3 stars because I think that this issue has to be solved as I like this game very much and will be very happy when this issue will get fixed, thanks..

I quickly got to level five in one day. But the progress grinds to a screeching halt without money spent. And I'm already noticing being matched with players far stronger than me a lot of the time. It almost feels pointless to play since I can't hurt anyone or upgrade. If you can hide in the grass long enough and stumble upon some gold weapons, you might have a chance at the end. But if u do, and the last couple players are two or more levels higher than you, it's a moot point. Frustrating. Sux

title: Mr Fight - Wrestling Puzzles
description:
Are you ready to rumble? 

Sequel to the smash hits Mr Bullet and Mr Ninja, a new competitor enters the ring to satisfy your puzzle obsession! With hands that are registered lethal weapons, wearing only his trusty speedo, control Mr Fight as he jumps, flips, flicks, and swipes his way through enemies. This challenge is about much more than just brute strength though, and you will have to flex your brain muscles as well to rise to the occasion. Do you have what it takes to become king of the ring, brother!? 

Outwit your enemies and land the killing blow as you travel to new levels, save hostages, and unlock new fighting skills. Start your adventure now! How quickly can you dispatch your rivals!?
 
 Game Features:

1.    	Become the champ! 
Use your brain and your brawn to take out the bad guys. From enemy spies, to zombies, to evil lumberjacks and aliens, they are all in your way on the path to becoming the champ.

2.    	Endless levels
The challenge never ends with tons of unique levels! How smart are you? Can you solve all the puzzles? Use your fighting skills to make objects fall and explode to create chain reactions and do whatever it takes to win! 

3.    	Hilarious Physics Puzzler
With skills like these who need clothes! It takes more than just accuracy to make it through. Speed, timing and patience are all things you will need to become king of the ring! Can you get three stars on every level?
 
4.    	New Features Constantly Added
Never get bored! Mr Fight is constantly updating with new unique levels, weapons and other skins. You will NOT want to miss out on the action.
 
If you liked Mr Bullet and Mr Ninja, you will LOVE Mr Fight



Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

From the Studio that brought you Mr. Bullet, Happy Glass, Ink Inc and Love Balls!

Follow us to get news and updates on our other Award Winning titles;
https://lionstudios.cc/
Facebook.com/LionStudios.cc
Instagram.com/LionStudioscc
Twitter.com/LionStudiosCC

title: Slap Kings
description:
Slap or be slapped: that‚Äôs the name of the game! This amusing and relaxing game will test your strength and timing skills so your smack generates the most power! Your hits will pack a punch. Watch your opponents fly out of the ring when you hit the knockout blow. How far do you think you can get in this face slapping good time tournament? Can you unlock your special power‚Ä¶ the Golden Fire Fist?

Easy to learn but surprising depth will provide you with hours of entertainment. Fun characters are just asking to get slapped in the face.

Time to knockout the competition and show them who the true Slap King is!


 
 Game Features:
1.       Simple but addicting mechanics
The meter will go back and forth - time it right for maximum power!

2.       Fun Characters
So many amusing characters challenging you to see who is the best slapper out there

3.       Power boosts
Stuck on a boss? Power up with limited time boosts! Defense helmets to withstand the hardest blows and your ultimate weapon...

4.        Chill and have fun
Nice casual, relaxing, smacking good fun. Show them who is the king.

Whether you want to smack, hit, slap, or fight, this game is for you. Slap Kings is the true slapping champion game.

comments: The game is nice and clean but only till level 65-70. After that game become too tuff for you to control, there should be a way to control things. Imagine the game level after 100. On top of it, too many unnecessary ads making the game not that awesome.. But that's what you get for playing free these days. No option to exit from the game, you have to end the task to get out from it. Hope developer will work in games longevity and UI.

Awesome, fun little game to pass some time, when needed. There are some ads, but if you are ALSO playing this game to kill some time, then who cares? Everybody's gotta make some $$ somehow. The real bonus here is, if you have to close the game immediately, it's no big deal. (As opposed to other games where it affects certain things if you have to suddenly quit)

Even after paying to remove ads, you're still seeing ads all the time. Any other game like this when you pay to remove ads they are completely removed. With this one it just removes a few. You're still slapped with ads if you want the multiplier, if you want to use the super slap, and if you want to claim the skin and super slap you just unlocked. Not worth your time or money.

This game has too many ads forced on you. Just doing something like adding a strength point, triggered ads. It was ridiculous. I liked the game, the only reason I'm uninstalling is the ads. I can deal with some ads but this was overkill. Have an option to watch an ad to earn stuff, Say no, it forces an ad anyway and you get nothing for it. 1* rate and an uninstall cause way too greedy to trust in my phone.

Loads of sick fun. The graphics are crude but I probably wouldn't want them realistic. No complaints about the controls, and the motions of the avatars twirling, getting dizzy, beat up looking, even your own, are nice to help keep it real. Reminds me of punch contests in Jr. High, trying out new muscle. Take turns shocking each other in the bicep, showing off how much you could take as well as give.

title: Smashy Road: Wanted 2
description:
SMASHY ROAD: WANTED 2

The Award winning game: Smashy Road: Wanted has stepped up it's game!

comments: My favorite childhood game, finally an update. In my opinion it's too "flat" on verity. I would like to see random colors on some cars or something to add to the mix. The only problem I have is the lack of tasks to complete, and some of the rewards, such as the tank. Yeah its cool and all but its not really practical for the way the game is played. Its not just a game that you can just hop on and just expect to get a legendary item or car. Its takes time but not its not a grind.

This game is good and great and also fun but I want to talk about bad things in the game, 1: the tank mission is hard making some of the players to rage. 2: the cops has the ability to open the passenger door next to the driver door which makes no sense as the cops become aggressive in every game. Last but not least no matter how fast your car is the cops will catch up to you but not the f1 lol. thank you makers of this game because the game is fun,good graphics and added good cars. Thank you :)

The original smashy road was my first mobile game and my favourite I have installed all of the games: smashy road, smashy road 2 and smashy road wanted 2. I would rate them all five stars however the three things I want to talk about to make the game even better (if possible) is to allow players to ride the animals that Rome in the feilds, ride in the hot air balloons in the desert and last of all ride in the trains. That would make this game perfect üëåüëåüëå

i love this game and it's great for when im offline! :) ...but it crashes often while im playing, which is a little bit annoying. developers, could you please try to fix the crashes, so that maybe i can actually play the game? thanks, devs, we love yall. yall are awesome!

Last time I played this game was about 2 years ago and from the looks of it, this game has updated itself very well! You are able to hop out of cars and even enter into other cars and helicopters! But for my phone the game has been having some lag. And drains my battery quicker than other games do. Would recommend this game for people who likes 8 bit type of style and for racing geeks.

title: Tomb of the Mask: Color
description:
This time the mystic mask and your passion for adventure led you into a new kind of maze. 

Moving from wall to wall, you need to paint over every corner of the labyrinth to make your way to the next one. But beware: some of them are not as safe as they seem to be...

We Love You. Enjoy.

comments: the game is really good, a great concept and fun to play but the ads are way too intrusive. it makes the whole experience very jarring. the game is worth 5 stars really but the ads kill the experience, making it feel very much 2 stars. nevertheless, i'm gonna give it 4 stars right now because i don't want y'alls ratings looking bad. do sumn bout it i guess, or not, up to you :)

Okay tell me if im wrong. You put a lot of effort into the first game and in my opinion it was really fun. Then to try and ride off of the success of the first one you made a low quality sequel that suffers from way to many ads as well as frequent crashing. Is it still addicting? Yes. Do I think it's actually a good game that I would recommend to people? No.

There are so many ads. And there a impossible levels so that you have to watch ads manually to skip the level. They also need to add more stages because once you get far enough into the game you just repeat previous levels. I have seen every level at least 3 times each. But the overall gameplay and idea is amazing, and the repeating levels dont bother me much, which is why i am 2000 levels into the game. 3/5

title: DRAGON BALL LEGENDS
description:
DRAGON BALL LEGENDS is the ultimate DRAGON BALL experience on your mobile device! This DB anime action RPG game features epic 3D visuals and animations to help tell the original story based off the brand-new character designed by Akira Toriyama, the mysterious Saiyan known as Shallot! Join Shallot and the rest of your favorite DRAGON BALL characters to help regain his memory and save the world!

DRAGON BALL LEGENDS features action-packed anime action RPG gameplay with Goku, Vegeta, Trunks, and all of your favorite DB characters! With Intuitive controls and simple card-based attack gameplay, mixed with high quality 3D animation & visuals, DRAGON BALL LEGENDS features the best anime fighting scenes on your mobile device!

Summon your favorite characters from popular DRAGON BALL anime series, such as DBZ, DBGT, to DBS! From popular heroes such as Goku, Gohan, Piccolo, TIen, and Krillin, to evil villains such as Frieza, Cell, and Majin Buu, all of your favorite anime DB characters are ready for battle! Are you?

Enjoy 1 on 1 anime fighting action against Friendly or Rival DB players from across the globe in live PVP battles! Enter Ratings Matches with your favorite DRAGON BALL characters and earn Rating Points and Rewards! Or gauge your strength in non-ranking casual matches for fun battles with players of similar power.

THE BEST ANIME ACTION RPG GAME
‚Ä¢Intuitively control your favorite DRAGON BALL fighters in 3D
‚Ä¢Use simple card-based attack gameplay to unleash combos
‚Ä¢Fill DRAGON BALL slots during battle to trigger the powerful team based Rising Rush attack

STUNNING ANIME WORLD OF DRAGON BALL
‚Ä¢Classic DB anime action recreated with high-quality 3D characters and stages
‚Ä¢Smooth character animations feature modern takes of iconic special moves
‚Ä¢Also featuring Character Voice acting

AN ORIGINAL ANIME RPG STORYLINE
‚Ä¢Play as the all new character designed by Akira Toriyama!
‚Ä¢Experience a new adventure with Goku and all your favorite characters

SUMMON ICONIC DB CHARACTERS
‚Ä¢Popular characters from DBZ, DBS, DBGT anime series are present
‚Ä¢From Goku‚Äôs Super Saiyan forms, Frieza, Cell, Krilin to Tien, many fan favorites join this anime action RPG
‚Ä¢Create the ultimate anime DB party for battle

LIVE PVP VERSUS BATTLES
‚Ä¢Compete in Real-Time battles against DRAGON BALL fans from around the world.
‚Ä¢Train and power up your DB characters and crush the competition
‚Ä¢Battle against Friends or Rivals and rank up the leaderboard

Are you ready to become a legend? Download the ultimate DB anime action RPG experience with DRAGON BALL LEGENDS today!

comments: In short, it's fun, there are FAR worse dragonball games, and that this is f2p is an added bonus. The interface could use some work, the top up event display every time you log in that you need to tap through could be so much more efficient. Microtransactions are present, and not great value for money, but I've not once felt the desire to pay anything in my time playing. Overall, give it a go, if you have a reasonably powerful phone, plenty of battery, and you like the dragonball universe.

Used to love this game, but after a while or after the update, it is so hard now to get chrono crystal! Worst is i worked hard for 2000 cc and then i summoned and used up all my gems but got nothing special characters! I am starting to hate this game, because it makes me mad sometimes! So im giving it 1 star only! And also, please fix those bugs on pvp or maybe dont allow hackers go in!!!!!! You people dont care about hackers getting in this game!! Stupid ****** üò†üò†üò†üò†üò†

Awesome it's the most interactive dragon ball z game I've ever played on mobile it may get boring now and then but it never gets to the point were I uninstalled it, it's such a good game I really think they should add like mui or even ui. They update their game constantly I don't think there is ever a month without a update . . . Amazing, there's a variety of characters that you can play as and it's not even hard to get them, they give out free summons, and they even give out discounts on them!!

This game has been experiencing a lot of bugs and I've found one recently. When I'm clicking on Start button for the new Cooler event it shows not enough energy and takes me back to the title screen even tho I have 300+ energy in energy tank. This happens every time i want to play that stage. And also when I'm soul boosting I cant select all cuz it takes me back to title screen again. I have to unlock every boost panel manually the way we had to do it earlier. Please fix these bugs Bandai Namco

This game is by far my favorite mobile game! Probably is the best game I have played on mobile EVER! The graphics are amazing and if your a fan of dragon ball/Z/GT/Super, then this game is perfect! Lots of characters to choose from with more coming out all the time. Kind of becoming more p2w but if your truly a f2p player like me, it's possible to grind and not miss out on much. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is the banners lately. Keep up the great work Bandai!!!!

recentChanges:
+ Fixed unlock Chapter XIII
+ New Chapter XIII: Deep Space! You have fought in the jungle, in cities devastated by TetraCorp, on oil platforms in the middle of the ocean, in deserts and subway labs. Now, Thrown to the space, your objetive is to arrive at the space station of TetraCorp, hidden behind the moon, and discover the horrible secrets inside. Survive or die.
comments: It's pretty good for an offline mobile shooter game. The game doesn't get stuck waiting for a network connection in between missions and the controls are easy to use. Other shooters I have tried can move their characters but the clunky controls made it difficult to move and shoot at the same time; it just doesn't work like a shooter on PC. The graphics are decent enough and the game play is quite engaging. There are paid content and premium accounts but it's optional.

The game offers you exciting deal of challenges. Graphics are awesome and make you feel operating in a real time scenario. Controls are excellent and providr you easy maneuvering. I believe, after a long search, i could find a real action game with all aspects falling at right places. Thanks to the developers, the game keeps moving, even without spending additional money at all. Overall, an amazing experience and outstanding action pack game. Kudos to its developers...keep it up.

This game is one of the most fair games out there, pay or not. If you are a non play player, this game is very fair when allowing you progress as well, just takes a little grind but nothing like the grind of other similar games. The game itself is pretty fun and addicting. The graphics are not bad either. It is worth trying out!

I was surprised to find that the progession in this game, being as generous as it is, makes it a much more desirable and generally fun experience; usually with a game like this, the game play/progression are directly influenced by in-app purchases for boosters, materials, resources, etc. But that's what great about it. While generous, it doesn't make the game super easy but makes the player feel like progress has been made in some tangible way, in aspiration for weapons or new characters

It's one of the best game, without the need to spend insane amount of money. Hat's of to the developers for such a wonderful experience in today's world where the games you play are just plainly created to make money. This is the best game I've played ever. So thank you everyone who made this game possible. The graphics, gameplay, controls, different need for skills are all just awesome. üëçüëåüéÜüéñ. I hope you'll make some items a little cheaper for daily use. But all in all best game ever.

title: Worms Zone .io - Voracious Snake
description:
You love games with tons of real fun and dynamic action? Then welcome to the Worms Zone.io, an awesome arcade, where you can become the great champion of the arena! Collect yummies and different powerups, defeat enemies, and become the biggest worm of them all! 

You think it's hard? Relax, the rules are simple - explore the arena, collect all the food you see, and grow your worms as big as you can imagine - there are no limits! 

Stand out from the other players, choose a skin from the wardrobe, or create your own unique style. The further you go, the more skins you unlock. 

Worms Zone is also a PVP action game! Watch out for other players and try not to bump into them, otherwise you‚Äôll have to start from scratch. However, if you manage to sneak and encircle them, you‚Äôll get more points and all the food they had. It is so yummy! 

There are several tactics for becoming a champion: ‚Äúfighter‚Äù, ‚Äútrickster‚Äù or ‚Äúbuilder‚Äù. Which one will you be?  
Worms Zone also has unique graphics! We keep it minimalistic and simple and you'll love it! 

We are happy when our players are happy, so if you have any thoughts, complaints, or cool ideas - feel free to share them and contact us at support@wildspike.com. 
Join our community! Follow our official Facebook page to get all the latest news and updates: https://www.facebook.com/wormszone/ 
Start growing your worm now! Slither into this crazy arcade and enjoy!
