title: Crossy Road
description:
Join over 200 MILLION players worldwide and experience Hipster Whale's massive viral #1 hit!

Same device multiplayer: Compete against your friends and family on the same device.

Play Crossy Road on the Big Screen with Android TV! 

Why did the Chicken cross the road?
Why did the Pigeon leave THAT there?
Why did Specimen 115 abduct that cow?
Why did Unihorse eat all that candy?


FEATURES:
 - Play Crossy Road on your big screen with Android TV 
 - Collect over 150 retro-styled, pop art inspired characters 
 - Cross roads, train tracks, and rivers ‚Äì endlessly hop forever 
 - Dodge traffic in a candy wonderland with the Android Robot 
 - Simple, pure, innovative gameplay 
 - Free to play


Have any problems or suggestions? You can reach us at inappsupport-googleplay@crossyroad.com.


**DON'T LOSE YOUR CHARACTERS!** 
- Go to game Settings and Sign-in with Google Play to save your characters, game progress, scores, and achievements! 
- After signing in, your progress will be saved to your Google Play account
- To restore your game progress, go to Settings and click Restore Game to restore all of your characters 
- You can only restore saved progress that was saved from version 1.0.6 onwards 
- We are working to support saving from multiple accounts on a single device in a future version. The current version works well with one account per device or one account across multiple devices.

The game require access to the following Permissions ----------

- Read device state and identity - READ_PHONE_STATE permission

- The game requires the LOCATION permission to target and deliver video-based advertising:
The game implements opt-in video ads that players can watch to earn free coins if they choose. Watching video ads is voluntary if players want to speed up the rate they earn coins to win new characters. We require the Location permission to provide location based video ads to provide more relevant ads to players.

title: Push'em all
description:
Trace your way to the end of the level and push the enemies with your stick on the way! 
Move your character and make all the ennemies fall down (and maybe you will learn how to use traps?!)

Be careful with giant ennemies and the fast ones, It's their turn to try to take you down!

One-tap easy-to-learn controls with stunning visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics!

title: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang
description:
Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang! Choose your  favorite heroes and build the perfect team with your comrades-in-arms! 10-second matchmaking, 10-minute battles. Laning, jungling, tower rushing, team battles, all the fun of PC MOBAs and action games in the palm of your hand! Feed your eSports spirit!

Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, 2017‚Äôs brand new mobile eSports masterpiece. Shatter your opponents with the touch of your finger and claim the crown of strongest Challenger!

Your phone thirsts for battle!

Features: 

1. Classic MOBA Maps, 5v5 Battles 
Real-time 5v5 battles against real opponents. Fight over 3 lanes to take the enemy‚Äôs tower. 4 jungle areas. 18 defense towers. 2 Wild Bosses. Complete reproductions of classic MOBA maps. Full-on 5v5, Human vs. Human battles. A triumphant return to genuine MOBA gameplay.

2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy 
Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team or be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!

3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory 
Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Winners and losers are decided based on skill and ability on this fair and balanced platform for competitive gaming. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.

4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master 
With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target sifting allow you to last hit to your heart‚Äôs content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system lets you focus on the thrill of battle!

5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches 
Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds, and battles last 10 minutes, glossing over the quiet early-game leveling up and jumping right into intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling action and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in heart-pounding MOBA competition.

6. Smart Offline AI Assistance 
In most MOBAs, a dropped connection means hanging your team out to dry, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bang‚Äôs powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while you‚Äôre offline, your character will be controlled by our AI system to avoid a 5-on-4 situation.

PLEASE NOTE! Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.

Contact Us 
You can get customer service assistance via the [Contact Us] button in the game to help you with any problems you may encounter while playing. You can also find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your Mobile Legends: Bang Bang thoughts and suggestions:

Customer Service Email: MobileLegendsGame@gmail.com
Instagram: @mobilelegendsgame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MobileLegends5v5MOBA

comments: Best game i've played on android. Usually i get bored real quick with phone games. This one has some depth to it, probably 100 different characters, and then you have unique builds for each one. It makes for a ton of customization, and there's always more to learn. It's pretty much a copy cat of League of Legends with different heroes, and a slightly different map. Otherwise the overall objective of the game, is exactly the same.

I'm in love with this game!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è It has such a good graphic and designs it's like LoL but I like it better on mobile. It's so easy to play! But there are so many updates. This game is my favorite one and I play it all day. The characters and the items are so good designed. And the shop and all of the other stuff. Keep up the good content Moonton!

Ive been playing this game since 2017, i think. I enjoy the game play and all the upgrades that happened through the years. But one thing that bums me out is the connection. I have good internet connection but it still is very laggy even if i use data with wifi. Sometimes i get so annoyed that i only play two games in a day since the connection is really bad. Hope you can fix this.

I like Mobile Legends Adventure so I thought I would try this game too. The graphics and gameplay are decent but the matching system is awful and unfair. There's never an even matchup, and if you have starting level characters and stats more often than not the odds will be skewed against you. This makes for an unpleasant experience for new players and certainly does not make the game fun enough to be worth the work to reach higher levels. Moonton fix your matchups and I will give it another try.

You can report each other as a prank among your friends after the game and they will get banned or penalized even though there was nothing going on. Obviously this can be misused by other players as well. Brain dead response (just wait below) and system that does not bother to check whether the reports are true or not. Reached mythic but no incentive to stay there. Many heroes but only a few are useable in the game. Don't believe me? See the same heroes picked in tournaments. Better play LOL.

title: Archero
description:
Archer Heroes!

Enter a world where existence itself is eliminate you! You are the Lone Archer, the only force able to resist and defeat the oncoming waves of evil.
Step up, stack up awesome skills and fight like your life depends on it, for the never-ending waves of enemies will never give up. And remember, once you die... the only way is to start all again! So be careful!

Enjoy creating countless combinations of unique skills all designed to help you survive. Crawl your way through different worlds facing relentless monsters and obstacles. 

Key Features:
	‚Ä¢	Random and unique skills to help you crawl these dungeons. 
	‚Ä¢	Explore beautiful worlds and hundreds of maps in this new universe. 
	‚Ä¢	Thousands of never-seen-before monsters and mind-boggling obstacles to

comments: I love this game and have played it for over a year now. However, on my Pixel 4XL, the game freezes after about 15-20 seconds of opening the app. I brought this to Habby's attention. They asked for video and my ID, which I provided. Since then, it's been days without a response from them. Unfortunately I paid money for the battle pass, and since I can't play the game at this point, I'm not getting any value out of my money. Player ID is: 1-1986622

After playing it more and after deleting the app ive actually enjoyed it. No more ads after every run. And it runs smoother. Dont know if it was an update but its a good game. I do wanna suggest having the option of being able to dismantle multiple items at once. Also if there is an ability that allows you to shoot while you move that would be cool. But mainly the dismantle thing. You guys did great. Im giving the 5th star and an apology im sorry for being quick to judge.

Fun Rogue-Like. Would recommend to anyone looking to kill time and gain progression. Resuming the level where you left off is a huge boon. If we could click a button while viewing a worn peice of equipment allowing us to veiw a list of other equipment to replace it with, however, it would be great. *Edit: I just realized what this game is missing. Cosmetics lol Give us some skins for the pets and heroes at least, if not the weapons too.

I love this game it's great and has a bit of challenges here and there. One thing i think should be added is if you spend x amount of money you never have to watch an ad again. I mean not going to lie ive spent over 100 bucks on this game and i dont think its right that i have to watch ads for extra stuff. Yall are just being greedy now.

Fun at first but you will quickly hit a wall. Pay to win, pay to progress.... Hitbox not accurate, you can get hit by object that pass next to but dont touch you but you still loose HP. Poor support, you contact them and they never answer... In short the game is bad and the support is bad. No fun in this game what so ever. You should not waste time playing this.

title: Flying Police Robot Rope Hero: Gangster Crime City
description:
Climb and Rescue 
Fly for grand robot rescue missions against real gangster squad in this superhero game. Play Flying Police Robot Rope Hero: Gangster Crime City and get ready for super hero rescue mission. Become futuristic robot superhero for a great climbing experience with flying rope hero in flying police games. The cop robot hero got ready to play rescue simulator game. People trust superhero rescue against city gangster mafia in super speed. They really think that flying heroes robot can save them from real gangster squad by climbing with the ropes in super hero games. Flying rope hero can fight the battle for crime city survival against rival gangs. So, get ready for police robot rescue to enjoy futuristic robot game. Fight like a genuine warrior in hero fighting game against city gangster mafia and save your city.


 Defeat Gangster Crime Mafia 
Only you as a flying rope hero is not less than a powerful heroes team so you won‚Äôt need other super hero fighters with you in flying robot game. Super hero vs gangster mafia fight going to take place in your home town and as a flying police superhero you need to settle it down. Flying police robot war is full of such super human that‚Äôs why there‚Äôs a big robot adventure awaits for you in rope hero game.  Being a flying robot warrior dash to the superhero rescue missions against rival gangs for crime city survival. The cop robot rescue mission is not limited to police chase only in real gangster game as the treacherous Vegas crime mafia is also active in the sin city. Increase your fighting capabilities by upgrading powerful heroes in the giant clash of super hero vs gangster mafia.

 Rope Hero Robot Fighting 
Get ready for fly hero rescue as a robot hero in flying robot games. Super hero fighters are ready for powerful superhero fight in cop robot rope hero games. Fold your sleeves for flying robot adventures in city rescue and save precious lives as a merciful rope hero. A flying police rope hero robot is a super human and can win the hearts in street fighting. Take part in city rescue missions of police games with your significant flying powers.


Flying Police Robot Rope Hero: Gangster Crime City‚Äô Features :
-	Number of city rescue missions with rival gangs
-	Superhero games also contain flying heroes robot movement
-	Futuristic robot fight with flying police chase
-	Extra ordinary superhero and super rope hero
-	Grand robot fighting high quality animations

Download Flying Police Robot Rope Hero: Gangster Crime City now!!

title: Slice them All! 3D
description:
Cut them all into small pieces! Jump from one building to another destroying everything on your way.
Cut enemies by swiping the screen. All the objects on your way are also breakable.
Don‚Äôt let the enemies get too close or you will lose.

summary: Cut evil robots into small pieces!
recentChanges: - Bug fixes.
comments: A simple cash grab with very little redeemable value. I played about 30 levels, they don't get much harder as you play, and there's no real progression. Each level takes maybe 15-30 seconds with an unskippable 30+ second ad after every single one, so if you play this game you MUST have airplane mode turned on to avoid the ads! You might get about 25 minutes of entertainment before you uninstall.

There is an Ad between EVERY level, you can choose to watch ads for more money, you can choose to watch ads to play the bonus mission (and then when you unlock it in game have to watch an ad when it starts and ends anyway) and you can watch an ad to get new gun skins. That wouldn't be THAT bad if the game play was actually fun, the AI don't do anything interesting except walk towards you, and on several occasions they got caught on terrain and did nothing.

Love the New Bonus Level.You dont perform the aggravating rate us act that most apps do. I came here to rate you 5 stars because I was happy to say thanx for the new stuff who cares about the bajillion ads about politics as long as I have access to continue to enjoy this Free. Thank you creators and also can you make this a little more challenging (its tooooo ez)
Ads galore. Ad after first level. Ad to play mandatory bonus level. Ad to get the new gun in the level. Then ad at the end of the level. Too many ads. Uninstalling

I am so dumb for getting this game because it's so ducking stupid its hard to play for 10 seconds without a ad.I don't want you to have this game at ALL.Also it is so boring #zzz.If you like this game you should burn üî• forever.So please please please don't get the game

title: Agar.io
description:
Play online with players around the world as you try to become the biggest cell of them all!

Control your tiny cell and eat other players to grow larger! But watch out: players bigger than you will be trying to make you their lunch. Survive and eat long enough to become the biggest cell in the game! 

With new controls developed especially for touchscreens, agar.io offers the same addictive gameplay that millions have already enjoyed on PC. Play online in free-for-all action and use splitting, shrinking and dodging tactics to catch other players - or avoid them! Use a variety of special secret skins with the right username!

Become a beta tester: http://goo.gl/cGmbd8

comments: I've been playing agar.io for 4 years. The last update was the best update for us players this far. One thing I would 100% recommend with my past experiences with the game, is adding a new setting control that enables players to customize their controls. My buttons are way to small to be able to play with my fat fingers. If you add an update that enables this, I can guarantee the game will be improved. Thank you for all these years of Happiness. Hope the Miniclip team stays safe!!

Ok so when ever you join a party and you leave the game but you still have people playing in your party and you join back to play with them it teleports you to a different lobby and you can't get back to them. Second of all the Battle Royale doesn't work and there's nobody playing it. Also if you join it's highly common to join right next to a big person and highly rare to join next to some Mass but if you do you die right away because all the other people are playing too.

well i'll start by one thing i know is really hard but here we go: for me the game is aweasome even with the simplicity but i guess its a time to revamp somehow the game like adding a new mechanic or more than the powers like this ones you had introduced into the game like the magnetic you collect now but, for me its time to the money i have in the game have your relevance. More than only buy skins and mass and xp bonus thanks for read and for the patience.

The game is good, but there are many reasons why I'm giving a 3 star. One being, it is hard to get big, because, first being a glitch with the highscore feature of the game. Let's say people leave a server because they are frustrated, and you are at your highest mass. Eventually, the server will get a countdown to when the server will close. If you are transferred when you are at your highscore, it wont save. This has happened to me twice! I am stuck at 25k, when my highscore should be 50k!

The controls are terrible, you constantly get spawned next to bigger players, and the battle royal mode doesnt even work. It loads for a second and takes you straight back to the main page. Waste of time. Also, every button you press will probably popup an add, 6 things you have to close out of, and then another add. I get you need money, but you dont have to annoy me about it.

title: Modern Ops - Online FPS (Gun Games Shooter)
description:
Clash with other players in new mobile 3D FPS with never-ending fire and shooting action. Modern gun game awaits you!

ACCEPT THE CHALLENGE
Like cool online shooter games? Call your fury and jump into the action and enter the battle strike right now. It‚Äôs totally free to play!
Use different fire strategies and tactics in explosive online games on a variety of maps. 

MAIN FEATURES
‚àö More than 30 modern guns, pistolas and camos. Choose your own online shooting tactics for battle: sniper, shotgun, machine gun or assault rifles
‚àö Up to 10 players in pvp action games
‚àö Join team battles against other players from all over the world to play gun games
‚àö Create your own clan and enjoy team game in various locations playing in squad
‚àö Use Killstreaks such as drone strike, sentry gun and even rocket launcher to make your strategy unique one
‚àö Compete in ranked seasons and get promoted to higher leagues among other players
‚àö Call for your friends and interact with other players, complete contracts and quest missions 
‚àö Intuitive control and easy interface - swipe, aim and shoot
‚àö Perfect optimization
‚àö Regular updates and new cool game elements

EXCITING GAMEPLAY
Modern Ops Black Squad is competitive free FPS shooters with easy and intuitive controls, vivid 3D graphics and exciting gameplay.
Accomplish your duty and play as counter-terrorists or become brutal and choose bandits. Show your fire and combat skills in our free multiplayer first person shooter. 

FREQUENT PROGRESS
Buy different ammo, weapons and upgrade them. –°hange the look of your weapon skins. 

Make a frag progress to be pro in our mobile shooting game.

Follow us:
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Modern_Ops/
Watch our videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtVNQDXXPifEsXpYilxVWcA

comments: Being from a place with a lower ping rate, this game is awesome. It allows me to play and be competitive. I love it, until today. I noticed in the arms race, that after I kill enemies and level up, the new gun will fire but the enemies are not getting hit, and my ammo count stays the same, and won't go down, but they can shoot me. I have to die, and respawn for the gun to work. Now, in any mode, I cant shoot, even after I respawn. But the enemy can shoot me.

so far it's a really easy game, being straightforward. you can watch ads to get double rewards at the end of your game matches. when you get promoted you also can watch a video for a reward. free crates are a video. and gifts are a video. most videos are 30 seconds, and some are less than that. i noticed the longer the video the better the reward from my experience. not bad. I've been doing pretty good so far as a first time user of this game.

Great game but so many bugs. The game comes up with 'error' message so many times in the middle of a match and disconnects. I can shoot someone repeatedly in the head and nothing happens, they shoot me in the body once and I'm dead. I'll have 16 bullets, for example, left in a clip but it's my spare clip and it refuses to let me reload. Fix your game guys and I'll change to 5 stars Edit: My Internet is perfectly fine, I'm on mobile.

Great game, Graphically along side the physics engine makes this game look stunning. It is graphically better then cod mobile however it has a few limitations in comparison but still deserves 5 stars as a game. Smooth, fast and many vatious ways to upgrade. It doesn't throw up a million adds and constantly ask for money. You can upgrade with game play and earn rewards. Great game guys, thanks.

I think that Modern Ops is the more superior fire strike because the money you get in FS is miniscule compared to Modern Ops 500. I think that the upgrade system is way better than the FS upgrade system. The only thing that I what is the bots to be better because they basically just give th opposing team points. But sometimes I'll get a full group of real players and it makes it a real challenge.

title: Truck Driver City Crush
description:
Play free gangster action. The city of sins cannot be changed. Here everyone is for himself. All residents of the city want profit. You are not an exception. You arrived in this city with the goal of earning money using your abilities. You are a great car thief. Your specialty is car theft. The criminal world is full of competition. Criminal clans control the streets of the city. You will have to try and conquer your territory. Show the rest of the gangsters that you are your man and you need to be respected. Test your abilities in a fascinating 3D car thief simulator. Get a unique gaming experience in a third-person shooter. Are you capable of becoming one of the inhabitants of this dangerous city. An open 3D world challenges you. The southern metropolis is full of dangers and exciting adventures that await you.

Complete the main game missions to gain experience and resources in the most effective way. Before missions, make sure that you have enough rounds for your gun. You must have a full bar of health and stamina. All this will help you in street fights. You can double the mission reward if you wish. Track important tasks through a mini map of the city. Tasks are marked with special icons.
You can just have fun in the city. Arrange races around the city on various vehicles. Shoot down fences, barrels, boxes, traffic lights, lampposts and much more. Explore the ships standing in the bay who knows what secrets you will find in them. Try to capture one of the military bases. If the task is up to you, then you will receive good rewards.

Chase your favorite car or motorcycle. Take part in street shootings. Protect your area from other gangs. Get away from police harassment.

Find chests scattered around the city and take rewards from them. Shoot the chests to open the castle. Find other useful items scattered around the city. Get free crystals as soon as you see an ad in the game.

Upgrade your kid to always be the best. Dexterity, Accuracy, Stamina and Strength. These options still provide a major advantage. You will also need the ability to handle weapons and the ability to drive various vehicles.

Game achievements will help you remember to pump in the right direction. Get achievements and rewards for them.

The game is made on an improved version of the game engine. Game mechanics have become more thoughtful, dynamic and realistic. Improved traffic system and NPC. The game has been optimized. This will allow you to comfortably play both on the phone and on the tablet. You will be able to choose the game quality settings for the performance of your device. A well-thought-out interface, a hint system and training lessons will allow you to better understand the weight. Take the beginner course at the beginning of the game. Understand the movement system, the firing system, the street fight system, and driving. This will allow you to start passing missions quickly.

The game has a large store of goods for your gangster. Get cool things and learn how to use them. Do not miss the discounts on some products. A clothing store, an outfit and protective equipment store, an arms store are all at your disposal.

You can purchase vehicles for any tasks:
Bicycle - ride around the city without haste, looking at interesting places and perform tricks.
Sports car - drive at high speeds is the fastest way to move around the city.
Powerful truck - perfectly protect you from city bullets. With it you can break any barriers.
Airplane - fly over the city, perform dangerous maneuvers and land from the plane to the right places.
A combat helicopter is a formidable weapon. Allows you to penetrate all protected places and eliminate opponents.

We are glad that you are interested in the free game Truck Driver City Crush. The Naxeex team will develop the game by constantly releasing updates.

comments: Good concept. Really sounded cool when I looked at it. But there's just major problems. There are only about 10 levels and then they continue to repeat so the maps get boring very fast. Also the AI is way to easy, if your looking for a challenge I dont recommend this game. But if your looking for something to just play when you havent in a while. I guess this fits that.

Great concept and idea but please can you change the locations sometimes. And possibly every 10 or 25 levels. You can have a giant boss battle. There is so much potential in this game and its wasted by a money grab and repetitive levels. It's the same 10 levels each time. C'mon. You can at least add different colour characters with different powers and abilities. Please act on this.

The reason why I am giving it a 4-star because it vibrates a lot and it annoys me sometimes......... But still I love this game...there are not many adds in my opinion..... Hope u notice this.... And ppl who gave it less than 4-star don't know how to play this game....hope u fix my problem.... Thanks for giving me your precious time.....

Too easy and repetitive. Make the opponent faster and it's movements better. Vary the levels to more than 10. Preferably 20-30 and make the platform bigger in some and maybe include traps. Maybe add some boss levels in between for a challenge. Add some more characters, equipment (gloves) and enemies with different abilities to make the game exciting since people usually enjoy games that has "collectibles".

Every few levels are the same just colored different. This game is just out there to draw up ad revenue or to get you to pay to remove ads. You can beat every level with a 1 2 combo in the beginning. It's boring and this is why mobile gaming is dead.

title: World War Heroes: WW2 FPS
description:
WORLD WAR HEROES
Battle players from around the world in crazy WWII-era online combat! 
Destroy the enemy and survive vicious tank battles in the center of Berlin and other cities.
Participate in team and deathmatch battles, and plant bombs and defend them.

Why you'll love World War Heroes:
‚úØ 7 legendary WWII battle zones!
‚úØ 4 types of combat equipment from the USA, USSR, Japan and Germany!
‚úØ 6 game modes and Custom Games where you make your own rules!
‚úØ Operate your own tank! 
‚úØ 57 unique weapon types: pistols, rifles, machine guns, shotguns and more!

Rules of war: 

‚úØ Team deathmatch! 
Two teams fight for domination. The team with the highest score at the end of the round wins;

‚úØ Death match! 
Free fight for all. You fight for yourself. Player with the highest score wins the round;

‚úØ Point capture! 
Both teams capture points on the map that give them battle points. The team with the highest score wins the round;

‚úØ HQ defence! 
Each team must protect their own headquarters and destroy the enemy one;

‚úØ Bomb mode! 
One team should bring and plant a bomb at the indicated point, the other team must prevent it;

‚úØ Team battle! 
Two teams fight each other with no respawns. The team which has at least one member alive wins;

‚úØ Custom mode! 
Your game - your rules! Create a lobby, invite friends and enjoy the battle!


‚úØ‚úØ‚úØ HUGE ARSENAL OF WEAPONS! ‚úØ‚úØ‚úØ 
All sorts of new weapons will be available to help your team come out on top. Use the whole arsenal, featuring machine guns, grenades, rifles, sniper rifles, bazookas, etc.

‚úØ‚úØ‚úØ AMAZING GRAPHICS AND OPTIMIZATION! ‚úØ‚úØ‚úØ 
Dive into online combat with crisp graphics and intuitive controls.

‚úØ‚úØ‚úØ UPGRADE ARMOR AND WEAPONS! ‚úØ‚úØ‚úØ
Build your dream arsenal by upgrading damage and max ammo and decreasing kickback and reload time

‚úØ‚úØ‚úØ DAILY REWARDS! ‚úØ‚úØ‚úØ
Play every day to earn free prizes and get daily tasks and tons of free stuff!
Complete daily tasks and upgrade your gear!

The game is specially optimized to work on both strong and weaker devices!
Absolutely free to download!
GOOD LUCK, SOLDIER! 

========================
OUR COMMUNITIES:
========================
Join our VKontakte group: https://vk.com/worldwarheroes
Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1261472480647068/
Subscribe on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChMfgo6g8ri0FaAR-SpYpXw

comments: The game is good but the weapon level system is crippled, after a few levels into the game is more apparent when you can't land a headshot with a single shot, Is not my 1st Mobile shooter and I know my skills it baffles me that enjoying the game is all about how much money you need to spend on it, when there's games that can do way better. Is not a bad game at all but the currency can't be exchanged even with gold that you have to buy too...it needs a lot of tweeks.

Game play is fun. However, I feel like they don't do a good job of matching up teams, and the fact that it costs so much for decent weapons. Gold rewards should be higher, and weapon costs should be reduced. I shouldn't have to play for 2 years to earn enough gold to purchase a decent weapon. *update* Since posting this things have changed a lot. The crates that cost 5 gold are finally giving me something other than my 5 gold back, matches are more evenly matched as well.

So disappointed! Bought 100 upgrade and only 15 worked. It's just like before only you have to do three at a time now. My gun doesn't shoot at my opponents unless they shoot me first. I used to be one of the top players on this game and I have put so much money into it. Nothing works. Even with all my expensive equipment in the game I stand helpless against any newbie. The only matches I'm able to stay in are five against one to my disadvantage. Uninstalling this application!!!

This game is ECELLENTA! I'm a beginner on first person shoot games. If I can figure out how to operate this, anyone can. This is cool ww2 foot solider combat that puts u in the battle. The graphics are outstanding. I have an older android and have no lag or opr. problems. No ads only when a must. Does not require real money unless u choose. It is a very fair free game. Five stars to developers for desighning a game, that those that can't toss money around, can play. DOWNLOAD THIS A MUST!

Nice graphic and sound. It's not easy to kill enemies but very easy to get killed üòÖ. Buying golds is very expensive. Recently, reward or double reward from watching video ads don't work. It's not rewarding! It needs to be fixed. After update 1.23.2, the game play gets better. Default weapons now can compete with premium one. Kudos üëè. Hopefully Azur will do the same thing to modern strike online ü§û.

title: War Machines: Tank Battle - Army & Military Games
description:
Choose your war tank, battle the enemy army and win the world war! 
War Machines is the best free army game! Enter this world of epic battles and powerful tanks in realtime action against other top army stars. This military game is designed for the stars who love world war and battle games.

Battle tanks from all around the world, use your military tank to win the war, become the best tank commander in the world of battle stars.

FAST PACED SHOOTING GAME
3 minute action is what your tank has to shoot down as many tanks as you can in battle to win the war against world top stars. 

DEFEND YOUR COUNTRY'S ARMY
Defend the honor of your country against army and tanks from foreign lands. Battle stars tanks from China, USA, Russia, Japan and all the world. A world of tanks in combat!

TWO EXPLOSIVE WAR MODES
Battle in team-based military battles or in the free-for-all army war.

ICONIC TANKS
Choose your tank from a wide range of war machines and like in war make decisions to win the battle and be the star. Choose a light tank to fast scout the enemy's territory and provide battle intel. Or take the heaviest of all, the Panzer, and free your military fury on the enemy in this battle world.

EPIC TANK UPGRADES
Unlock epic war tanks and upgrade it to become the star. Show your enemy who you are with tank customization. Are you ready to be the best of army games? Enter this world of war and be the star of your country!

VARIOUS BATTLEFIELDS TO EXPLORE
Battle your enemies in various World War and general wars battlefields: European cities, industrial zones with war robots... Game the battlefield and master your enemy's army like a world war star.

Download now War Machines, the best free battle war game for free! Get your tank ready and battle in this world where only the best stars army survives the war!

comments: This game is really a lot of fun, battle against other people in tanks and try not to be blown up by the other players. Stratagey is a good thing to have when playing to get the jump on others thinking the same thing remember to block yourself from incoming fire and the attacks coming to you. Awesome enough for me to want to play more, and be better to play against. Thanks app developers for a great game, without a lot of ads interrupting our game play.

Fun game, but you shouldn't have to mortgage your house to be able to get a descent tank and ammo! It is expensive enough already and now with latest upgrade they increased their prices on ammo 25%?? I don't think so..... I'm surprised they don't charge people just to log onto the game, but that's probably going to be in the next upgrade! I understand the developers need money to help with expenses and to turn a profit, but this is damn near armed robbery without the gun!! Thanks, but no thanks

Really fun game. I really like the actual game. But.... Im about ready to delete it. Ive had a lot of issues with the game freezing or shutting down completely. Which made me lose fuel,ammo,tank customs,and battles which I spent real money on. Ive Left several messages with support and to this day have not heard from them. Its funny how if you want to buy something with real money it takes 30 seconds to do. But try to get some help or a little reimbursement you hear from anyone for weeks!?ItsBS

it used to be a good fun game but basically now unless you are paying to play! all you are is target practice for the people who are paying for the best upgrades! and best tanks! so if you want to get in a bad mood! within 3 minutes! it's a great game to play! as you will just die die and die! so sad as I used to like this game so much! but now I just find it impossible, to think I've wasted so much time upgrading my tank spending millions on upgrades! Just to die always! game keeps glitchin?

It constantly freezes and then you lose energy for having to restart. The game's targetting system is pretty unrealistic, for instance there have been many side shots that count for critical hits and vice versa. The biggest problem with the targetting is that you can drive behind a house and if the other tank is quick enough and was targetting you it can still hit you even out of sight. As far as I can tell the developers have made no effort to improve the game, yet they make it more P2P.

comments: I really dig this game... The physics are outstanding, the levels aren't difficult but are still engaging and there is something very satisfying about shooting these bobbleheaded bad guys in the face. I love the macabre moments such as when you've just pinned a guy to a wall and he's hanging there with his head spinning, eyes wide, as though he can't fathom what just happened to him. For me, the only thing that keeps it from 5 stars is the limited variety of levels... Overall, very enjoyable.

After playing the game for about 20 minutes, I closed it and came back later. I played again and was starting to like it. That was it, it wouldn't work after that. I uninstalled it several times and it doesn't work at all. NOTE TO DEV: This is one way Google punishes device users for disabling as many useless apps of the 100 or so that come installed on new phones. They f* over the map app and games and phone calls and everything and YOU pay them to use your own game against yourself.

I play a few levels now and it gets real choppy. 9/11/20 Now, seeing as how you never responded to my first review, I'll say this. The game is still choppy after I play about 6 levels and now the special arrow you get after beating 5 level by watching an ad - that does not work. It works like 1/4 of the time and I'm tired of it. I found a way to fix that now and it's called UNINSTALL!!!!!!

Very easy to shoot. Lots of levels. About two hundred or more. It's fun to Play plus it also pass the time. It will make you,but have to stay on your toes. The developer's did an excellent job in developing this App.

This gane is so much interesting and very much amusing.I like its moves,skills,throwing arrow in a specific target was really awesome.But when we overcome & complete each level ,it becomes tough & difficult to overcome.Bcoz when hit a enemy with given arrows then it fails to maintain the direction of a target in a right way.That's why rated 4 stars.üòçüòäüòéüòÄ!!!!!

title: Stickman Warriors - Super Dragon Shadow Fight
description:
Stickman Warriors - Super Dragon Shadow Fight best fighting action role-playing game on Google Play.

This fighting game will give you a chance to become one of dbz heroes to fight z with enemies and protect everybody on earth. Enter into the arena and fight for the survival. If you love playing games then this is the game which will amaze you with the swift handling and amazing features.

With addictive gameplay z fighters, your enemies will upgrade their power and you have to fight for survival. To fight against the most DB Boss likes Ninja Black, Big Thunder lizards..., the shadow stick z fighter may need to upgrade your power to the highest level. We bet you will enjoy the abundant upgrades for and all your stickman heroes in the best action RPG fighting game.


HOW TO PLAY

Stick Warriors has the most basic control ever! you just need to dodge, jump, power your ki, become ultra instinct and Z warriors super Hero fight against invaders. Use ultimate power, ultra shooting ball skill will be kill all invaders in shadow.

FEATURES

- 100+ stickman fighter characters with unique design style and special skill of each
- Story mode: Over than 144+ levels in story mode that help you collect stickman fighter characters more quickly. The maps in Stick Warriors be continuously updated, graphics transformation super ssj z on each other maps only in dbgt fight!
- Versus mode: Face your favorite opponent head-on in an one-on-one battle. The winner will be decided after 3 rounds.
- Tournament: 16 finest warriors were chosen to fight in the tournament. Defeat any person may come in your way to reach the ultimate glory as the new champion.
- Training mode: Prepare yourself for a new journey. Here, you can practice fighting skills and try out new characters. There's no limit on time so you can fight with the dummy as long as you want.
- Upgrade and unlock over 100+ unique special moves for each fighter.
- Stick Warriors super saiyan has the most basic control ever!
- Ultra instinct characters.
- Easy and Simple to play.
- Cool transform Saiyanz.
- Collect these kinds of super fighters: dragon ssj2, z ssj3, ssj4, ultra instinct (ui), xeno... to become strongest stick warrior.

Download the game now and join millions of players around the world and start your journey in Stickman Warriors - Super Dragon Shadow Fight!

comments: Game is fun at first good job guys. If u wanna keep intrest break it up with some bonus rounds with targets and distance objectives. Also would like to drop the ball on like picnics and groups of people and make them scatter. Hope u like the input. Will look for new stuff in the future.

This game is entertaining and a good time waster. There is an issue where particular ads are displayed that allow no way for the user to close out of them even when watching the entire ad. This essentially makes the game unplayable once this one particular ad displays. Hope this gets fixed otherwise it is a good game.

The game use to be alright but every time I kick the ball and it bounces the first time,it goes backwards and causes me to lose a huge distance. Makes me not even wanna play anymore,cause what's the point if I can't move forward.

Could be a nice time waster, just too many ads :/ open up the app you greeted with a 5 second, play the game there's an ad on the bottom, ball stop get your record and then another 5 second ad. I get that the creator has to make some money but geez. That's the reason I unistalled.

Well for starters 5 kicks in a row with ads....good God almighty. Then when you upgrade you are basically penalized because you may hit a building over and over until enough money to upgrade again, but what now you hit the boat. Hitting it dead center also does nothing for actually making progress

title: Rocket Royale
description:
Rocket Royale is one of a kind Battle Royale game, the main goal is to build a Rocket and fly away from the island! To do this you need to find crafting resources from falling meteors. Of course other players will want to hijack your rocket, so defend it! Collect wood and Build a Fort to defend your positions. The unique battle royale game reveals a lot of tactics by crafting and building covers around you! 100% destructible environment, every building can be destroyed or dismantled! Rocket Rocket Royale has no parachutes or shrinking dead zones, but you can use portals to navigate your way around the island instead.

Rocket Royale multiplayer offers Solo, Duo and Squad up to 3 players per team. All players are real people online, no fake bots! There is a lot of content to discover: characters, hammers, avatars, custom rockets, even dances! Progress by gaining XP and levelling up and compete in global Leaderboards!

The game requires less than 100 MB without additional downloads, and very well optimized for low-end devices!

Features:
- Unique Rocket Battle Royale gameplay.
- Everything is destructible! Real Sandbox mode. 
- Craft Defenses, Forts, Towers, Sky Bridges, anything possible!
- Real-time fast-paced 25-Players online matches!
- Play with your friends online, connect to your friend game via friend list.
- Highest FPS (frames-per-second) you can get!
- Tons of items and weapons to loot!
- Large open world battlefield.

Are you ready to be creative, act smart and cause massive destruction? Welcome to Rocket Royale!


Here is the promo code for a free reward: XXXYYZZZ
Join us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/groups/rocketroyale/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GameSpire_org

title: Sniper Arena: PvP Army Shooter
description:
Sniper! Enter the arena and become the #1 SHARPSHOOTER in this thrilling ‚Äòsniper vs. sniper‚Äô LIVE COMBAT game! Compete against more than 500K SNIPERS worldwide, climb the leaderboard, and ENJOY EVERY BATTLE in this premier mobile experience! Feel the pure adrenaline rush, and lifelike combat emotions in the heat of the battlefield, right in your hands on your mobile screen. Jump into the action and join the battle right away, it‚Äôs FREE TO PLAY!

‚Ä¢ Enjoy breathtaking 3D GRAPHICS: the world‚Äôs best SNIPER RIFLES, superbly realistic and authentic in every little detail, and 4 spectacular combat locations with authentic sniper firing positions, beautifully designed in terms of game logic and the balance.

‚Ä¢ Try intuitively easy controls - SWIPE, ZOOM, SHOOT! Compete in 3 game modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Domination with up to 8 real opponents on the map, whoever shoots the most enemies wins the round.

‚Ä¢ Develop your SNIPER CAREER, from recruit all the way to the rank of Phantom, with a variety of daily tasks and a detailed ranking system. Unlock and upgrade modern PROFESSIONAL EQUIPMENT: sniper rifles, ammunition, camouflage and special equipment.

‚Ä¢ Ally with your friends and create an UNSTOPPABLE SQUAD! Lead them to the top of the leaderboard, defeat other teams and win territories in Domination mode.

This game requires stable INTERNET CONNECTION to play. The gameplay involves real-time online match ups with players across the globe, shared server for any mobile device, and LIVE-CHAT.

For more info and all the latest news check out: https://www.facebook.com/SniperArenaGame/

comments: Sniper Arena is a really awesome and fun game to play. I've had loads of adrenaline pumping fun. But I've unfortunately advanced to a point in the game where it is impossible to win a round. Or too not die as quickly as I respawn. I advanced to my current rank very quickly and the game has awarded me well for my gameplay. But I can no longer advance because I can't afford to pay money to keep up with the Elite players

At the beginning it was okay because I believed that there are other individuals who are online playing but I've found that the chatrooms are fake , every single person is playing with robots, and the scores for each game is completely made up and they are not real. If you don't buy anything from them for your game to upgrade you can't continue playing. .

There is little time to get all enemy, no indication where enemy is, there is no stability of the gun while in hand, no one is that unstable, it's not real life action holding it. The game is based on snipers having the opportunity to kill one another, so why are they getting hit so many times bleeding out and recovering?

Game is awesome and I have had some great memories and built some friendships with some of the squad mates ive been fortunate enough to have played with and met. It is a game that does cost some money to compete and gain supplies to keep up with the players that have played and are elite on the game. But one of the games that is hardest to put down and not want to play again instantly. Love it we shoot on American server RA'SALGHUL is our squad come try it out with us or against us its all fun

Europe Server was a good idea. Started same sqaud from EW.100,000 gems right away. Update is an improvement but duel boxes and elite boxes are still NOT random. Also penalties for success to go away. Thats why only 3 stars. One more thing. Advise people after update about the minimum processor you need after updating. I have one android that has a 680 snapdragon. It works fair. Lenovo 10? No way too shakey and laggy. Ipad mini and above and iphone 7and up. New phone out called Red Magic

descriptionHTML:
This is fps online shooter with different modes: sandbox, team fight and battle royale.
Player can spawn many types on building objects, transport and facilities for the construction of bases and new maps. Passengers can board cars and helicopters. A variety of weapons and maps, more than 30 guns and 12 maps provides a fun gameplay.
summary: Online sandbox and shooter, team fight, classic and team battle royale modes
recentChanges: Performance optimisation, bugfix.

title: Stumble Guys: Multiplayer Royale
description:
Stumble Guys: Multiplayer Royale 

Stumble Guys is a massively multiplayer party knockout game with up to 32 players online intention to struggle through levels round after round of escalating chaos, until one victor remains! If you fall, just start again and run. Join the endless running fun!

Dive into a series of ridiculous challenges and bizarre obstacles, knock down your rivals and overcome everything to win! So, are you ready to get totally wipe out? Download Stumble Guys the ultimate knockout game now and take a part of this ultimate madness. Invite your dudes also and beat them all!

Fun Features

‚Ä¢ Run & Dash & Slide past opponents
‚Ä¢ Dodge oncoming obstacles
‚Ä¢ Battle Royale real multiplayer
‚Ä¢ Colorful and crazy in design
‚Ä¢ Comically Physical
‚Ä¢ Many customization options
‚Ä¢ Tons of hilarious fails
‚Ä¢ Lots of different levels

Don't Fall, Knockout Foes, Win and Be the champion!

NOTE: game is still early stage so stay tuned we will update regularly. Our goal is to create 1 new level every week! Latest added level is Honey Drop where the hexagon honeycombs drop dangerously. This is not an easy game, do you have what it takes to win?

comments: Thus is one of the best game I found on play store. These are the points I like:- 1) Not so much big in size. üëç 2) Can work low end devices too. üëå 3) Can work on cellular data Wi-Fi is not compulsory. 4) Giving regular updates. üòé Now these are the point which can be improved:-üôè 1) Sometimes not able to create party room and not able to join matches . 2) Shows network connection problems in between match or after match even I have good Wi-Fi connection with fast internet speed.

This is the best fall guys clone I have played so far. Some problems, like disconnecting in game, and lag problems from another server country. Also, please add some more custom minigames, new skins, or maybe some seasonal events. I would rate this 5 stars, but with the problems and the lack of other things, I gave it 4 stars for now. I enjoyed the game, I had fun, and hopefully the game will be even better in the future.

The game is good,when we play with our friends. But there is no option to spectate other players after being eliminated, which is a huge drawback, when we are playing with friends. If that option is also added,this indeed is a time killing game I am editing my review and adding 2 more stars to make it 5. So happy to know that you have added the ability to spectate the entire match. The option to audio call would also be a nice addition to the game, hope the game reaches trending #1!!!!!!!

Really good game and I was waiting for a game like fall guys and if you too are waiting then this is almost like fall guys only. This game has multiplayer and that is a really plus point. We can add our friends as many as we want . But just because of one thing I gave it 4 stars because it get automatically stop many time that is a bug that you should fix at the earliest

It is a really good game! but Im kinda hoping that you will add this features like we can customize our characters skin color so its not that confusing when we're in game because all of us has the same skin. its hard to see which is my character when we're crowded. I really hope that you will add it to the next update.

title: Real Gangster Crime
description:
Welcome to the ghetto gangster real life simulator. The criminal world will always exist, these are the rules of the game. In this free game you have to try to go a long and thorny path to the pinnacle of success. The price of success in this underground world is very high, few can reach the top. Try your skills in an exciting 3D third-person shooter with RPG elements and plunge into the atmosphere of street life in an open 3D world. You are waiting for daily action throughout the big city. A dangerous and fascinating world in which harsh laws apply will appear before you in all its glory. If you are ready to test yourself - then go ahead, show everyone who is a real gangster in this city, eliminate all fake competitors and call a big underground empire yourself.

HUGE MODERN CITY
The plot of the game takes place in a large modern city surrounded by ghetto areas. Tall skyscrapers and luxurious life make this city an oasis in the desert. This sinful city never sleeps and attracts with its lights all who dare to challenge the stone jungle. Try your hand at this exciting adventure to success and glory.

EXCITING QUESTS
Exciting assignments are waiting for you to get the necessary game resources that will be useful to you for more serious tasks. You will encounter a harsh street life where everyone is for himself. The streets of the city constantly require concentration, as crazy bullets can fly here or gangs wage war with large-scale shootings. Passing interesting quests you better know who and how rules this city.

RICH ARSENAL
At your disposal will be a rich arsenal with which you will not get bored. Cool and pumped things will help you through the game. Improve your skills in agility, stamina, control equipment and weapons. In the weapons store you will find a wide selection. There are things for every taste. Starting from the smallest knife to a powerful machine gun with which you need to be able to handle. You can arm yourself to the maximum, no one will stop you.

BE COOL
Customize your character, making his image unique because this is your virtual warrior and he should look stylish. You can constantly change the image of your hero. At your service a large clothing store for the character. In the store you will find hats, baseball caps, masks, glasses, funny costumes, wigs, stylish shoes, shirts and much more. Various items of clothing increase your hero's health, agility, or stamina. Some things open up extra superpowers.

REMEDIES
In the store you can buy a first-aid kit and body armor. Also, these useful things can be found on the streets of the city or taken away from enemies. Stock up on protection and restoration of health in advance, this will help you withstand the battle.

TRANSPORT
The game has a large number of different cars. Ordinary city cars, sports cars, SUVs, unique tuned cars, SCI-FI car. In the store you will find powerful motorcycles, they will allow you to easily get away from the pursuit. A powerful and heavily armed tank is waiting for you, the tank is the most effective tool in the game, no one will stop you with it. A combat helicopter will allow you to attack any targets, covert movement and sudden attacks - this is a small part of how you can use a helicopter.

On the city map in large numbers are free game resources such as a first aid kit, ammo, weapons, money, all you need is to find them.

This free game offers a whole amusement park, explore the city and find interesting activities. You can also just drive around the city by car and listen to music.
Go ahead for the adventure!

title: Marvel Contest of Champions
description:
Prepare for epic versus-fighting action with your favorite Marvel Super Heroes & Super Villains in the ultimate cosmic showdown! Spider-Man, Iron Man, Wolverine & more await your summons to battle! Assemble a team & begin your quest to become the Ultimate Marvel Champion!

WELCOME TO THE CONTEST:
Captain America vs. Iron Man! Hulk vs. Wolverine! Spider-Man vs. Deadpool! The greatest battles in Marvel history are in your hands! The greedy Elder of the Universe known as The Collector has summoned you to a brawl of epic proportions against a line-up of vile villains including Thanos, Kang the Conqueror, and many more! Experience the ultimate free-to-play fighting game on your mobile device‚Ä¶Marvel Contest of Champions!
 
SUIT UP WITH FRIENDS:
‚Ä¢ Team up with your friends and other Summoners to build the strongest Alliance
‚Ä¢ Strategize with your alliance, help them keep their Champions in the fight
‚Ä¢ Battle to the top in Alliance Events and take on Alliance Quest Series together in specially designed quest maps to earn exclusive Alliance rewards
‚Ä¢ Test your Alliance‚Äôs mettle by battling it out with Alliances from around the world in Alliance Wars!
 
BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM OF CHAMPIONS:
‚Ä¢ Assemble a mighty team of heroes and villains (choosing Champions such as: Iron Man, Hulk, Wolverine, Storm, Star-Lord, Gamora, Spider-Man, Deadpool, Magneto and Winter Soldier)
‚Ä¢ Embark on quests to defeat Kang and Thanos and face the challenge of a mysterious new super powerful cosmic competitor, ultimately to prevent the total destruction of The Marvel Universe
‚Ä¢ Improve your team‚Äôs offense and defense with multiple Mastery trees
 
COLLECT THE MIGHTIEST SUPER HEROES (AND VILLAINS!):
‚Ä¢ Collect, level up, and manage your teams of heroes and villains wisely to receive synergy bonuses based upon team affiliation and relationships taken from the pages of Marvel Comics
‚Ä¢ Pairing up Black Panther and Storm or Cyclops and Wolverine for bonuses, or making a team of Guardians of the Galaxy for a team affiliation bonus
‚Ä¢ The more powerful the Champion, the better their stats, abilities and special moves will be
‚Ä¢ New Champions are being added to The Contest all the time!
 
QUEST AND BATTLE:
‚Ä¢ Journey through an exciting storyline in classic Marvel storytelling fashion
‚Ä¢ Fight it out with a huge array of heroes and villains in iconic locations spanning the Marvel Universe such as: Avengers Tower, Oscorp, The Kyln, Wakanda, The Savage Land, Asgard, the S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier, and more!
‚Ä¢ Explore dynamic quest maps and engage in a healthy dose of action-packed fighting utilizing controls developed specifically for the mobile platform
 
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MarvelContestofChampions
Subscribe on YouTube: www.youtube.com/MarvelChampions
Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/MarvelChampions
Follow us on Instagram: www.instagram.com/marvelchampions
www.playcontestofchampions.com

TERMS OF SERVICE:
Please read this Terms of Service Agreement and our Privacy Notice before using our services as they govern the relationship between you and Kabam.

www.kabam.com/terms-of-service/
www.kabam.com/privacy-notice/

comments: One of the most addictive games I have ever played! 11/13/20 - In the past year have seen the game become slower every time it connects to the servers. In the past 2 month, I randomly disconnected, shown the "no connection" symbol even though I have perfect network connection on all other phone applications/games. And, worst of all, when starting the app, the no connection symbol is shown and the game never connects. Again, when that happend I am still able to connect to the internet, no issues.

This is game, to me, is like no other marvel game. It is a good amount of time to load and i love that it updates once every month bringing new champions to play with. I love the fact that it has been running for about 6 years now and it seems like it will keep going for many more years. I play this game every single day and enjoy every second of it. One of the things i like about it is knowing that it has many challenges to get past and tasks to complete for rewards but it also has a sort of practice in arena. It allows you to battle other players and take a look at other battle styles that players like to use and find a way to win. It is a great game of strategy and to socialize more. This game is great in so many ways and i hope it can give me many many many more reasons to play this game and to love it. I would definitely give this review 100 stars rating if i could but for now, it gets a 5/5 star rating from me. Keep up the good work kabam

I've been having problems with this game for a few days now. Every time I open up the game, it takes a while to get it loaded up. Then it finally opens, it freezes. Even when I'm opening crystals and when I'm trying to fight, it freezes up. And I do have a strong connection to the internet, and it still freezes up. So please try to fix this problem. I love the game, but can't stand the slowness and freezing. I've been playing this game ever since it came out.

There are A lot of glitches in the game. Even when I have a very good and strong wifi connection it does not even open. The game says no internet connection scince27/08/2020. A few days ago it was my favourite game but now it is comming down. And another gact is that we have to spend real money(that too a lot) to survive this game. The premium hero crystls are trash. This is my message to kabam... Please do not be lazy and fix all the problems. It is a very good game and has a lot of potential.

Great game, I have been playing for over a year. Lately they've been having a lot of server issues. It has many stories if you feel like paying attention, almost like having a gaming comic. Buying in game stuff may be tempting but is REALLY unneeded with some exceptions. The community is pretty great, if you're looking for gaming friends being in an alliance is like having a disfunctional family. Pretty great team based game. It ALWAYS has new monthly content.

title: Police Officer
description:
Bad boys! Bad boys! What you gonna do when they come for you?

Become an enforcer of the law in this fun 3D police simulator. You‚Äôve seen cops do it and now it is your turn to get in on the fun. From high-stakes hostage negotiations, to routine traffic stops. If you‚Äôve ever wondered what it might be like to be a police officer then this is the game for you! 

Ever wanted to chase down bad guys in your own police cruiser? We got that! Want to test your aim in the shooting range or investigate crimes CSI style? We got that too! If you‚Äôve seen cops do it, we have it! With so much Police action packed into one game, you‚Äôll never want to put it down. 
 
 Game Features:
1.       Fun for everyone! 
From routine traffic stops, to dispatch, to SWAT team missions there‚Äôs guaranteed to be a game for you!  

2.       Great Graphics!
Take on the role of a police officer in stunning 3d! 

3.       Get Promoted!
Enforce the law, and make you way up the ranks, maybe one day they‚Äôll call you Chief! 

4.       Relax and enjoy! 
Simple mechanics make it easy to pick up and play, you won‚Äôt have to go to the police academy to be the best cop here! 


Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

From the Studio that brought you Mr. Bullet, Happy Glass, Ink Inc and Love Balls!

Follow us to get news and updates on our other Award Winning titles;

Meh, the game is ok, gets boring after a certain amount of time gotta give this game a 2 star because of that problem and wayyyyyyy too many ads like come on
This game is absolutely awful an ad every single task with is less than 30 seconds it was an awful experience playing this had it for less than 5 minutes
Well I wish it was playable and I wish we didnt get offer's like 5,000 dollars but its free if you watch an ad, I don't want to watch ads to get things. I'm uninstalling
This game is awful my little brother plays this garbage there is SO MANY ADS its so bad becuase of the ads this game could have had a pontential to be a good game but NO Ads had to come in.

title: Sniper Zombies: Offline Games 3D
description:
Get ready for a new stunning shooting game, the amazing combination of zombie game and sniper game!

From VNG Game Studio - author of a lot of successful zombie games - first person shooter (FPS) such as Dead Target, Zombie Hunter, downloaded by more than 100 Million players around the world. Now Sniper Zombies with more addictive features, entertaining missions and realistic graphics is available!

Download and play this great time killer shooting game and enjoy its smooth and simple controls. If you are a fan of not only zombie games but also sniper games, we got what you need.

Sniper zombies is an offline game, you can play this shooting game offline and without wifi connection. Welcome to the world of snipers and zombies, where you are going to explore tons of sniper guns 3D and different varieties of zombies.

Guard the entrance in shooting games
You will become a sniper and protect others who are completing their missions in this sniper game.
The scavenger team is returning and being chased by a horde of zombies. You need to eliminate them and protect our comrades. The dead are coming very close, shoot them before they kill people.

Sniper Games Offline- Daily mission
You can try a new sniper rifle everyday and complete different missions. Let‚Äôs see the way you wipe out mad zombies with those strong guns. The rewards for daily missions in this zombie game are very valuable, and they‚Äôre totally free, don‚Äôt miss a chance to earn them everyday. 

Shooting game - Main mission
Kill all zombies and crime with your powerful sniper rifle, receive the rewards whenever you complete a mission to unlock or upgrade your awesome sniper guns and enjoy the exciting adventure in each region.  

Stunning Zombie Games Graphics:
This offline game provides the most realistic and stunning graphics that you can‚Äôt experience in other zombie games! This sniper offline game with very huge maps, 3d zombie models and sniper guns will give you a feeling that other zombie games can not..

 Free Offline Games
This sniper game is the best offline game 3D that you should play. No wifi needed, you can shoot zombies whenever you want. That makes Sniper Zombies - Shooting Games a great time killer game for your phone or tablet. And this zombie shooting game is free, one of the outstanding games that don't need wifi and sniper games in 2020.

Sniper game features:
- Addictive zombie shooting gameplay, offline and without wifi
- Powerful weapons - sniper rifle, shotgun and more. Unlock awesome guns and upgrade them                                                                                                                                                                                                  in the arsenal
- Multiple, immersive environments ‚Äî discover different dead regions, from big city to prison
- Shooting zombies anywhere and anytime, this sniper game doesn‚Äôt require you to be always online. 
- Hundreds of missions to experience in the best zombie game

The difference of this sniper game compared to other sniper games is precisely because this game throws you into the gruesome world of the zombie apocalypse. You need to protect your area and people from a horde of zombies. Each day can be your last day on earth, do whatever you need, aim yourself and hunt down the dead without a mistake when playing this zombie game.

Your targets are the dead zombies and your opponent. Take aim at the target and fire! You don‚Äôt have a second chance to take it again. Become #1 silent assassin in ultimate 3D sniper games! Shoot and save the world!

Enjoy this attractive FPS zombie shooting game of VNG!

comments: Game is well put together... But I am spending big money without big rewards. I haven't found anything that explains how to play this game, also if rifles from say region 7 or 8 will work in say region 5 or 6? I have one of the most powerful sniper rifles in the world in the "BarrettM82 .50 caliber sniper rifle", but I couldn't even finish Cairo? This rifle should be able to go through the entire game up to Tokyo? But it only has an "Attack" value of 1480/1480 maxed out which also costs money to obtain? I don't mind spending a reasonable amount of money but this is getting ridiculously expensive. I am interested in a Season Pass. But I don't know what will happen when I either pay 1500 or 3000 bars of gold? For instance if I were to pay the 3000 bars of Gold will I be able to obtain everything in the small pictures? The suit of armor, it shows 3 rifles in the small pictures, what rifles will I receive? Is there a sniper rifle, shot gun and rifle? After all the money I have spent so far I am kind of leery. Can you please help me out with the proper information about your game. So I can intelligently navigate your Sniper Zombie game. I have spent monies not knowing what I needed to even complete a region in the game. Because I have no information on how to play the game properly. I would like to raise this rating to 5 stars but at the moment I feel I have been mislead and my monies taken from me frivolously. Thank you for your time... Best Regards f m

Mildly amusing for the first two areas by level three they start randomly making you compensate for windage and by level four the windage is so unpredictable and extreme, that when I entered it into a real ballistics calculator, the wind seems to be varying from 300 to 1,000 miles per hour. At this point, the game just turns into pay to play.

The app is decently put together and ok to kill time with. Ive never played this game before and went to the trial subscriptions and per your terms I shouldnt have been charged if canceled in the trial period, but thats not what happened and its after 48 hours so I have to deal with the developer isnt of Google to get a refund since you charged me immediately from the get go... *update* You directed me to contact Google which is directly in contradiction to Google policies... way to not read

The game was fun at first but right away started to notice little cheat methods they use such as when i play the global pandemic when you shot the machine gun you start shooting upward instead of in the direction of the zombies. It makes it a lot harder to shoot . Dont waist your time. All they gonna do is tell you sorry for the blah blah blah. Time for this app to go

Hi.... I really liked this game at first but here's a crazy thought.... why don't you take a sec and fix ALL the glitches.... like no sound at all, actually putting an assassin to stop in level 28 Venice, making enemy targets accessible to be shot instead of hiding behind things out of sight, having outlandish prices for upgrades that require watching countless advertisements for minimal gold or wanting people to pay to upgrade weapons.... freaking sad....ü§¨

title: Hurricane Superhero : Wind Tornado Vegas Mafia
description:
You play as a superhero and whole city fears you. You will fight various star mafia gangsters from America, Russia, China, Mexico, Japan etc. The style of city is similar to Miami of Las Vegas but actualy it's New York. Become a chief on the streets of criminality in town. You control superpowers that can call tornado and storm. You can shoot lighting beams from your hand and you can climb any building in the city. This game is a city simulator in third person view, where you drive a car, motorbike, airplane etc. Explore the big city, go off-roading in the mountains, steal and drive supercars, shoot from guns and more in this free open world game! Make stunts on a bmx or find an ultimate F-90 tank or devastating battle helicopter.


Do you have enough guts to rise to the top of the criminal piles? Are your ready for great criminal theft adventure? Be ready to rob, kill, shoot and fight! Try out all the supercars and bikes. Stealing cars, evading cops, racing through streets, and shooting down other gangs. You are waiting for the most hotspots of criminality in Vegas disctrict. The game contains fully Open world Environment. You can also buy a lot of things in a shop to help you complete missions and release the city from all mafia sinners. Most of the missions will be on streets, some will be in chinatown district and other gang lands etc.

‚Ä¢ 20 exciting missions
‚Ä¢ 45 different cars - army vehicle models, Helicopter, Air fighter, etc.
‚Ä¢ you can ride on a skateboard
‚Ä¢ Visually stunning, HD quality graphics
‚Ä¢ Arsenal of guns
‚Ä¢ you can play as a hair dresser, taxi driver etc
‚Ä¢ Find futuristic mech robots

comments: This is very good game .I know this is very very very very very good game. this is open world game I like this game so much the tornado power is awesome. the boosters are very good and the flying power .I like. I think you can change the city and some new functions and features in Hurricane superhero wind tornado Vegas Mafia

To be honest I kinda üòïmiss the old version cause it was simple but this makes it complicated üò§ for an example why do I have to increase the heroes power level why not make everyone of them the same level üòì but anyways that's my review üòé

I love this thing. It's like a GTA paradigm. BUT better in the way of superpowers. I'm GOD! And I can cause havoc in many interesting ways. Always room for improvement. Like better AI, more stability, more room for exploring. Mystery items. I'll be waiting for future updates. Keep up the excellent work team.

I rate this game 1 star because the energy get exhausted in just 2 seconds and that's very bad, far to bad. I think the energy should be lasting 15 seconds, if that is done then no problem. Goodbyeü§ó

This game is incredible . I like it very much . My favourite thing is that this game is for all , those who don't want mission they will not get mission , and those who want missions they can get missions . Second thing I want to say is that there are many types of beautiful cars running on the main road , If you want to get any car , just go in front of the car at some distance , and the car will stop meanwhile you can sit in the car and the man in that car will be thrown on the road by you.

title: NARUTO X BORUTO NINJA VOLTAGE
description:
Uniting favorite characters from popular anime BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS and NARUTO SHIPPUDEN, NARUTO X BORUTO: Ninja Voltage is a fortress strategy action game based off the popular manga ninja world of Naruto. Grow your village resources, create a ninja fortress and defend it from enemy attacks! Or go on the offensive and invade enemy ninja fortresses by defeating shinobi and traps with your most powerful ninja warriors and ninjutsu! Experience the epic fusion of fortress strategy and shinobi action today!

CREATE THE ULTIMATE NINJA CLAN
‚Ä¢ Collect your favorite shinobi from both the NARUTO SHIPPUDEN and BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS! popular anime
‚Ä¢ Including Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, Boruto Uzumaki, Sarada Uchiha, and many more
‚Ä¢ Enhance and evolve your ninjas to become the strongest clan

STRATEGIC NINJA FORTRESS BATTLES
‚Ä¢ Design the ultimate shinobi fortress to protect village resources
‚Ä¢ Defend your fortress from other players with traps, trained shinobi, and more
‚Ä¢ Compete for Battle Rankings by attacking and protecting fortresses.

FAST PACED SHINOBI ACTION
‚Ä¢ Perform ninja combos with simple controls in a beautiful 3D anime world
‚Ä¢ Finish your foes with a variety of powerful Ninjutsu attacks such as Naruto Uzumaki's Rasengan
‚Ä¢ Earn rewards by battling through various ninja missions

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER MISSIONS
‚Ä¢ Join a shinobi guild and go on missions
‚Ä¢ Team up to 4 players to defeat the unsealed Giant Bosses in Suprise Attack Missions
‚Ä¢ Or team up to invade and takedown other player's fortresses

Get ready to collect and battle with all your favorite NARUTO SHIPPUDEN and BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS! characters and defend your ninja fortress in the popular anime game, NARUTO X BORUTO: Ninja Voltage today!

comments: The game is unbalanced to say the least. New characters are released so often, they are nearly impossible to obtain without making in game purchases. The story mode is extremely limited and the limited missions are difficult to complete without the featured characters. Wonderful graphics and controls; it's such a shame to see it wasted.

I love this game. It gives you all characters at the beginning and gives you easy chances of earning their cards and developing your village expeditiously and the graphics are amazing. Anything with Naruto I live for and I'm glad I have happen to be introduced to this game. But my problem is that the game consistently logs me out making me have to use the game's currency (Shinobite) just to restore my energy. Other than that I enjoy it and look forward to more ideas unfolding in the game!

I'll give it a 5 star now because the game is great but free to play players should have more shinobites and not only that the game should improve more and reduce the bug or glitch and error, I can see potential at least. I Recommend this Game but Don't stop improving this work, project or Game. THE GAME IS GREAT. All I Can Say

The game is so reasonable with the shinobites so unless you want to not enjoy the game and cheat your way to the top theres no reason to buy it, dont worry about missing out on anything because everything can be obtained for free, I do wish that it didnt give you all the characters at the beginning of the game but it's still fun, its updated often as well so theres almost always something new weekly

I have been playing this game for four days and I like it so far. For the most part I like is that u don't need to spend money to get your character stronger all the things you need is in the game already, and the stuff u can earn is unimaginable to add onto this leveling up your character is very easy I already have 2 C ranks and 2 D ranks which is very helpful in this game

title: Helix Jump
description:
Exciting adventure of the bouncing ball through the helix tower labyrinth.

One-tap easy-to-learn controls, rich visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics.
