comments: The game is very addicting to me but.... guess what I will say... if you guessed ads, you are correct. The game is great but there are way to many ads. After each round, there is a ad. If they took away some of the ads, it would be a great game. I have been playing for a while now and the ads where never this bad. Got rid of the most of the ads please. And also dont watch a ad for another chance or to start from where you were cause it didnt put me where I left of when I died.

It's a nice, time consuming game. However, there are two things I'm not a fan of. I'm not very fond of the fact that an ad shows up on one side of the screen before starting a round. It gives my finger less room to move. And I don't like how there is an ad after every single stage. I understand that you would like to make money, but you should maybe tone down the ads and beat around the bush a bit.

I love this app coz 1 it's satisfaction is amazing and 2 it's so fun that l kinda want there to be another one like a Paint ball version. Idk but all this is my opinion. But although I would definitely recommend this game if you are on a road trip,travelling or just in spare timeüòÄ. And sometimes when I am at school I just think about when I am at home in my comfortable clothes and in bed playing this game. But yeah, I love this game and i always play it!!!!üòÇüòÇüòÇI will definitely recommend this

I CAN'T EVEN PLAY THE GAME BECAUSE THE BALL WON'T DROP!!! There are sooooo many ads even though I haven't even gone past one level I know that there are way to many ads that are glitching the game. On the VERY FIRST LEVEL when I installed it, the ball didn't want to go through the hole, so now, it's stuck on the screen not doing anything but jumping.... PLEASE FIX THIS!

A very very good game based on the installing mb there are some problems though. It has aimbot which seems to make the game way to easy It is small and can be completed in 4 to 6 days That's about it which is really impressive for a game taking such low storage it is worth it and not pay to play. title: Badlanders
description:
The open beta test of Badlanders starts today!
Badlanders, Welcome.
Here, upon the ruins of a once-great civilization, scavengers fight for treasure and glory.
The Red Beach Sanctuary once housed the world's most advanced weapon tech but, in the face of natural disasters, became a beacon for the preservation of science and technology for all mankind. However, it was short-lived as war broke out and the preservation plan collapsed.
The only things left on that bloody beach are massive ruins, competing scavengers, and endless opportunities... Gear up and get ready to enter the hot zone of riches and danger.

- Escaping is All That Matters
25 badlanders, each with their own objective enter the battlefield. Take enemies head-on to strip them of their loot or slowly build up an arsenal from chests scattered across the map. But don't get too distracted, finding valuable loot and getting it out in one piece is what you came here for!

- Loot, Shoot, and Gamble on Life and Death
Enjoy the adrenaline rush of intense encounters? This battlefield is for you! Whether you're armed to the teeth enjoying a battle advantage, or just relying on a knife in the hopes of catching someone off guard and stealing their gear, war is always the fastest way to wealth. Here, some become rich overnight while others lose it all.

- Enhance Gear, Build up an Arsenal
How to increase your chances of survival to obtain more loot? Enhancing your gear may be a good idea. Weapons, armor, grenades... All enhancements can be brought into the battlefield. But beware, the greater your gear, the more you‚Äôll attract the attention of other badlanders eager to take it off your hands.

-¬†Real Weapons, Assembled Your Way
Many of the ultra-realistic firearms have several accessories and attachments, some of which even support customizations. Experience the extreme freedom of firearm modifications!

- Open Market, Open Economy
As a seller, you are free to sell loot you got from the battlefield, you could even choose to play the role of a merchant, reselling items for a profit. As a buyer, you can purchase more powerful gear to give you an advantage in the battlefield, allowing you in turn to get even more loot. Even microtransaction items can be resold for the marked price.

Follow us:
Facebook Page: www.facebook.com/BadlandersEN
Discord: https://discord.gg/PfDStmt
Official Website: www.badlanders.game

comments: Ok let me give you a detailed review. The game feels empty. It's this kinda moments you realise how important ads are. The ui is empty. Everytime I leave the game it's hard for me to come back thinking what to do next. Everything is pretty similar to tarkov. The game itself is amazing. Just make it more flassy I'm sure netease knows that better than anyone and put more stuff in there like more content. I'm really looking forward .

An amazing game!!!! Don't let the negative comments stir you away from this game. It just got released a few days ago. Give it some time. Lots of potential but will need some adjustments Hope you change the loot system. Cause if this is a pay to win type of game, you're gonna lose a lot of players. Make it so we don't lose everything once we die. Keep us on the hook a bit more. The money is on skins and cool updates every season. Not a pay to win right out of the gate.

I have very few issues with the game. Some utility options, for the example the option to empty your whole backpack into your warehouse would be nice. Then I would also suggest some more weapons, as the variety isn't that great, maybe a new map. And lastly some kind of ranking system, I really enjoy the fact that you lose your items when you die and don't want that to change, but with nothing to work towards(like a ranking system) it gets a bit repetitive. Otherwise great game

This is top notch. Your shiny gear won't help you against a well organized team. Animations could be more fluid, and some QoL update here and there if i wanna be picky. But hey, it's a solid, awesome game. Eve Echoes and Badlanders are awesome for someone who doesn't have time for pc gaming anymore. KEEP IT UP NETEASE!!

The game itself i think is good. Ive played several BR games or look like BR game this one look original. Still Need lot of improvement, But it is really nesessary if u lose the game u lose all your wear? how to a new player? buy some good stuff & lose, so they need to buy again? & yes lose again? is it really what u want dev? if it really like that, I feel sorry for the noob guy. cuz they never "gear up" playing this game.lol

title: Western Sniper - Wild West FPS Shooter
description:
Slay all ragdoll bandits in an epic Wild West shooting game! Check out Western Sniper - Wild West FPS Shooter to feel like a cowboy shooter fighting for justice on this godforsaken land. Plunge into action in various locations & prepare the barrel to shoot them down!

Top features of Western Sniper - Wild West FPS Shooter:

- One of the most action-packed FPS shooting games
- Genuine atmosphere of a Wild West 
- Gun and revolver shooting modes: aim and see the ragdoll bandits in the scope
- Various challenging locations. Try to shoot 'em down on the train, in a boat. Saloons and old towns are too easy!
- Game store with lots of rifles to choose form
- Wanted renegades all over the place!
- Genuine music & sound effects to recreate the western atmosphere

Any bandits in sight? Just shoot 'em all down, bang bang!

If you looking an action game that easy to control, fun and thrill this one are highly recommended.

title: Ball Mayhem!
description:
Enter the stadium and face the other teams in a fierce battle.
Tackle everyone in sight to move forward and score a Touchdown!
Show them who is the best team in the world!

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS

Subscription options

In our game we have the following subscription offer:

Weekly MVP Membership offers weekly subscription for $7.99 after 3-day free trial 
and Monthly MVP Membership offers monthly subscription for $19.99 and unlocks Pitch, ball, skin and give daily diamonds and removes all ads.
End of trial period and subscription renewal

This price is established for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

Payment will be charged to your Play Store Account at confirmation of purchase.

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user‚Äôs Account Settings after purchase.

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

When your current trial/subscription period expires, you will be unsubscribed. The current active subscription period cannot be canceled.

title: Stickman Superhero - Super Stick Heroes Fight
description:
Welcome to Stickman Superhero - Super Stick Heroes Fight!
Play as the stickman superheroes and fight against the dark forces in the universe and protect the Earth.

Join this game you can choose your Super Heroes, upgrade the ultimate power, join the tournament of all universes and climb TOP on worldwide rankings.

The game integrates many features to make the gaming experience easier than ever:
üî• Simple and easy character controls with buttons and joystick to move, teleport, block enemy‚Äôs attacks, perform basic and 3 advanced skills
üî• Completely free
üî• Offline game, no network connection required
üî• Experience countless well-known superheroes

OTHER SPECIAL FEATURES:

üí™ Collect the full list of stickman super heroes
üî• Win a fight, earn cashes and coins to level up or unlock Super Heroes
üî• Every superhero has more than one strength form. Level up a hero to make him stronger enough to unlock his new form
üî• Preview our Super Heroes‚Äô Skills to choose your favourite stickman hero to buy

üí™ Combats and missions
üî• There are 3 modes to play so you will never get bored in Stickman Super:
‚úîÔ∏è Story mode: Explore the world through an fascinating story line and declare war on all villains, defeat them and become the mightiest hero
‚úîÔ∏è Survival mode: Try to survive as long as possible in an infinite battle with that gets more and more difficult after every wave of enemies
‚úîÔ∏è Tournament mode: 16 finest heroes were chosen to fight in the tournament. Defeat whoever gets in your way to win the ultimate glory and become the champion of the Universe
üî• Spin the completely free lucky wheel to get surprising reward
üî• Lots of daily quests and milestones to complete that come with rewards
üî• Free gifts such as coins and cash are available at any time

Download Stickman Superhero - Super Stick Heroes Fight! to join millions of other players around the world to participate in a heroic journey to save the Earth and the Universe. This stellar line-up RPG with top notch graphics and sound effects will definitely deliver the ultimate gaming experience for you and your friends!

If you need technical support or you want to send us some game suggestions, feel free to contact us via:

title: Shadow Fight 2
description:
The sequel to the famous Facebook smash hit with 40 million users

Shadow Fight 2 is a nail-biting mix of RPG and classical Fighting. This game lets you equip your character with countless lethal weapons and rare armor sets, and features dozens of lifelike-animated Martial Arts techniques! Crush your enemies, humiliate demon bosses, and be the one to close the Gate of Shadows. Do you have what it takes to kick, punch, jump, and slash your way to victory? There‚Äôs only one way to find out.

- Plunge into epic combat sequences, rendered in astonishingly lifelike detail by an
all-new animation system.

- Devastate your enemies with delightfully intuitive controls, thanks to an all-new
fighting interface designed especially for touchscreens.

- Enter the "Underworld" and fight with friends against fearsome bosses!

- Journey through six different worlds full of menacing demons in this action-
packed, adrenaline-fueled combat RPG with an immersive, intriguing storyline.

- Customize your fighter with epic swords, nunchacku, armor suits, magical powers,
and more.

Shadow Fight 2. May the battle begin!

* Bug fixes
comments: I highly recommend this game to the people who like fighting games, this game have realistic moves. Which is great in my opinion. Also those who don't like fighting games they should give a bit try, you'll love it. Even i wasn't fan of fighting games but this changed my mind. One more thing this game doesn't disturbs with stupid ads unlike most of the games just filled with ads when you select an option or something. It's easy to earn gems as well.

I wish I could give 5 stars for such an excellent game, but I have to be honest. I've no problem with 90% of the game mechanics or the gameplay. The only thing that bothers me is the clan searching system. The system basically recommends you clans that are not in your level. I don't play Underworld that much so I have low rating, so I think the devs really need to work on the clan recommendation system. I mean come like imagine you're new to Underworld and they recommend CLANS WHICH ARE HIGH?

This is not just a good game, it's a great game. Graphics, Music, Gameplay, it nails in every aspect. But the only problem are ads. It shows ads every time I end a fight. Also this game has very limit stamina when this game is best played for hours. It is very easy to get addicted in and play for hours, but the stamina system limits that. This game shouldn't try to copy other mobile games in regards to watching ads and stamina. I feel they should considerate the potential of the game.

Good game but they made it impossible to finish. Can't beat eclipse May without the monk set and even then it's nearly impossible. And the only way to get the monk set is to play raids for hundreds of hours til you get 5000 shards to get a chance to obtain one of the items (yes, you can't pick the item you want, it's random chance). Or you could pay with irl money. Overall good game but you can't finish it without paying or dedicating your entire existence to this game.

This game is one of my favourite games to play ever. I have known it for 7 years and i still love it. When i play this game i enjoy it so much, but some times the game can be a bit unfair in a way. An example of this is 1. When fighting an opponent at a high difficultly that you know you can win, if that enemy has more health than you... its like the game is in their favor, and they to just win.I dont know if its just me, but if it isn't I would like it to be fixed. Still is a good game though.

title: Flippy Knife
descriptionHTML:
FLIPPY KNIFE - flip knives, toss axes and throw legendary swords! Become a master while building your own collection of knives!

WHAT‚ÄôS THE GAME ABOUT?
Learn how to flip knives like a pro, to make a great combos and never miss! Become a true master of 7 different locations and get a great collection of famous knives, swords, axes and fantasy legends!

WHO‚ÄôS PLAYING?
It‚Äôs a game for those who love knives and thrill! It‚Äôs a game for the strong and confident. Be on knife edge, take risks and hit the targets! Pick up a knife and stick it into the target!
Do it in FLIPPY KNIFE hit on the subway or in a lineup for a game, in a coffee shop or park, at school or at work!

GAME FEATURES:
‚Äî more than 120 blades with a cool design;
‚Äî physics-based realistic knives;
‚Äî 7 different game modes in one game;
‚Äî awesome graphics from the pros at Beresnev.Design;
‚Äî more than 50 great award badges;
‚Äî unique game mechanics;
‚Äî high-quality support and super updates!

And remember: skill comes with experience!

Sincerely yours,
Beresnev.Games Team
summary: Sharp game for knife flip master like you! Hit the target!
recentChanges:
This update will please you with:
- Improved game balance - making coins became easier!
- Major bugs fix
comments: This game is amazing its hard to descibe it it words but if I had to it would be üî•. I think it needs more game modes, maybe add characters and make a mode action packed, like a console game but on mobile, give the knifes a back story. Also fight mode and race are kind of the same so thats another reason to add a new mode. Over all this game is the best that I have played based on the way its made.

Flippy Ads ‚Äî I used to own this game on iPhone, even paid to remove the ads, but apparently not enough people were doing that, so the devs innovated by implementing......several times more ads. There's an ad after every few throws, I've had to watch an ad after changing menus, and once a pop-up asking me if I wanted to remove ads itself got interrupted by an ad. Flippy Knife is a fun game, but seriously, dial it back a bit.

This game is actually really good. I'm not the type of person to like these games but this one I really liked. One thing though... There is a badge where u need to jump 3 platforms. But in that gamemode it won't let me. If I go off screen I will automatically die. Anything you guys can do?

This I a very fun game but it can make you mad from what I've seen from other reviews, although it has a frame ads from time to time it is still fun and I think a lot more people should try this....unless you get mad alot

I really love the game. Good amount of ads. And i read the other reviews and they don't really like the game..... WHAT?!?! I wouldn't know why they don't. Its an awsome game. Ps, i installed it like 3 minutes ago so yeah.

title: Mr Autofire
description:
Blast aliens!
Find new weapons!
Fight bosses!
Level up!

The fabric of reality is in shreds and monsters are pouring in! It‚Äôs up to you to step up to the plate. Bring your biggest gun and your A game, because you‚Äôre the‚Ä¶ Defender of Everything!

Rampage through levels and shoot the alien scum in the face. Or behind, your choice. Eventually you‚Äôll get yours kicked. Tough. Sucks to be you. But! With the loot you can find, you can get bigger and badder weapons that‚Äôll leave a string of ruined enemies in their wake! By the end, there will be more bullet than air for everyone to breathe.

NOW GO OUT THERE AND KICK SOME BUTT!
descriptionHTML:

summary: Best 2D Platformer Shooter!
recentChanges:
Thanks for playing Mr Autofire! What's new:
- Battle Pass: Season 2, Ultimate Reward: Necro Armor! In addition, you can now continue collecting points and gain more rewards even after completing the Battle Pass track.
- Hero Shards: Collect Hero Shards to unlock and rank up your Heroes! Heroes start at 0 Stars and can be ranked up to 5 Stars.
- New Hero: Scorcher! Collect his Shards to unlock him!
- Elemental Castles: Bring your whole team, climb up the floors and find out what's at the top!
comments: Super fun. Reminds me of Jetpack Joyride, but better. Energy system is a poor design decision. Makes you stop playing after 4 games. Make it like Jetpack Joyride and this could be a mega hit. Update: changing my rating to 5 stars. After paying $8 for the monthly battle pass, I realized it was totally worth the $. It gives me a reason to log in and have fun each day working toward objectives. The rewards are fair, but the game isn't about the rewards. It's a fun and challenging shooter.

This game could be amazing and fun...but its frustrating. You need to do some pretty heavy grinding to advance very far, which is fine, the game itself is fun and fast paced. But the energy system seems designed to piss people off. You get enough energy to play four rounds. (Maybe 15 mins gameplay) then you have to wait hours to recharge. Get rid of it! Just let people play your game!

I'm updating this to a 3 star for fixing that issue but now there is another one. Your grouping of players in the Endless Tower needs fixed. How does a person that has won 8 times get put in a group of people that hasn't won any? There are also people that have won 4 times in our pod. I've only one once. If the pods were done right, just about everyone in this pod or group should only have 1 win.

Despite the 3 stars, this is a really fun and a very challenging game to play. Although the grind is very real and the 'optional' ads which pops up now and then are stats you truly want which makes the win a slight loss. What frustrates me the most is probably the thing about the real money cost of things you can buy for real money. It's extremely expensive(!!) It could be an amazing game but I feel like being forced to play 1 world for at least 150 rounds or more to level up my hero is....

This is a lovely game. The game play is simple, but requires a level of skill in later levels that is highly rewarding when achieved, making it far more enjoyable than Archero. The regular updates are nice. Devs, please reconsider the energy system. Gear drops are adequate, though barely, and Gem drops are poor. Was having problems with the game glitching. Wiping my phone seemed to fix most of the problems, which seemed to have been linked to the ad system. Do check the r/mrautofire subreddit.

title: War Robots. 6v6 Tactical Multiplayer Battles
description:
Great to see you, Commander!
War Robots is the biggest shooter game about giant robots that fits into your pocket. Join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world and show them who‚Äôs the smartest, fastest, toughest pilot around! Prepare for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and other tricks up enemies‚Äô sleeves. Destroy! Capture! Upgrade! Become stronger ‚Äî and prove yourself as the best mech commander in the War Robots online universe!
MAIN FEATURES
ü§ñ Choose your fighter. Over 50 robots with unique designs and powers let you find a style to call your own.
‚öôÔ∏è Play how you want. Want to crush and destroy? To save and protect? Or just annoy the hell out of your enemies? You can do it all with the massive selection of weapons, including ballistic missiles, plasma cannons, and giant shotguns!
üõ†Ô∏è Customize. Each robot can be fitted with weapons and modules of your choice. Find your favorite combo and show everyone what you‚Äôve got!
üéñÔ∏è Battle together in multiplayer. Team up with other people! Join a powerful clan to find trusty partners (and friends!), or even start your own!
üë®‚ÄçüöÄ Battle on your own. Prefer playing solo? Lone wolves can express themselves in special modes like Arena or Free-for-All!
üìñ Explore the lore. The War Robots world grows and expands with every update, and the ever-growing community is always ready to help you.
Looking for more action?
Check out the latest news on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/
‚Ä¶or Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_Pixonic
 
Watch War Robots TV on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS
 
Hop on Reddit for in-depth discussions: https://www.reddit.com/r/walkingwarrobots/
 
And visit our official website for articles, patch notes and development stories: https://warrobots.com
 
Note: War Robots requires a stable internet connection for the best gameplay experience.
Good hunting, Commander!

summary: Win the Great Iron War! New 3D mech robot shooter in PvP mode!
developerAddress: 243, 28 th Oktovriou Street, 7 th Floor, Apartment 702/802, at Christiana Sea View Court, 3035 Limassol, Cyprus
contentRatingDescription: Fantasy Violence, Alcohol and Tobacco Reference, Mild Language
recentChanges:
- HALLOWEEN UPDATE. Join the new metal-fueled event!
- New titan: Minos. Horned monster, fast and menacing
- Titan shotguns: Squall and Grom. Titans aren't just for snipers anymore
- Sonic blasters: Scatter, Havoc, Devastator. Their damage cannot be repaired too easily
- Various optimization tweaks
- Minor bug fixes
- Check the full notes at warrobots.com
comments: I have years of experience with WR now and can base my opinions on this. Like any mobile game, pay to win is an issue. With skill, you can match them. I have never bought anything and I am pushing for promotion back to expert after the rebalance. Anything in the game you will eventually be able to make or buy for silver, after it spends some time being exclusive. The graphics have gone wierd after remastered dropped, they looked a lot better before. If I have a gripe, it's that.

Played this game for months, I enjoyed it but they are constantly changing things and screwing up the functions of the game. Riddled with commercials that give you free stuff....when they are not freezing up your device, constantly having to restart the app! Unless you are willing to pay to play, it's really a waste of time, the random roll system is rigged, and app knows what robot is being upgraded so offers to buy puzzle pieces to upgrade faster. Sometimes less is more!

It's a really fun game, a lot of it seems Pay To Win, but int he workshop, it only takes a month or two to make a robot or weapon. Well, I'll just say it's two fouths PAY TO WIN and another fourth is easy going, the last fourth is entertaining, hard kind of parts. That's the part that games have to have, it's the kick, it's what makes it fun! if it's too easy, it's not I've enjoied this game a lot. If you... well, if you REALLY DON'T like pay to win games I would not recommend this game for you.

Used to love it. It is totally, surely and ultimately a pay to win game. After you increase your rank, you would encounter bots and weapons that can only be counter by robots & weapons that'll cost you around $50 to $100. Sure, if you're have no regards on spending your money wisely on things like this, you can surely pay for it. Anyhow, used to love it and now, I just uninstall it.

I've have had this game for years and used to play every chance I got. It was the main game I played on my phone. However with every update it seems that unless you're willing to pay a ton of money, you're always just cannon fodderüò° for those who believe money can do anything. This game is far to complex...too many robots, cost of robots, little extra bots, giant bots, so so many weapons, all of which cost the earth. This game has no real free play anymore. So sad but will be uninstalling.

title: Hide Online - Hunters vs Props
description:
Hide Online ‚Äî an addictive and thrilling multiplayer Hide and Seek action-shooter game in popular Prop Hunt genre. 

Hide as a Prop from other players in any room or try to escape! Simply swap and become any kind of hidden object ‚Äî a chair, a box, a cup, or even a lavatory pan. 

Both grownups and children will have fun playing hide and seek in Hide Online!

summary: Hide Online ‚Äî stunning Hide and Seek action-shooter multiplayer game!
recentChanges:
4.4.0
- End of Halloween
- Bug fixes
comments: This is a fun game i ever had. Well actualy the controls are a little error, so well when i am being shot by the hunters (when i was a prop) i just fastly died. Well it's only one problem but it takes a risk too. I like this game alot!!! But i don't like the game now since there is the updates!! There are so many problems! I DON'T LIKE IT okay. So please understand what i say. DON'T MAKE ANY UPDATES!!! And even there is nothing that's new at thay game.

Pay to win.. You should make it such that at the end of each game, the best player (MVP) will get coins and that too only 5-10. This way we will be able to buy respawn points and grenades for free without having to spend any real money. Or if not that then make it so that you have fixed amount of respawn points and pig transform thing for every match so that the props actually have some chance of winning.

It is really fun but i hate cheater, most of the player use cheat that's makes me sad, it should be fun but when people use cheat. There's no fun on that anymore. About this game, it should have free coins. why must i top up to but the coins? I'm still a student, there's no fun when people have no coins to purchase something cool in that app. If this game improve, I'll consider to edit my rating. I just hate cheater and whenever i need coins, why should i top up every time? I'm not moneymakerüòî

An awesome game, really good and entertaining, but plz i am now in a situation i can't pay for the stuff and i really admire people who have them and I really feel bad that they have it and I don't so plz add some points that you achieve by killing props which you can then use to get guns, skins, stickers and avatars so if you read this plz take away the payment

This GAME IS AWESOEME!!! but im in a hurry to do something so im gonna write the problems...but I really don't like this bug, that I see my network connection is full but it says: "please check your internet connection" üòï I think its because of my device üòÆüò∂ but if you find this and know that this is a bug then please fix it. Other than this, this game is incredibly awsome, fun and challenging! I recommend this game for people who like challenging and mysterious and very fun games!

title: Bullet Echo
description:
Lead your team to victory in this unique PvP tactical team shooter! Choose from dozens of different heroes with unique play styles and abilities. 
Unite with friends, set a strategy, and be the last team standing when the battle ends!

From the creators of C.A.T.S.: Crash Arena Turbo Stars, King of Thieves and Cut the Rope.

- UNIQUE TACTICAL STEALTH ACTION: Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots.
- DESIGNED FOR TEAM PLAY: Start playing with friends online right away! The level of your hero is matched with the highest level in the party.
- MULTIPLE GAME MODES: Team vs Team, Solo and Battle Royale mode with 5 small teams on one map.
- UNLOCK AND UPGRADE NEW HEROES: Each hero has a unique set of abilities. Rank up to boost your hero's power and unlock new perks.
- BE ON TOP: Participate in championships, accomplish missions and receive valuable resources.
- GET REWARDS: Fight to unlock new heroes with unique guns, new perks, maps and game modes!

Official Discord server of the game: https://discord.gg/u4ApPB7

developerAddress: 2 Eaton Gate, London, SW1W 9BJ United Kingdom
comments: A well designed game ruined by unbalanced characters. The first 30 min us fun. You win some, you lose some. As soon as you enter the second championship few characters like that dude with the red beard, is invincible. Even when 3 players fire at him accurately it's impossible to kill him. And two opponents playing as him, the game is good as lost already. Please balance the characters. Uninstalling for now

The game has been allowing some players to shoot through the walls even though no character has the ability to shoot through the walls so there is no way to mimic the action unless you know how to abuse the glitch to win also the game has its ups its fun and exciting when the game is working correctly unfortunately this game has a few glitches especially with connection issues. i have spawned in a game and roamed around the map waiting for teammates to appear and they did after a few seconds.

Fun concept but really disappointing. There are many bugs with this game that the developers refuse to fix after being told by the community multiple times. There is a massive power imbalance between the characters and their abilities and weapons that Devs refuse to fix. 90% of the time you're up against bots and the bots themselves are broken and rigged (like tracking an invisible person for example). It's just a big mess and to top it off...it's pay to win. Go figure. Don't play this game.

Edit* the last time i gave this game a review I couldn't say enough good things about it and it got 5 stars. But since the Halloween update it seems like the battles have become way to unfairly balanced. * it does seem like the devs are attempting to improve the matchmaking system. Thanks. Still needs work but this game is a great time killer. I would recommend that folks give it a shot.

Hello, I came back to this game after a couple months out of boredom. You're doing a lot better with players, I just have 2 complaints. Bots are still being used which is fine but, I have been in many situations where they do not revive me. And the second is the damage on certain characters like Freddie. If Freddie looks at you for 1 second you're dead. It is really annoying but not many people play him so its alright. Continue doing good and making this game better. Thank you.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog‚Ñ¢ Classic
description:
The Sonic game that started it all is now free-to-play and optimized for mobile devices!

Race at lightning speeds across seven classic zones as Sonic the Hedgehog.  Run and spin through loop-de-loops as you collect rings and defeat enemies on your mission to save the world from the evil Dr. Eggman.

Sonic the Hedgehog joins the SEGA Forever classic games collection, a treasure trove of free SEGA console classics brought to life on mobile for the first time!

FEATURES
- OPTIMIZED FOR MOBILE Sonic The Hedgehog now plays in widescreen at a smooth 60FPS offering unrivalled performance and the game‚Äôs legendary soundtrack has been fully re-mastered.
- GOTTA GO FAST - Challenge yourself with an all-new Time Attack mode
- NEW PLAYABLE CHARACTERS Play as Sonic‚Äôs friends Tails and Knuckles for the first time. Use their unique abilities to fly, climb, and glide around levels offering exciting new ways to explore.
- CONTROLLER SUPPORT Sonic The Hedgehog on Android offers exclusive support for the Power A Moga, Nyko, XBOX, and all HID controllers.


SEGA FOREVER FEATURES
- PLAY FREE
- CONTROLLER SUPPORT - HID compatible controllers
- GAMES RELEASED EVERY MONTH - Download them all!

RETRO REVIEWS
- "Believe the hype - this is the tidiest, smoothest and most exhilarating game you'll have ever seen." [97%] - Andy Smith, SEGA Power #22 (September 1991)
- ‚ÄúDifficult without being frustrating, addictive without being repetitive, and altogether a joy to play.‚Äù [925/1000] - Gary Whitta, ACE #47 (August 1991)
- "One of the best Mega Drive games I've ever played" [92%] - Rich Leadbetter, Mean Machines #10 (July 1991)

TRIVIA
- Sonic Jam contained the first release of Sonic The Hedgehog that gave Sonic his spin dash move, which returns again in this remake
- Sonic The Hedgehog was also released in arcades on SEGA's Mega-Tech and Mega Play systems
 - Rabbit and armadillo characters were considered for Sonic before settling on a hedgehog design
- While "Eggman" is Dr. Robotnik's nickname in the West, he has always been known as "Eggman" in Japan

CLASSIC GAME FACTS
- First released in the US on June 23rd, 1991 
- It took Yuji Naka almost a year to finish designing Green Hill Zone Act 1
- Spring Yard Zone and Scrap Brain Zone were originally called Sparkling Zone and Clock Work Zone
- Music composed by Masato Nakamura of Dreams Come True fame

- - - - -
Privacy Policy: http://www.sega.com/mprivacy
Terms of Use: http://www.sega.com/terms

Game apps are ad-supported and no in-app purchases are required to progress; ad-free play option available with in-app purchase.

Other than for users known to be under 13, this game may include "Interest Based Ads" (please see http://www.sega.com/mprivacy#3IBADiscolure for more information)‚Äã and may collect "Precise Location Data" ‚Äã(please see http://www.sega.com/mprivacy#5LocationDataDisclosure ‚Äãfor more information)‚Äã

developerAddress:

recentChanges: Bug fixes and refinements
comments: It's a fantastic adaptation of the game and I would give it 5 stars if not for: - Scrap Brain zone act 2 is broken and loops back to the start of the level -- is this by design? It doesn't allow me to finish the game! - Even though I purchased the game I keep getting one add every time I open the app - I need to be online to play the game - come on man this would be amazing during long plane trips!

Don't get me wrong, I absolutely love this game, and Sonic as a whole. But this "free" version is unacceptable. Far too many ads. This replaced the version I paid for years ago, which doesn't make any difference because the restore purchase button takes me straight to Sonic 2. Can't even find the paid version. Game 5/5, port 0/5 until restore function is fixed (this has been an issue for well over a year)

The game is unplayable because an ad is in view of my path I would add a photo to show but don't know how, ads are fine but when you put them in the view of what's going on in the game it breaks the game and is no longer even considered a game ,just an annoying ad troll and you cannot exit the ads ,I understand I could just pay but I don't mind ads as long as they are done right ..

Don't get me wrong. I love sonic. He has always been close to my heart. But, this port is barely playable. The camera is way zoomed out, which makes the game 10 times harder than the regular. Plus, the controls are very unresponsive, see, I get why they put the controls where they did. But, they almost always do the exact opposite of what you want to do. 2 out of 5. Plus, every time you pause the game, you get an ad. Ad after ad after AD. Try it out, but listen to the reviews.

One of the best ways to play the original Sonic the Hedgehog. Controls are surprisingly good for a phone port and widescreen definitely enhances the experience. Only problem is that achievements are a bit iffy; it says I got the chaos consiour achievement even though I only have three chaos emeralds. Other than that, I don't really have any complaints.

title: Snake Arena
description:
Beat all the rivals on the island! Eat tasty apples, race with other players and try to survive in a colorful arcade Snake Arena in 3D! Guide the snake, encircle smaller enemies, and don‚Äôt stop growing. Discover various boosters on your way to increase your slug speed and improve other skills.

Keep eating and competing in the arena to open new islands! Every level has an achievement scale to keep you up with your progress. And don‚Äôt forget about tons of cute and funny skins that will unlock as you progress the game!

Why you‚Äôll love Snake Arena in 3D:
 Simple and addictive gameplay
- Various islands to discover
- Cute animal skins
- Cool boosters to find and use against other players. Enter ghost mode to go through obstacles!
- A relaxing way to pass the time

comments: I wanted to play this for the laughs and ridiculousness of it, and i found that, but I wasnt expecting it to be FUN too. Like bro, its chicken CoD, why is it so fun? Plus you get to build things, fight monsters, a BR mode, its lit. I will say, there are some VERY op weapons, but it isnt pay to win. Its super easy to get coins and nothing is ridiculously priced. Honestly i love it a lot and hope it gets love and updates for a while to come.

Add where when a chicken is 0 HP it will fall on the ground and cannot move or jump, other chickens can revive downed chickens, if the chicken is shot while downed it will imedeitley die, grenades are OP against downed chickens, but to make it easier for downed chickens, you can shoot grenades mid-air and cause an explosion in the air.

title: MORTAL KOMBAT: The Ultimate Fighting Game!
description:
Experience the over-the-top, visceral fighting action of MORTAL KOMBAT! Bring the power of next-gen gaming to your mobile and tablet device with this visually stunning fighting and card collection game. Assemble an elite team of Mortal Kombat warriors and prove yourself in the greatest fighting tournament on Earth!

MK11 CHARACTERS
The MK11 team is extremely versatile, packed with unique abilities and powerful team synergies to inflict pain onto your enemies. The MK11 collection includes MK11 Raiden, Scorpion, Jade, Sub-Zero, Kabal, and Skarlet, and they are just as deadly as their console counterparts! They even perform the same Fatal Blow!

FIGHT IN BRUTAL 3v3 COMBAT
Create your own team of Mortal Kombat fighters and lead them into battle to earn experience, new special attacks, and powerful artifacts. Team up warriors with unique synergies to get an advantage over your enemies such as Team Ronin, Team Nightmare, and Team Day of the Dead!

CCG - BUILD A MASSIVE ROSTER
This game is the ultimate CCG! Collect over 130 Mortal Kombat characters including veterans like Scorpion, Johnny Cage, Sub-Zero, Cassie Cage, Ermac, and many others. Discover new additions to Mortal Kombat Mobile like the bloodthirsty Vampiress Mileena, soccer champion Kombat Cup Sonya Blade, mysterious Klassic Reptile, and warrior princess Ronin Kitana.

COMPLETE DIFFICULT CHALLENGES
Prove yourself in the best fighting game ever made, and complete a series of matches to bring new Mortal Kombat warriors to your roster! A new challenge begins every week!

MULTIPLAYER FACTION WARS
Compete and fight with other players in Faction Wars, an online competitive mode where players engage other player teams. Rank up in your Faction‚Äôs leaderboard to earn weekly prizes.

PERSONALIZE YOUR FIGHT GAME
Unlock unique character customizations in Feats of Strength. Win battles to show off your mastery with limitless combinations of action packed Victory Stances, insulting Victory Taunts, and champion worthy War Banners. Unlocking Feats of Strength also boosts stats for characters!

JAW DROPPING FATALITIES
Mortal Kombat Mobile brings its trademark Fatalities to mobile, with stunning graphics, and over the top action moves that will punch you right in the guts. Other fighting games don‚Äôt come close!

EARN REWARDS ON EPIC QUESTS
Send characters on epic Quests to earn special rewards! Begin your journey in Outworld and make your way to Netherrealm!

Download this groundbreaking, free fighting game TODAY and unleash your power!

Hit us up on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MKMobileGame/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/mkmobilegame
For game support: https://go.wbgames.com/MKhelp

NOTICES:
* Mortal Kombat Mobile features high quality visuals. Performance is not optimized on devices with less than 1.0 GB RAM.
* Mortal Kombat Mobile is an online-only game.
* A minimum of 1.1 GB of free space is required on your device.
Content is generally suitable for ages 17 and up. Contains intense violence, blood, and gore.

Ad Choices: policies.warnerbros.com/privacy/en-us/#adchoice
Terms of Use: policies.warnerbros.com/terms/en-us
Do Not Sell My Personal Information: privacycenter.wb.com/donotsell

comments: Pay to play. The game is fun but they built it so many limitations that around level 15 it starts turning into a pay to play game. I am ok with it when the game is fun and the prices are reasonable but the average cost is 15 dollars a pop on something that you would need to do again in about a week. Too bad because it is fun....time to delete though

How the fu** do you guys expect us to beat this nightmare tower?! Like, for those of you who are currently fighting the Day of the dead bosses, it's impossible to beat when the entire team have a heal special attack, and if you don't have a special att block your basically not making peogress..TOO HARD!!! Also still a major issue with obtaining Diamonds, I've spent HUNDRED OF THOUSANDS of souls and only have 6 diamond characters, 2 of which I earned in towers. Need more ways of getting diamonds.

I love this game! I play it everyday and you get souls daily just for logging on, but of course it isn't the only way to claim souls, I would recommend doing quests, challenges and Faction wars and possibly Shao Kahn Tower and Battle mode, it is also very helpful if you claim lots of equipment and level up cards and good character cards to prepare for battle. There are 3 characters you can choose to add for battle, but choose wisely, level up your characters and most importantly, have fun!!!

Used to be a great game now its full of bugs and i can only feel cheated when my combos are cut off for an unending combo that takes out my entire team. On the occasion i do win, my team is marked dead after displaying the win screen. After 5 years of fighting updates to continue to be able to play it has become only pay to win.

This game is really awesome. This game's brings me back to my childhood days. I remember this when I and my cousin play this game secretly because our family are very strict when it comes with this. We went in to a playstation area to play and hide when my family tried to look for us. Haha and now this game add more cool character that makes me awesome. Anyway my favorite character here is KUNG LAO.I really love his hat trick really cool and awesome.About the play ? Yeah man! smooth and friendly

title: Modern Strike Online: Free PvP FPS shooting game
description:
Modern Strike Online:
Can't get enough PvP FPS action games? Looking for the most free killing FPS games around?
Well you're in luck! Modern Strike Online has awesome FPS game needs covered and then some!
GO into the awesome pc games graphics and dynamic shooter game.  Play online with your friends for the best FPS action PvP special battles you've ever seen! The best thing to happen to mobile in the style of everyone's favorite call of duty, csgo and pubg!

Free FPS game:
5 popular combat shooting modes for single or multiplayer PvP battles! Clans wars and special gun wars!
Free Daily rewards! Play every day to claim your free prizes and complete daily tasks! Easy and intuitive combat controls!
50 unique weapon types: combat pistols, awp rifles, cool machine guns, swat shotguns and other special ops weapons!
CSGO style Weapon skins! Optimization for weak devices!
Call of beautiful modern pc game graphics just as detailed as on PCs! Easy and intuitive controls!

Awesome 5v5 PvP battles:
14 unique 5v5 PvP maps with different surroundings and their own original style! Play awesome games with your own rules! 
You'll need good FPS games tactics, strategic thinking and teamwork to win! Find your enemy's weak spots and win!

Popular action game modes:
TDM! Two teams go head-to-head. The goal: destroy and frag your opponents! Dominate the battlefield with your friends!
Call of Deathmatch battles! It's every  special ops soldier for themselves! Free for all pvp battle for the most skilled FPS soldiers!
Plant the bomb battle! The terrorist team plants a bomb, and the special forces team tries to stop them! Just like in Call of duty,  d day and CSGO.
Special OPS operations: Two teams battle it out with just one life per round. The winning team is whoever has at least one soldier standing at the end.

Multiplayer shooting games:
Fight for your place on the PvP leaderboard! Upgrade your combat armor and weapons, and choose your favorite pg skins. Thanks to optimal game balance, realistic sounds, and awesome pc game graphics.

Popular FPS shooter:
Online FPS combat inspired by cod, pubg and csgo: the best thing to happen to your phone!
50ml+ online players all over the world!

comments: It is a very fun game. Issue are : newer players have a low percentage chance against higher experience players. They are placed on the same map and get killed over and over. They may get lucky to get 1 kill but 50 deaths. Some clans like God's, Goons, and couple more have higher ranked players that just ruin the game for others. When you have 2 players one with 50 kills and another with 40, rest players with 5 or less, not worth it. Should be a better balance in the game.

The developers have done a fantastic job. The gameplay, game mechanics, interface, all feels smooth, and it also has a lot of potential to be a triple-A title someday. However, guns are often so expensive! I would really appreciate, if there would be a possibility to make chat interface on the left-bottom corner of the screen adjustable/movable. I play on a tablet and my left hand opens the chat box in the middle of every single game, thank you!

Great game. I'd like to give five stars but it needed a little more improvement. First off we need to be able to customise our controls to our own comfort. Also I would love it if we could choose the maps we want to play in. Lastly i understand the ads but they're way too long and unskippable. But the graphics and weapons amongst many others are on point. Lots of loveüëçüëç

This game is fun and it's kinda like csgo, everyone should go ahead and download it, though it might be fun and all it also has its flaws,the game closes itself right when you're in the middle of the match and then it asks you to send feedback to the developer,but the developers don't even respond so I hope they here me and help me fix this game

Like it so far. Hopefully it doesn't freeze up on me. It takes in app purchases to beat the other teams. Its difficult to start out with just the basics but eventually you'll get there unless you are willing to spend money just to get what you want! I have so many online games, this isn't the only one I play. But I like them all...just want to say good luck to whomever decides to download this awesome game it has clear graphics and its easy to use the controls.

So many ads. You don't even get to finish a whole game and there are ads. A game takes 15-20 seconds and you still get cut off in between

This app is disgusting it makes me want to gag please dont waste time on this app I only downloaded it to stop the disgusting ads. I played it once and it was even more disgusting. I absolutely hate it and it is the most disgusting app. I felt so sick to my stomach after watching one ad. I almost threw up. If this doesn't convince you to not downloaded this app the. Its fun to play with and its funny sometimes

comments: This game is honestly a lot of fun. If they patch in some balancing, it could be REALLY good. The damage bonus you can buy is easy too good. At level 87 attack in easily 1shotting every enemy at level 123. Also, the weapons are very fun to explore, especially the last one. Unfortunately, the kunai is EASILY the best, and you get it super early. The game could also use boss fights. Ads are everywhere, but the gameplay is good enough to make watching 3 per level worth it.

There seems to be a glitch! I'm at level 520! Now at some levels , I cant seem to eliminate the Gate Keeper/ Gate Crowd. They they never get to be killed ! The ghost stays behind and keeps on attacking. The I have to close the app , and restart again . Apart from that glitch, This is one of the best games I ever played

This is obviously 5* game........ Classic, superb and the best game. I cleared 140 levels only 2 days of installation. I got all the weapons and now what? I have to play same levels with same enemy. Please put more weapons for mass distruction. And put an option that i can change any wepon in between the war. I want this to get more addiction. Make this game excitement. It will be better than the best.

This game has a lot of issues. 1. There are too many checkpoints. It loses all the challenge because of this. 2.I know this may seem demanding, seeing as how this game is from voodoo, but please make this game into a horizontal view.It's very hard to see what's coming for you on vertical.You can get killed by something you couldn't see. 3.Checkpoints and challenge.This game's idea of challenge is to throw more enemies at you. It isn't challenging in the least.

The game is great for time killing ,just turn off your wifi or mobile data if you dont want any ads. BUT for me most of the weapons need to be revamped, like the last one (pirate weapon if im not wrong) it's too weak for keeping up with high level crowd. For me the strongest one is the mjolnir, I use it all the time bcause it can keep up with crowded enemies üëç, I hope yall fix em

title: Gangstar Vegas: World of Crime
description:
üòè Ready to roll the dice on a life of crime? Then the city of Vegas is waiting for a gangster like you! 
‚ö†Ô∏è It‚Äôs always a crime season for mafia cartels, so only a real rock star could survive in the famous Gameloft game ‚Äì Gangstar Vegas! üåÉ
ü§º‚ôÇÔ∏è Run free in a massive open game world full of gang wars, theft, vice, auto racing, sniper action, clan conspiracies, zombie shooting, street fights, and other absolutely fun and completely wild, just like in your favorite crime movies!

V IS FOR VEGAS: THE CITY OF SIN
üåá Explore every inch of this grand open city, where every vice has a price.
üßó Discover each TPS action mission, racing challenge, secret collectible, and commit grand theft auto like a real rock star of crime.
üé∞ Take a chance with your favorite casino game of choice. You know, the kind they don‚Äôt play in San Andreas or New Orleans‚Ä¶
  Become a part of the marvelous adventure saga of the mafia cartel & wage gang wars just like in the best crime movies, full of blasting six guns action, fight night boxing, street fights, city driving & roaming around the massive open world! 

INSANE OPEN WORLD ENCOUNTERS
üèÜ Start your heart racing Vegas story by boxing for the mafia cartel. But soon you‚Äôll be free to claim the real grand prize as you send your own crime clans v. the gang world of Las Vegas city.
ü•ä Keep fighting for your life through each action packed mission (over 80!) full of theft, auto racing, shooting, roaming, and fun TPS action!
üëæ You never know what you‚Äôll battle next as alien wars, waves of tanks, and zombie clans are just part for the course in this gangster city of never-ending crime season.
üöì üí® City driving beyond all limits! It‚Äôs not a robbing game, but theft is always an option when you need a car on these gangster town streets!

TOOLS OF THE TRADE
üí£ Open the gang wars with a grand bang by fighting with Flamethrowers, Maltov Cocktails, Grenade Launchers and even future firepower!
üî´ Try out a grand variety of legendary weapons, including six guns, sniper rifles, grenade launchers, lasers, swords, rockets and anything else your twisted plans call for.
üöÅ Get behind the wheel of muscle cars, armored tanks, hoverbikes, fighter jets and anything else you‚Äôve dreamed of taking for some city driving since you were a little gangster.
ü§ñ Deploy deadly drones to give you some auto cover fire, counter strike support, and healing for your mission of crime.
üë®üé§ Become a rock star gangster as you customize your TPS skills and in-game gear for maximum action in this adventure saga.
ü¶π‚ôÇÔ∏è Indulge your vice for style with dozens of costumes that let you become a Vegas high roller, zombie gangster, mafia kingpin, world boxing grand champ, auto racing pro, Shaolin fighting master, street fighter, future sniper, a real rock star as you are, and much more!

ENTERTAINMENT FOR ADULTS
  Nobody can stop you from having the best possible roaming experience in this open world full of fun beyond limit. I'd like to see the cops even try to stop you!
üëØ‚ôÄÔ∏è There‚Äôs a strip club in the Red Light District that's always open & free! Need we explain more?

The Gang Wars are on, so join in and show them who‚Äôs the real rock star gangsta!

comments: Great game, just a couple of things that could be improved. The hands and mouths don't move during cutscenes, making the game look far worse then the many other games I've played. Graphics for the most part are pretty good for a mobile game. Finally, the thing that I don't like the least is the number of updates. I got the game to play offline, but 9/10 of the time when I open the game it requires internet and therefore I can't play until I get internet. However, overall a pretty good game. :)

You must try it. But I didn't want to invest real money as you ll run out of things to do very quickly. Pros: Awesome gameplay and graphics. Driving physics is so good. Really good voice acting. Story is very good and very nicely told. Radio is so funny. Decent arsenal of weapons and vehicles. Cons: Very glitchy. Character gets stuck on pavements. Too many ads. I finished the main story in a few days now there is nothing to do. Things are ridiculously expensive. It's a medium sized map.

It was Great but in the military it is empty so I think you can add some military drones that u can hack and some F-18 some tanks and I am not forcing u to add this but if you want you can pleas add these in the next update and your great by this game we can learn what ar guns how to drive car's and ect. And try to add some super powers that cost 1M dollers and that will encourage others to play this super nice game. You can my be add flash,super man,iron man,Thor,Groot,rocket,and some pets

It's a very nice game, but I gave you four stars because now almost everyone thing in the shop is sold in diamonds instead of cash, plus when I die, I have to pay money to revive, and also u should make a garage where we can sell cars for diamonds, cause I always sell cars for cash , and pls make it multiplyer so we can play with our friends, do these things and I will happily give u a five star, so will all my friends and family Thanks!

It's a fun game and I like it a lot but all it is, is GTA mobile version and a lot of these missions are far to hard. I'm stuck on the rooftop trying to save Karen but the missile from the helicopter keep blowing me to smithereens. Also I cant get past the aliens I keep running out of bullets and honestly I don't know what to do in that part. Do I shoot the aliens or the spaceship. I haven't played it in over a week because I cant get past neither stage. And dont get me started on the she devil

title: Last Day on Earth: Survival
description:
The survival shooter Last Day on Earth is set in a post apocalyptic world: in 2027 the world saw an outbreak of an unknown infection that destroyed almost all the human race. And it didn‚Äôt stop there. All those dead started turning into zombies and those few survivors that have resistance in their blood are trying to survive on the ruins of the once great world.

And now the survival of your character is only in your power! Keep an eye on your character‚Äôs life stats such as hunger and thirst, collect valuable resources for crafting, create weapons and transport of different types or use what you have at hand: a bat or a road sign. Everything will come in handy for killing dozens... hundreds‚Ä¶thousands of zombies!

Defeat intruders to your land not only with your power but also cunning ‚Äì construct fortifications with traps or go raid other survivors‚Äô territories for the sake of rare loot and resources. After all people can do anything to survive. 

Hardcore fans will have plenty to do in tough seasonal locations. Before going to a desperate trip, equip your survivor with the most crushing weapon to hunt wild animals and destroy crowds of mutated zombies. One can reach seasonal location on a transport that‚Äôs available for crafting. Moreover if you pass the wall on the west of the map you will enter an online location where with a special costume on, you will be able to interact with other players. 

Explore the large and deep-laid world of Last Day on Earth! Upgrade your hero, equip your house, loot abandoned territories, hunt wild animals and other survivors ‚Äì the new world has new rules. 

Will you survive in conditions like these? If so, what price are you ready to pay?

comments: This game is great. But there things which can make it better. First, mercenaries did a great help to us, I think you should add it again, but it will be free to hire them. Second, guns should have ammo instead of durability, and also reload. Third, we can exchange things to get coins, or you can put ads, or else its almost like pay to win. And also military bags would be a little more common, and tactical bags can be obtained from bosses like the big one, the blind one, etc.

Good Game love it but come on those unknown boxes seem rigged üòÇüôè.For example it is about to land on a ak then it keeps going and going and going and going until I take it off. Another example is when it just gives me rocks or wood like seriously 5 wood what am I going to do with that build a spear?¬ø? Give meh the good loot I know I know weapons are rare but would it kill ya to give me a gun once in a while ;). Love the special savings pack thank you! Edit: No change less stars ‚ò∫.

i love this game, i jjust think you should make a few changes. fix the weird zombie attacks, where your 10 feet away from a zombie and they still manage to hit you. and maybe add a few more interactable npc's you could do jobs for. i know there are some, but more would make the game even better. and maybe make the weapon mod station a bit easier to craft. i killed a guy who had basic stuff, but somehow had a modded bat. just make it a bit lower level to get to. and a repair station would be cool

this is overall one of the best games I have ever played but it has one MASSIVE flaw: if you die, and then die again, everything in the first body is gone forever. I had full assult armor and great guns when i got killed by a frenzied giant i didnt know about. It killed me again and all my armor and guns are gone. Im not gonna rage quit or uninstall but this needs to fixed.

I played the game for one and half year and then I could not load the game. Just freezed in Bunker Alfa and I couldn't not load it anymore. I contacted customer support and they try to help me but no effect. Nothing was wrong with my phone, WiFi I even VPN. I loved the game and spent a lot of time playing it, you can play it without paying, I needed just a little bit more to finish ATV without spending money for second time and now I have to delete the game. To bad.

title: Spider Hero: Superhero Fighting
description:
SUPERHERO SPIDER
Have fun with the new and best action superhero top down IO battle royale spider-man game! Rush into the city park or dark street and defeat crime gangs as a true superhero spiderman!

BECOME THE BEST HERO OF BATTLES AGAINST CRIMINAL GANGS
This spider top down action game takes place in the city of criminal gangs. Cruel crime lords attacked the city and your spider superhero should win all the mafia! Civilians need your help, however police or army forces are unable to fight gangster mafia bosses. There is no chance and the city is going to ruin, but you are here as a true spider superhero fighter! People need you to fight away all thugs from the streets. So become a superhero to defeat bosses in the city in one of the best spider heroes fighting games!

IT‚ÄôS EASY TO FIGHT IN THE SUPERHERO SPIDER BATTLE
The spider-man game is made as a classic arcade IO gameplay, like superhero action io games from our childhood and comics. Tap buttons to shoot weapons or do melee attacks - throw axes or hammers. You can choose different weapons before battles. Combine attacks and evasion to become the most dexterous brawler of superheroes games! Become the last player in survival battle royale, get points successful street fights and unlock new weapons for your spider hero!

COURAGEOUS AND FEARLESS SUPER HERO
Criminal gangs took the city and made the streets dark and dangerous. Everything is under their control, however you are here to stop crime lord activity - whatever weapons you need like iron blades or steel axes, you are free to choose. Just annihilate all the enemies on your way! Wear the fictional superhero mask and armor, take katana or axe or other deadly weapons and go to the streets to fight enemies in the outlaw city brawls!

ULTIMATE DARK CITY BRAWLS
This fighting game has been made for fans of spiderman and other superheroes. Act unpredictable with your fast flying spider attack, defeat rivals and gain experience to the next superhero level. Collect cash to unlock new perks, incredible passive and active super abilities to become an absolute champion of top down battle royale! Unleash your rage on the streets of the city of vice!

UNLOCK NEW FEATURES
Enjoy full of action mortal brawls of spider superheroes vs gangsters and their bosses. Use the amazing spider power of the super heroes in the fantasy fight on various locations of the city of dark streets. Use melee attacks or ranged combat with new abilities in the spider man game.

DEFEAT CRIME AS A TRUE HERO OF THE CITY
Like other superhero games, you will get a chance to become a real superhero and rescue the New York city! Play this ultimate top down shooter game for mobile as a superhero right from a silver age of comic books. Your alter ego is Peter and, you know, Parker. One of the most popular and successful superheroes.

DOWNLOAD SUPERHERO SPIDER MAN GAME
You are a super man and you move like a spider avoiding attacks of your enemies. Jump like in a pool into this futuristic war action game with these cool super heroes! Make justice in this city like a true superhero. The game is full of adventures with awesome graphics that can compete with the best gorgeous top down battle royale games! descriptionHTML:
SUPERHERO SPIDER
Have fun with the new and best action superhero top down IO battle royale spider-man game! Rush into the city park or dark street and defeat crime gangs as a true superhero spiderman!

BECOME THE BEST HERO OF BATTLES AGAINST CRIMINAL GANGS
This spider top down action game takes place in the city of criminal gangs. Cruel crime lords attacked the city and your spider superhero should win all the mafia! Civilians need your help, however police or army forces are unable to fight gangster mafia bosses. There is no chance and the city is going to ruin, but you are here as a true spider superhero fighter! People need you to fight away all thugs from the streets. So become a superhero to defeat bosses in the city in one of the best spider heroes fighting games!

IT‚ÄôS EASY TO FIGHT IN THE SUPERHERO SPIDER BATTLE
The spider-man game is made as a classic arcade IO gameplay, like superhero action io games from our childhood and comics. Tap buttons to shoot weapons or do melee attacks - throw axes or hammers. You can choose different weapons before battles. Combine attacks and evasion to become the most dexterous brawler of superheroes games! Become the last player in survival battle royale, get points successful street fights and unlock new weapons for your spider hero!

COURAGEOUS AND FEARLESS SUPER HERO
Criminal gangs took the city and made the streets dark and dangerous. Everything is under their control, however you are here to stop crime lord activity - whatever weapons you need like iron blades or steel axes, you are free to choose. Just annihilate all the enemies on your way! Wear the fictional superhero mask and armor, take katana or axe or other deadly weapons and go to the streets to fight enemies in the outlaw city brawls!

ULTIMATE DARK CITY BRAWLS
This fighting game has been made for fans of spiderman and other superheroes. Act unpredictable with your fast flying spider attack, defeat rivals and gain experience to the next superhero level. Collect cash to unlock new perks, incredible passive and active super abilities to become an absolute champion of top down battle royale! Unleash your rage on the streets of the city of vice!

UNLOCK NEW FEATURES
Enjoy full of action mortal brawls of spider superheroes vs gangsters and their bosses. Use the amazing spider power of the super heroes in the fantasy fight on various locations of the city of dark streets. Use melee attacks or ranged combat with new abilities in the spider man game.

DEFEAT CRIME AS A TRUE HERO OF THE CITY
Like other superhero games, you will get a chance to become a real superhero and rescue the New York city! Play this ultimate top down shooter game for mobile as a superhero right from a silver age of comic books. Your alter ego is Peter and, you know, Parker. One of the most popular and successful superheroes.

comments: The game is really fun and I would love to give it 5 stars but it has some problems. 1. It won't give me achievements like missle kill or gun kill. 2. The aiming system will lock onto the wrong things. 3. When you fire missiles and then die the missiles never hit. 4. The game would be a lot more fun if you could communicate with other players.

At first, i gave this one star. Now I give it 3 stars. Visibility is better, but still need a zoom camera. The biggest issue? You can't receive awards for time played. I get the first 2 awards after 30 minutes of playing. After 30 minutes, game will state you have an award for more time played, but award is not there. Over and over this happens. Award is not avail at this time is the message. Really? Fix this asap.

This is an awesome game. But you have to spend a fortune of real money to get new planes which im not willing to do. The 2 game modes are repetitive I'll play this every once in a while to kill time but like i said in order to get new stuff you have to dig heavily into your wallet. Thanks developer for responding. I will adjust my rating according to what the updates solve.

Hello Azur Interactive Games Limited! I really enjoy the game! Specially for the graphics and the controls but here's the thing that needs to be added in this game: 1.missions: the player can get credits after completing some missions. 2.improved reward:the reward that player get from the battle is to little. Something that's need to fix: Sometimes When i attacking the enemy the enemy is freeze and no matter i shoot or crash, the enemy didn't take any damage which is pretty annoying.

Upon starting again the game and completing the tutorial, I have been able to link again the game to the google account and everything returned to normal. I just managed to buy new plan after playing for 4 days and last night i log in and the whole games starts from scratch with tutorial and 0 planes as if I never played. Really? That is just ludicrous!

title: BLOCKAPOLYPSE‚Ñ¢ - Zombie Shooter
description:
You're the only one who survived airplane crash but it's not your lucky day. You wake up all covered in blood and realize that something isn't right. Where are all the people? Why there are no emergency services at the crash site? 
Suddenly you hear shouting. It turns out that someone is here but barely alive.
Unfortunately you find out that you're on the... zombie island. Entire population is slaughtered and the city is devastated.  


Apparently some mad scientist is responsible for this outbreak. Information from dying survivor suggest that he has some virus which transforms dead people to zombies. 
Your responsibility is to find his location and to execute him. Sadly, you have only one piece of map and you need to find the rest of them. 


Will you survive in a post apocalyptic world like this? Grab your pipe as a first weapon and start the scary journey. Explore huge city filled with dangerous zombies, abandoned buildings and underground metro. 
Drive armored cars and shoot everyone on your way. Defeat zombies with great variety of guns like minigun or just blast them with TNT. 


Night can be creepy, so avoid loneliness and protect yourself with loyal dog companions.

title: Pixel Combat: Zombies Strike
description:
You keep the defense inside the house, which is stormed by a mob of zombies. You need to survive, build a time machine and save all the people!

The game has unique features. Barrier doors, numerous secrets and a huge selection of guns will allow you to fight with many unusual pixel zombies. You will get your own base for the survival and construction of a time machine. Your task is the salvation of mankind.

Passing a variety of 3D locations will not be an easy test. Use fancy guns to succeed. Do not forget to look for secret rooms that are on every level. It will not be an easy task, but the rewards received will make you a great warrior!

Install the Pixel Combat: Zombies Strike shooter and get really awesome emotions!

Always be on the lookout. Among the weak and half-dead, there are monsters with unique abilities. They are ready to tear you to pieces in seconds.

Game features:

- Cubic first-person shooter in confined spaces.
- A huge selection of 3D Locations in a pixel style.
- Survival and battle with many unusual bosses with special abilities.
- A huge arsenal of weapons (knives, axes, pistols, rifles, shotguns, machine guns, a flamethrower, a minigun and much more).
- Pocket edition that you can play on the go.
- Lots of 3D Effects that create the atmosphere of a royal battle.
- Craft weapons and ammunition.
- Pixel version of the Black Ops Zombie Mode.
- Characters and design as in Minecraft.

The game will not leave you indifferent.

Install the shooter game Pixel Combat: Zombies Strike. Survive in the shelter under the onslaught of zombies!

Save humanity!

comments: I love the game. With a couple of exceptions and this is why I gave the game 3 stars, 1. Amount of ads and not being able to skip them. 2. Not being able to watch the ads I want to so I can get the extra coins and diamonds. Make those 2 changes and I will gladly change my rating to 5 stars!!!

Wouldn't be a bad game if it didn't abruptly end. Supposedly there is more coming. It's had the notice since I downloaded the game. Now that I have all the best weapons maxed(because I've had so much time to do so) I have no use for them. No more missions. What a let down

Sniper honor has to b the best sniper game out there by far. Graphics r amazing. Sound effects even better. I love the different missions. They just go on and on. Although u do have to keep upgrading ur weapon to continue on when reached a certain level. And it takes coins to do so which r easily gotten. Just wished health was little longer. Great job developers!

Meh...It's fun to do the missions but not realistic. I mean I know it's a game but how can NPCs get shot and ignore their injuries or take cover. Things are very simplistic. Ads are VERY prevalent and prominent. Upgrading parts of your weapon is kinda dumb. I mean why should you have to upgrade the barrel, body, and magazine if head shots will kill a guy in the previous level? Obviously the devs want to be paid but I'm not thrilled with the mechanics and story of this one to pay for it.

title: Merge Rush Z
description:
What is the best way to deal with waves of zombie in an outbreak? 
Merge guns and send in your deadly girl squad of course!

Merge Rush Z is an addictive free zombie shooter game where you merge powerful guns to battle zombies with your heroine and her squad. Zombies pose a variety of challenges with their size, speed, abilities and powerful bosses! Engage in thrilling firing action, using a combination of guns, deadly items and your wits to clear the zombie waves. Tap, bang and blast your way to survive the Zombie Outbreak!

Game Features:

1. Simple and addictive gameplay.
Feel the sastification of merging ever powerful guns! Tap to control your fire in battle. You never run out of ammo, so fire away!

2. Cute and adorable characters.
Great power comes in tiny packages, and they pack a punch with their deadly weapons and items. Don't let the cute zombies fool you too, they are deadly but you can tell what abilities they have easily.

3. Continue earning even when you are offline.
Don't you think the zombies will attack while you are away? Don't worry, the squad got it covered and even get to earn more coins.

4. Earn daily rewards.
Do your part and kill zombies daily to earn rewards from missions, lucky draw and free loot crates!

Whether you just want to collect more powerful guns or just engage in thrilling shooting action, this game allows you to jump in and begin immediately. Once you start, you won't want to stop firing.

Merge Rush Z is an addictive free zombie shooter game where you merge powerful guns to battle zombies with your heroine and her squad. Zombies pose a variety of challenges with their size, speed, abilities and powerful bosses! Engage in thrilling firing action, using a combination of guns, deadly items and your wits to clear the zombie waves. Tap, bang and blast your way to survive the Zombie Outbreak!

Game Features:

1. Simple and addictive gameplay.
Feel the sastification of merging ever powerful guns! Tap to control your fire in battle. You never run out of ammo, so fire away!

2. Cute and adorable characters.
Great power comes in tiny packages, and they pack a punch with their deadly weapons and items. Don't let the cute zombies fool you too, they are deadly but you can tell what abilities they have easily.

3. Continue earning even when you are offline.
Don't you think the zombies will attack while you are away? Don't worry, the squad got it covered and even get to earn more coins.

4. Earn daily rewards.
Do your part and kill zombies daily to earn rewards from missions, lucky draw and free loot crates!

Whether you just want to collect more powerful guns or just engage in thrilling shooting action, this game allows you to jump in and begin immediately. Once you start, you won't want to stop firing.
summary: Be ready to defend

2807 Keyun Road 12-1,
Tianhe District
Guangzhou
Guangdong, China

comments: Fun game, don't have to spend money at all to enjoy it. Slows down of course at one point but that's every game really. An option to full reset back to the beginning as if you just installed it would be nice, just saying Dev.. lol. Thanks for the game!

Ad warriors are welcomed in this game. Almost everything to do you need to watch an ad for. Just finished a stage and you want your rewards, gotta watch an ad. Ran out of gold, gotta watch an ad. Want to open a crate that dropped during stage, gotta watch ad. The game has potential but its just loaded with ads

Upgrading the side characters so they're not stuck with the same thing for the entire game, adding events or regular updates, having endgame stuff or more upgrades over the stamina/reload speeds etc. Plus some more modes like 10hour trials for good rewards, game has a lot of potential even as the small boring game it is right now.

This game is great. You don't watch ads unless you want to. I rate it 3 stars because I've maxed all my guns out and there's not much else to do in the game. I'll rate it 5 stars if this app gets another update.

Pretty fun so far. Lvl 15 @ moment. I like how you can watch a video to get help / power ups. Happy it's a legit FREE game! Thanks you development and production for keeping your word while keeping game fun and play-able. 5 out of 5

title: Exploration Lite Craft
description:
An amazing infinite blocky open world to build, craft and explore. Exploration Craft lets you be the reality crafting god! 

As a miner and adventurer, you need to build constructions out of textured cubes in this 3D block world. You may also need to combat against evil monsters in the evening using the weapons mined and crafted in the daylight. Explore, mine resources, craft tools and weapons, grow plants, raise you own mounts and cast magic spells. There are no limits to your creativity and imagination in this lite and pro version of the game!

Game Features:
- Deep tutorial and tons of 3D elements
- Procedurally generated open world sandbox environment
- Create your own castles using blocks and other elements
- Train and raise mobs/mounts to help you fight against monsters
