comments: I loved this game. The ads were fine and I even followed them to more downloads and purchases. It was annoying that I couldn't drop bombs in one spot because of the "no ads" icon. But now they've added a big square ad on the screen, blocking out a big chunk of the game board. I guess a bunch of my time just freed up.

The ads are bad, but biggest gripe is the actual gameplay. The people will actually run past others instead of infecting them, or run into a corner instead of towards the crowd. Absolutely frustrating and turns what could be a really fun game into one that gets uninstalled.
0 stars. I understand ad revenue helps fund the game. However the fact that you an ad on the game screen 1/4 the size of the game screen and make us watch ads every other shot is ridiculous.
Fun game but has a lot of ads. I just get through them to see how the next level goes. In reality, the ads don't last that long .
Dont mind the adds, but it's only a shooter game the money doesn't add to anything there's no mini game and it's only fun for me for like one minute. Or when I wanna kill someone it's fun then

title: Dinosaurs Hunter Wild Jungle Animals Shooting Game
description:
Jurassic Dinosaur Hunter Animals Shooting Game is a thrilling 3D game. Explore the vast city map with your giant 3D Dinosaur. In the world of sniper safari gamer, you can hunt dinosaurs of your own choice in Safari Mountains and Africa desert. Thousand years ago in world dinosaur hunting or shooting was a significant problem in human history.

Jurassic Dinosaur Hunter Animals Shooting Game is real thrill and fun if you shoot and crush dinosaur in a sniper safari game. In the real dinosaur hunter game, your mission is to stay alive. In this exciting dinosaur fight game, there is only one winner you or your enemy. So, kill the dinosaurs before they kill you.

Jurassic Dinosaur Hunter Animals Shooting Game is the best game with ancient to modern weapons and Jeep Driving in beautiful 3D real world with green plants. Feel Realistic world dinosaur hunter in this dinosaurs games. There are different dinosaurs noises in this game to make you feel real dinosaur hunting.

Hunt Dinosaurs
In dinosaur fight game, your primary mission is to kill the dinosaurs. In a game, there are several weapons that you can use to kill them. The dinosaurs might sense your presence so take your best shot to become the best huntsman of the wild jungle! Your primary mission in this Jurassic Dinosaur Hunter Animals Shooting Game is to hunt down the dino as the best jungle sniper of 2018 but watch out for attacking predators as they are roaming freely in the forest! Kill them all if needed.

You need to be careful because of dinosaur safari fight game with a mix of action and danger. Only not you are hunting in the forest, but also you are being killed. A lush environment, dangerous paths, cool weapons, the dinosaurs are also called dragons. In a game, you have no car or vehicle to move and hide yourself; you just need to hit them with best-provided weapons.

This outstanding high-end shooting game of hunting in a jungle gives you the fantastic opportunity to explore and dive into the exciting super dino adventure. The game scene has a great dinosaur land in the woods far from the city. The forest environment and thrilling sounds make you feel perfect to play this real dinosaur hunter game.
Use Powerful Weapons

Load up on firepower with destructive weapons like the rocket launcher. You can use different powerful weapons provided in a game and apply your best shooting skills in the dinosaur shooting game.

Grip your launcher tightly, take a perfect aim to test your sniper shooting skills as a real dinosaur hunter and hunt dinosaur like an ideal dinosaur hunter. Get the experience of grand sniper shooting in the real jungle hunting game environment. For hunting in a best dinosaur fighting game, you will have different weapons of different types: pistol, light machine gun, carbine, shotgun, grenade, sniper rifle, flamethrower, grenade launcher. We have added all these weapons for better shooting and show your shooting skills in the real dinosaur hunter game.

Are you looking for best dinosaur hunting games? So, this best real sniper hunter game is for you as it gives you a chance of dino hunting in a rich exotic forest environment. Keep in the mind dinosaurs are dangerous and attack you and you have to kill them as soon as possible maybe they will not be shot with one bullet because of their significant size. title: Stick Fight: The Game Mobile
description:
Stick Fight: The Game Mobile is an official stick-fighting game on mobile. Join the hilarious brawler, Stick Fight: The Game Mobile, which is a physics-based couch/online fighting game where you battle it out as the iconic stick figures from the golden age of the internet. 

Stick it to them! 
Challenge friends and Stick Fight fans from around the world. Control the Stick figure to run,  jump, and fight. Face off against each other in 4- stick fight free-for-alls! After 9 matches, rank the top of 4. Now with an armory of humorous weapons and 100+ maps! 

Relive the classic Stick figure cartoons with action-packed free-for-all duels!

KEY FEATURES:
- The official Stick Fight game on mobile!
- Hilarious battles with up to 3 friends!
- 100 amusing maps, dozens of funny weapons, like guns shooting snakes out, or bomb which blows yourself up, and unlimited ways to die!
- Make your own maps with the built-in level editor: the sky is the limit!
- Customize your stick figures with the brand-new avatar store and color system!
- Brawl online with players from around the world! Download the game and win the glory for your country.
 
KEEP IN TOUCH
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/StickFightTheGame/
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/stickfightgame
Forum:  http://sf.16163.com

comments: Its an overall good game, Except that it doesn't get anymore updates since October 2019, Its fun, just needs some frequent updates with new features and bug fixes. -Average Player Edit: Alright, so there's an update on September 7th of 2020, But it doesn't seem to contain much content which is disappointing, but atleast it's better than no update.

Overall a very good game, though i would get it on steam. Its a time killer! Online matches are balanced and fun. Easy to get gems and coins but it has a little bit of pay to win aspect. You can buy skins with gems and coins you earn or buy them with real money, any skin has its own set of boosts so then again, its balanced unlike other games. Graphics are cartoonish and the controls can be edited and mastered easily. You can publish your own map and people can buy it for coins! Very enjoyable!

This game is fun, but whenever I am fighting it kick's me off. And I like the effects and all, but please fix the bugs. And new profile pictures would be nice, just saying. And ads pop up when I'm fighting and I lose and it lags, sometimes it freezes then I die like, boom.

I love this game but one issue the aiming is not that great and when you aim i wish there was a little icon that shows the shooting botton. Other wise than that this game is super fun every body should try playing the game. Thank you for adding this on moble i thought i was never going to play this game. Have a great day and if you want or can plz fix that thank you. Bye have a great day üôÇ

Its on Mobile! This really made me Happy, BUT. There is Something I would like to be Added to the Game. Single player. Just a Mode where You can Play Alone, and Offline. Without WiFi. I Would Love an Offline Mode! That All. Your Guys' Game is Amazing.

title: Flying Hero Stickman Rope Hero Grand Crime City
description:
Welcome to the open-world flying stickman rope hero grand city crime game with an astonishing idea of stickman as spider rope hero to fight against all the gangster thug mafia in the crime city. This is a vegas gangstar city where criminal mafia involved in robbing the bank, snatching bags, kidnapping schoolboys, terrorist activities, and killing civilians. Police are not adequate for fighting against this increasing city crime & bad mafia. So in this flying stickman rope hero game, you are appointed as a spider stickman rope hero who can use stickman superpowers as rope hero, special stickman moves, stickman gunfighter, and flying stickman hero. This amazing flying stickman rope hero grand city crime game is an action-packed game with thrilling stickman action fighting. Spider rope stickman hero gangster crime city is designed and developed for the open world crime simulator game lovers. So are you ready to enter into the spider rope stickman hero gangster crime game to turn the grand crime city into a crime-free city? Dare yourself to accomplish the challenging & thrilling missions to win the title of stickman hero. 


In flying stickman rope hero game, unlock a variety of stickman superheroes to kill the wanted criminals. Your duty is to chase grand city criminals walking in the streets to vanish their evil plans. Use stickman spider rope skills, find gangster snipers at the building's top and kill them with stickman superhero powers before they shoot their target. City kidnappers kidnapped a schoolboy, they are leaving in a van, so chase the gangsters van to destroy with rope attack. Drug city mafia held a meeting in the town street, your duty is to use your rope hero skills to catch them before they leave. Crime city gangsters are robbing the city bank, go fast and kill them before they robbed the bank and escaped. Become a super stickman spider rope hero in this flying stickman vegas gangster city to vanish all city mafia. 

In this flying stickman rope hero grand city crime game become a stickman survival hero to experience the adventure of the stickman. Destroy evil clones in the dangerous city of the stickman superhero game. Play and enjoy amazing spider stickman games and collect the winning coins by killing all the grand crime city mafia gangsters.

Flying Stickman Rope Hero Grand City Crime Features
- High-Quality Gangster City & Environment
- Variety of Stickman Spider Rope Superheroes
- Amazing Stickman Rope Hero Skills
- Realistic Sounds & Gameplay
- Rope, Punch, Kick, and Fighting

title: Zombie Catchers üßü Hunt the Dead
description:
Catching  zombies has never been so much fun! 

The Best Zombie Casual Game
*** TOP 10 game in over 90 countries! ***
*** TOP 5 action game in over 100 countries! ***

Zombie Catchers is a casual action adventure game in a futuristic world riddled by a zombie invasion! Planet Earth is infested with the undead. But we‚Äôre in luck! A.J. and Bud, two intergalactic businessmen, have decided to build a business empire! They plan to hunt all the zombies and make Earth safe once more - while also making a handsome profit selling Zombie juice.

Choose your weapons and traps & upgrade your character to hunt and capture juicy zombies, take them to your secret underground lab, and... profit!

FEATURES
- Hunt down zombies with your trusty harpoon gun and sneaky traps!
- Unlock exciting new hunting gadgets such as nets, weapons, guns, traps, and jetpacks to help you on your quest to catch zombies!
- Create tasty juices, candies, and awesome snacks from your zombies and sell them to hungry customers in your drive-through cafe!
- Build a food business empire by developing delicious new recipes and upgrading your production lines to deliver maximum profit!
- Discover new territories on the map and find unique zombies to collect and squeeze into lucrative food products!
- Dispatch your army of drones around the world to find awesome zombies to catch!
- Lure out special boss zombies and capture them with your harpoon from your flying ship!
- Develop your skill and do perfect catches to climb the hunting ranks to get more plutonium and exclusive costumes for your character!
- Manage and grow your very own underground lab!
- Complete fun daily challenges to get awesome rewards!
- Play offline - no internet connection necessary!


REVIEWS
Read what people are saying about our fun and casual Zombie Catchers game!

‚ÄúZombie Catchers is a really good game. The game is entertaining, and the quality of the design and production are top notch.‚Äù - Droid Gamers

‚ÄúIt's incredibly charming and accessible, but hunting all the different zombies can make for a worthwhile challenge as well.‚Äù - Pocket Gamer

5/5 ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a great game for anyone who likes platformers and catching zombies.‚Äù

descriptionHTML:
Catching zombies has never been so much fun!

The Best Zombie Casual Game


*** TOP 10 game in over 90 countries! ***
*** TOP 5 action game in over 100 countries! ***

Zombie Catchers is a casual action adventure game in a futuristic world riddled by a zombie invasion! Planet Earth is infested with the undead. But we‚Äôre in luck! A.J. and Bud, two intergalactic businessmen, have decided to build a business empire! They plan to hunt all the zombies and make Earth safe once more - while also making a handsome profit selling Zombie juice.

Choose your weapons and traps & upgrade your character to hunt and capture juicy zombies, take them to your secret underground lab, and... profit!

FEATURES
- Hunt down zombies with your trusty harpoon gun and sneaky traps!
- Unlock exciting new hunting gadgets such as nets, weapons, guns, traps, and jetpacks to help you on your quest to catch zombies!
- Create tasty juices, candies, and awesome snacks from your zombies and sell them to hungry customers in your drive-through cafe!
- Build a food business empire by developing delicious new recipes and upgrading your production lines to deliver maximum profit!
- Discover new territories on the map and find unique zombies to collect and squeeze into lucrative food products!
- Dispatch your army of drones around the world to find awesome zombies to catch!
- Lure out special boss zombies and capture them with your harpoon from your flying ship!
- Develop your skill and do perfect catches to climb the hunting ranks to get more plutonium and exclusive costumes for your character!
- Manage and grow your very own underground lab!
- Complete fun daily challenges to get awesome rewards!
- Play offline - no internet connection necessary!


REVIEWS
Read what people are saying about our fun and casual Zombie Catchers game!

‚ÄúZombie Catchers is a really good game. The game is entertaining, and the quality of the design and production are top notch.‚Äù - Droid Gamers

‚ÄúIt's incredibly charming and accessible, but hunting all the different zombies can make for a worthwhile challenge as well.‚Äù - Pocket Gamer

5/5 ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a great game for anyone who likes platformers and catching zombies.‚Äù
5/5 ‚ÄúEndless fun with surprises at every corner.‚Äù
5/5 ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt ever write a review for any games, but I thought I should on this one. I think this game is amazing.‚Äù

comments: Interesting game. But is covered with ads and micro transactions. You can't even get ad free unless you spend 10$. The game doesn't have alot of depth to it. Every time you think you have progressed and will speed up, that timers get longer, so your progression really just is the same as level one. I could buy better games for less, or play less aggressive, more fun free games.

Amazing and fun game. Was a little unsure if it would be good but it is a little hidden gem. The game play is amazing and worth a bash no matter where you are or what you are doing this game will be for you my only gripe is that the point when you try to upgrade your cafe it goes to an advert if they moved this it would be great. Still with this it is an amazing game

This game is quitely awesome, but i have a problem on this. I played this game everyday, but when i last open it, my level gone back to level 1. All my coins too we're gone. I only had left my zombies and squeeshez but how do i supposed to use and catch zombies if this is what will happen? My level reaches 80 and that's quite heartbreaking. Pls fix this. Sorry for the grammar XD PS. It happened to me 2nd time around. Again sorry for the grammar. :) pls DECA fix this.

This might be the only game i came back to store to give 5 star review. Apsolutly outstanding! Reminds me of old school games. Jewl in bunch of boring games all on same system with energy,gold and arena coins. I wish developers would consider of making comands for shooting jumping and weapon switch a bit bigger than they are, but not much. P.s guys i just love the juice shop! And add more zombies to catch maybe cap to 20 per map or faster drones :D sorry for grammar mistakes! Best of luck!

It was fun 3 years ago. Been waiting for a game update, unlike the recent update that was ultimately the same version as previously. However, now you've added forced advertisements. {10/24/20 response to Developers} (Finished the available version in 2017. Still waiting for an actual game update and not a developers commission update)

title: Golf Hit
description:
Place the golf ball on the tee box, swing the club and strike the ball as hard as possible! Upgrade your gear to move the ball longer distance and unlock new golf equipments!

Golf Hit Features:
- Quick-fire and addictive gameplay: Tap to hit the ball as hard as you can
- Upgrade your stats to reach longer distance
- Hundreds of different balls and clubs available

The sun is shining. It‚Äôs time to play the most exciting golf like never before!

developerAddress: Start Chambers, Wickham‚Äôs Cay II, P. O. Box 2221, Road Town, Tortola, British Virgin Island
recentChanges: v1.36: Fixed some crash bugs of the game. Thanks.
comments: Beware the ads!! Tons u must watch!!Starts out fun, Then the game becomes like all other games.....big time boring! Not to mention, you MUST watch a 30 second ad after each time you hit the ball!!! Even if you don't want to to double your money, you have to watch an ad!!! That is way too much for me!! You get different balls to hit, but the scenery stays the same. I have yet to see the scenery that is shown in the demo, and I've been playing for quite a while now!

I realise you guys need to get paid , but a 30 sec ad every other swing? Come on! By the 3rd ad break, I uninstalled! Never even learned how to swing. Just a suggestion that developers never listen to. Give the "new installs" a chance to try it out a bit longer, before slamming the ads at them. They may love the game enough to keep it a bit longer. It's frustrating when your still trying to understand how to play.

Cool Game. Fun app with great unlockable characters/golf balls and clubs, cool leveling system and great, easy-to-learn controls. The only problem is the abundance of the same ads for a sniper game, and another golf game called "Golf Battle" or something like that. Anyway, keep up the good work on this game!

My third time in the last 3 years downloading this game. Not that great of a game to begin with. Very monotonous! But now we have to watch an ad between almost every shot???!!! There were fewer ads the first 2 times I d/l this game. Now it's an ad nearly every shot. You developers ruined the game for me officially. I'm sure for many others too. Do you people even think about us the users of the game or just about lining your own pockets????

Pretty cool at first. So easy a 5 year old can do it. Then afterwards you find out the characters and ball changes do nothing. This game sucks! So many ads you will know them by heart. How this game got 4.1 Stars? Beats me. Had promise but its basically and one level 8bit game.

title: ZOMBIE HUNTER
description:
Shoot zombies and be the last to survive in Zombie Hunter - a fierce world war of unkilled zombies

From the creator of various addictive cyber zombie games such as ‚òÖDead Target, Sniper Zombie, Dead Warfare, or Mad Zombies‚òÖ, Zombie Hunter - Free Shooting Offline Games has been designed to build the shelter. The new feature makes the zombie shooting offline games more addictive than ever! Take your sniper to kill zombies on the highway or anywhere in the apocalypse city and survive to last! 

The deadly zombie apocalypse outbreak in 2080 and the d-day came. Human life was not as before. Wild zombies run around the streets, even by daylight, making humans the target of the unkilled dead. They spread the deadly virus to any target they meet and trigger the cyber zombeast pandemic.   Shooting zombies into the dead with sniper was all they needed to do if they wanted to live among walking death by daylight!

Join campaigns, aim targets, and fire to prove that you are the most excellent shooter in this cyber zombie offline game. Trigger the hunting extinct inside you, attack the unkilled, and become the zombie hunter king. 

STUNNING SHOOTING GRAPHICS
Suppose you want to experience a shooting game with stunning graphics in every detail. In that case, Zombie Hunter - Free Shooting Offline Games is the right choice. With breathtaking pictures using the latest android technology, the shooting effect is realistic and stunning in different maps or attack. Shoot on the highway or in the ruined hospitals is gorgeous and impressive also.  Take your shadow guns and fight against the zombie d-day now! 

WIDE RANGE OF ZOMBIE TO DISCOVER
The undead surrounds the city, and there's no place to hide. The zombie virus is wild and dangerous, even in the daylight. Unkilled death is not only created with deadly skills but also varies in several shapes and actions! Since they can crawl on the ceiling or floor in Zombie Hunter. Live or die; it's up to you. So, take your gun or any weapons and shoot them into the dead. Be well-prepared since no one knows the life after the d-day look.
 
THRILLING OFFLINE SHOOTING GAME 
Most of the zombie games require wifi or an internet connection to play, and you want to find an offline game that can play anytime. Then, Zombie Hunter - Free Shooting Offline Games is at your service! Connect to wifi to download actual contents and play for the last percentages of battery! Save more data and play without wifi!

BROAD VARIETY OF GUN AT YOUR SERVICE
Zombie Hunter got diversity in weapon systems such as sniper, cyber gun, pistol gun, bow, machine gun, and more. Grab guns, keep a finger on the trigger, and shoot to protect your life in this addictive offline game. Killing is no more difficult in Zombie Hunter. This zombie game gives you a cyber environment to use different shooting tactics in a zombie hunting world! Kill zombies with a single trigger and stay alive! Show your friends who is the real and top d-day sniper shooter!

BUILD AND UPGRADE YOUR SHELTER
Survivors also need to build their shelters to ensure that they can live through the world war zombie's tough time. A shelter is a place that can provide you food, material, fuel, and metal, which are crucial to join campaigns and fight against the uprising attacks! Death is coming to humans no matter by daylight or night, and no one can assure your life. Only you can decide who to live with since mercy equals death! Keep your life in your hands!

Download Zombie Hunter, play free, and offline now! Get ready for the apocalypse d-day and save your life after the daylight world war of virus zombie!

comments: I can only give one star due to how much it just seems that this game was just a cash grab. Limiting melee options and making people pay for it? Forcing people to grind "weapon power" in the first campaign? I gave it a fair chance, played like 30 minutes and was disgusted. This could of been a good game. But instead they are trying to milk every dollar. Ive seen better. Stop charging for melee for god sakes. Make a good game and people will be willing to pay money. This is just bad.

A good single player FPS. It has elements of pay-to-win, which is concerning during contests, a greedy player could easily buy the top awards with $. Hopefully the devs will figure out how to keep the game fair for all players, such as separating players and buyers into different leagues...but I'll def keep playing until PTW takes over like most fps apps.

I played the game for a few minutes and wasn't impressed. Its a revamp of Dead Target mixed with a dash of Call of Duty 2 zombie mode. The controls are not smooth , the graphics are so-so , the devs are not generous with the gold bars (1/vid). My summary , its a weak attempt at a knockoff , and its pay to win. I would not recommend this to a friend. I gave a 3* rating. 1*-BGM , 1*-for the walkthrough , and 1*- for keeping my attention longer than 5 minutes.

This is a whole new review of this game, I had problems with losing all of my progress reached out to support and nothing they suggested helped so I uninstalled the game, but I really enjoyed playing so I decided to download it again and start all over even though I lost progress money (real), from buying upgrades etc. and guess what people got all the way to region 3, again and when I hit start, instead of starting it did the exact same thing don't waste your time on this game

Played the latest event and got all the way to the #1 spot on the leader board. The event ended at 5:00 local time and I didn't recieve any of the due prizes from said event. Reached out to customer support and got nothing, what a joke

comments: Terrible. Awesome to kill time, but the forced ads after just about every single round is a real buzz kill, especially when its after dying instantly to an AI spawned with really fast 1-shot projectiles killing the instant you spawn in. Not only do they spawn with unbeatable set ups sometimes, they have up to 6,000HP is as high as I've noticed. I have 717HP, still a 1-shot with anything let alone this. Update brought literally changes whatsoever. Game is more frustration than entertainment.

I would give this a 4 star but the way you made the game really makes me mad like how can your AI kill me without looking at me?!?! And how can your AI one shot me even though i have alot more HP then the weapon does to me plus i use there weapons amd they are not that good and mine are upgraded really high i would recommend this game if you wanna get mad but beside from that i really think this game is good but still needs work but it is good

This game is so fun I can not stop playing it. It is the most finest game on google play I have ever played. I have never played a game this fun it is really fun super super super fun game I hope every body rated 5 stars I hope who ever looks at this if they don't have the game I hope they will downloaded it so I hope you give it 5 star please.

Decent game. For anyone interested in downloading this. There is many ads. Also the game is near impossible in Silver league. Sometimes you will die to die to tiny joystick size and not being able to change it. Good game. Needs lots of work

Wish i could give a 5 star but If you dont have good loot by the silver league sorry but your not going to get past stage 2 the ai has 1,000 to 10,000 hp and you will most likely have 300 by then not to mention but the ai one shots if you dont have better gear then the ai Will you please lower the ai's gear to match yours please and thank you

Build your Robot Fighting in this ultimate action and sports adventure. Unleash furious attacks in one-one combat using special moves, jabs, punches with legendary parts of your favorite heroes Atom, Zeus, Midas, NoisyBoy and new superstar Atom Prime.

Battle in the boxing realms with 1000s of unique robots and dominate 10 inspiring arenas in this epic sequel. Defeat the Legends of the New Real Steel Era & an All New Mysterious Super Boss to Reign Supreme as The Undisputable Champion!

BUILD YOUR CHAMPION 
Unleash your unique identity from 1500+ colossal robot parts of 32 Exclusive Robots. Choose from iconic Heads, massive Torsos and powerful Hands & Legs. Customize your Robots with exciting Paint, Intro that mimics your style and announces your unique Name to be acclaimed as the King Maker of Real Steel Champions!

comments: Love the game! It's super fun, rip offs are amazing, specials are fantastic, I even love all the intros you can choose from. There's one minor flaw though. The fact that you have to pay 8230 for a frost leg is a bit too cheap. For an elemental part, I think it should be more expensive. Totally would recommend though!

It is a really good game and I like it, however I did not have enough space on my phone and then I decide to delete it. A few months later I decide to re-download it and load my old profile, but then this screen pops up and tells me that my profile is "unauthorized" and to login at a different time! I have never ever hacked and done anything and don't understand why that is there. Please fix this reliance games because I have no idea why this is there and have never done anything wrong.

While the game is overall amazing, I think it would be better if you had the option to replay fights after completing a region, because after you complete everything, its very hard to get silver coins and the replayability becomes hard. If you could try to include this, I believe the game would be perfect!

Amazing Game.I really love this game. But I am having an issue, I once tried to login with facebook but due to connectivity issue I couldn't so I closed the game and then started again with good internet connectivity but now whenever I start the game it just keep showing please wait... and won't start the game and if I turn off the internet then game works properly and even if I have good connection but though it is continuously shows that I am offline.

I love this game.Last time when i had this game on my old phone i was like the best i finished the whole game but after 2 years i found my old phone some where in my living room but when i on my phone suddenly all my real steel game was gone! And when i install it back my proggress was gone but dont worry i dont hate this game I love it. Well also i have to start over again soooooo ok

title: City Fighter vs Street Gang
description:
A crime fighting warrior wants to drink orange juice but someone broke into his house and stole all his juices. He finds out that The Street Gang stole all the juices around the world for their boss. He must fight against gangsters, mafias, robbers and thieves to get his orange juices back. Help him out?

Welcome to the sequel of famous action fighting game ‚ÄòCity Fighter vs Street Gang!

City Fighter vs Street Gang is a fun, excellent retro fighting action game where you can show off your special fighting styles and skills like karate, Kung Fu, Muay Thai, Kickboxing and boxing to the Street Gang. You will see how to fight hand to hand, unarmed, with your punches and kicks how to use yourself with amazing skill to block the enemy kicks and punches.

Don‚Äôt underestimate them though! They are powerful street fighters. You are given many different defenses and attack techniques to help you like punching, kicking, catching, throwing, and dodge. It‚Äôs up to you to punch, kick, smash and knock them all out. Rage is on! Stick to your guns and prepare for a ruthless battle in city mayhem.
You must be a superhero to get back your orange juice against bad guys like prisoner, gangster and mafia in this amazing game. You will survive in this battle and become a champion. With this real fighting experience, you will be surprised. 3D animation graphics make you feel like inside the game. Street fight will be your best game between all the fighting games and unlimited action will surround you.

Open boxes to discover and equip new weapons and eat bananas to gain more strength. Collect oranges from gangsters and unlock new warriors. You can pick up varied weapons and equipment to strike the enemies from the ground.

Upgrade your character‚Äôs Health, Punch Power, Kick Power and Weapon Technique to beat stronger enemies.

You can play with Arya, Hitman, Jason and more. They are all martial arts masters who have different fighting styles and powers. Choose wisely!

The combat never ends. Boss challenges and gang beasts await. Beat the gang and bosses to put an end to injustice.

Battle Royale begins. Survive all the levels and reach your beloved oranges. Feel the real fighting experience and become a hero.

Features
- Many characters with different fighting moves
- Many different gangsters and bosses to fight
- Quality graphics and smooth gameplay
- Retro style game
- Discover different combo skills
- Easy controls
- Tasty oranges!

Download City Fighter vs Street Gang Now for free.

title: The Walking Zombie 2: Zombie shooter
description:
ZOMBIES!!The world after the zombie apocalypse is a grim place. You were born into it, so you will have to struggle to survive and fight against many kinds of zombies, bandits and dangerous boss monsters. You will go on important story quests and many side quests, level up your skills and perks, sell and buy equipment, and communicate with the (un)lucky survivors in our free mobile FPS/RPG.

SURVIVAL RPG AND FIRST PERSON SHOOTER
Walking Zombie 2 is a classic FPS game with story, with dozens of quests and a lot of shooting stuff with different weapons - it is also a game you can play offline, without internet connection. Your main enemies are zombies who already control the world. They are everywhere, in many different kinds and - most importantly - in great numbers. You will be using guns with different ammo, grenades or melee weapons to finish them off. Meanwhile, you will be able to heal yourself with medkits and food. As you complete more and more quests, your character will become stronger with better equipment, enhanced skills and gained perks. Are you going to get more hit points, a better chance when lockpicking locks or a lower fuel consumption while driving across the world map? What will you do to limit the effect that the dead have on the world?

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Classic single player post-apocalyptic FPS
‚Ä¢ Attractive modern polygon graphics style
‚Ä¢ Karma system - good and bad deeds create new options and encounters
‚Ä¢ Dozens of stories and side quests
‚Ä¢ Many weapons, protective gear and other equipment - become your own survival squad
‚Ä¢ Offline survival game - you can play offline
‚Ä¢ Optional crafting and building in open world part of the game
‚Ä¢ Weapon skins
‚Ä¢ A variety of enemies - zombie walkers, bandits, and huge boss mutants
‚Ä¢ Traders in settlements
‚Ä¢ You can complete optional missions for zombie hunter Ace
‚Ä¢ Cars and trucks - it's faster than walking and you can store additional loot from the dead in trunk!
‚Ä¢ Funny mini games


STORY OF THE CHOSEN ONE WITH A TRAGIC PAST
Can your story end happily after such a tragic beginning? Because of the circumstances surrounding your birth, you are the only one who can save the world. You are immune to the effects of the virus that turns people and animals into zombies. That also makes you a perfect weapon against the undead masters of the planet and the symbol of hope for a better tomorrow. Together with friends that you will make on your path, find out the whole truth about your origin and search for the way to create a cure, despite the dangers lurking behind every corner.

3D ZOMBIE SHOOTER THAT KEEPS EXPANDING
We are still working hard on new content for the game. Not only more story arcs where you explore this dangerous zombie frontier and try to make world better place for living and the living. We work on new mechanics so you can craft things for your survival like gas and ammo on crafting tables in the houses you purchase. Also, not only dead will be your target as your actions can trigger hatred in some of the survivors - bandits, corrupted politicians, cultists, gangs etc. Zombie age continues but with new tools in your arsenal, you will be able to endure it!

comments: Shockingly good. My expectations were low for this game, but this has got to be one of the best mobile games out there. Animations, voice acting, weapons, items, and areas are all fantastic. Killing zombies feels great and it never gets old. My only problem with the game is that the missions can get pretty repetitive. They stay the same but increase in difficulty. But this game is fantastic and I'd recommend it to anyone who loves zombies and funny diologue.

This game is amazing, even though I haven't played too much yet it's very entertaining. The graphics are decent and the game runs really well but after playing for a certain amount of time I'd say around 20 minutes the sound will cut out and very soon after the game will freeze and I seem to lose progress when this happens. If this was fixed this game would without a doubt be one of the best games I've ever found on the app store and will definitely get a 5/5 Star rating from me!

Love the game but got a problem with it,,spent two whole days trying downloading city of the sun (not working) when it reaches 42 or 51mb it says you r not connecting to the internet or something. Sometimes it freezes without downloading a thing that ate 4gb of data my internet's good but I'm so pissed off. That wont stop me, fix it. I'll be keeping it see if it get fixed coz I felt like I was being robbed and cheated for no freakin reason. Help me :A-S-A-P.

Certainly worth paying to remove those annoying ads, but I'm experiencing crashes whenever I play for like fifteen minutes straight. Lowering the graphics doesn't help. The game also loses sound at around the same time, so I don't really know what's the problem. Otherwise, the game is quite entertaining. The controls are simple, though moving, aiming and shooting simultaneously can be kinda difficult. A fair variety of weapons, but customization is expensive given the in-game currency's rarity.

Pretty amazing game. Though I haven't played it that much, so far it is a gem, and I've never played anything so well made on mobile. It has great graphics, gameplay, and minimal ads. So far on my journey through the app store, this game is the best, or near-best game I have played. PS: It is amazingly optimized, and runs on my bad phone while looking great.

comments: First of all, this is a copy from a PC game years ago. It's fine because who doesn't copy anyway? Then, it's the ads. Ads are fine and they are in every single free game nowadays, but I reckon it's a little too greedy that every single ad is the 30 seconds kind. Come on, other games got 5 seconds ones and 15 seconds ones for different level of reward. Then it's the stamina of course. This is complete grinding and you are locking that with stamina which is ads again. No thanks.

Biggest complaint with the game, after playing for 10 minutes, is that I have to actually control the game by tapping the lower ends of the screen. Phone's nowadays are heavy and it's very unnatural to play one-handedly by holding the lower end of a phone. I wish there was an option that I can tap the middle of the screen or something so I could actually play with one hand.Hopefully something that can be implemented in the options? But for now, it's unplayable to play with one hand for myself.

Extremely ad heavy game. You can watch an ad to do almost anything. Interesting and fun little distraction. Don't rely on the Autoplay function you're character has a tendency to not move out of very often obvious heavy attacks, which you then tend to die from, thus wasting stamina on something that should be relatively easy for the character. Trackers and the tower have a tendency to forget your progress points even when on Wi-Fi.

The game is fun, but I keep getting a "Game error. Restarting soon." message and it constantly happens. I've updated it, uninstalled and reinstalled it several times. In the small points in between these messages, the game is a lot of fun, but those messages happen so frequently that it makes it next to impossible to play the game. Fix this ASAP!!!!

So when I first saw this game I thought it was gonna be ass. 2 months later and I'm right on a few things. First of all the game lags alot (this might just be me). And also the gameplay is a bit easy. I am only a bit through the game but so far the game has been a bit boring at times. But the good things are. The art style reminds me of hollow Knight. Also the game doesn't shove adds in yourself all the time. Overall good game but fix some of those issues and it would be 5 stars

title: Jurassic Monster World: Dinosaur War 3D FPS
description:
The game is still under active development. We carefully read all your comments and feedback to make sure every new update counts. Thanks for your support!

Jurassic Monster World: Dinosaur War 3D FPS is a mobile game like you've never seen before. Battle metal-plated monster dinos in a post-apocalyptic world! A synchronized 5x5 PvP free-to-play action shooter with different modes! Control beasts on land or in the sky, fully mechanized, augmented or organic: the choice is yours!
Tame and command dozens of blood-thirsty metal hunters ready to destroy anything in their paths to win!

Gameplay: 

Unique setting! 
A harsh new world where only the strongest survive!
Game mechanics variety 
Chew through enemies in melee attacks or strike from a distance, sabotage on the sly or hurl headlong into battle!
Tons of different creatures
Metal, organic or augmented: take your pick! 

Land and air battles
Sky battle fans rejoice! We've got flying dinos and more. Pick your battleground!
A wealth of weapons
Equip your dino with any weapon you want, from traditional guns to next-gen energy blasters!

The game has 3 main dino types, including: 

1. Full Metal ‚Äì AI machines devoid of any biological tissue and mercy. Specially equipped with an energy shield against weapons from the old world.
Tyrannosaurus is at the top of the metal jungle food chain. He can jump from place to place with super speed and stun several enemies at once. Deadly in melee battles. One false move and the enemy is toast.

2. Organic ‚Äì Life is evolving in round 2 upon the ruins of the destroyed old world. Now monsters from the Jurassic Era are out to kill, not to live.
Spinosaurus is an insatiable hunter killer. Dino butchers preying on lesser animals, spinosauri can hold their own in melee battle and against enemies with superior strength. Their jumps give them unmatched mobility, and their mighty roar can stun a whole group of enemies, leaving them open to deadly attacks.

3. Augmented ‚Äì On the border of human and machine, they are the best of both worlds. Human intellect mixed with advanced tech form a deadly combination.
Triceratops ‚Äì You don't want to get in his way when he's charging. Triceratops are always on the hunt for their next victim. Their razor sharp horns are tough to dodge in melee battle, and these beasts can even restore their own health if they need to.  

Jurassic Monster World: Dinosaur War 3D FPS is free to download and play, but some in-game elements are available for purchase. The game requires a stable internet connection. Mobile internet will do, but Wi-Fi is best.

Join our community:
https://www.facebook.com/fullmetalmonsters/

Equip your dino with any weapon you want, from traditional guns to next-gen energy blasters!

The game has 3 main dino types, including:

1. Full Metal ‚Äì AI machines devoid of any biological tissue and mercy. Specially equipped with an energy shield against weapons from the old world.
Tyrannosaurus is at the top of the metal jungle food chain. He can jump from place to place with super speed and stun several enemies at once. Deadly in melee battles. One false move and the enemy is toast.

2. Organic ‚Äì Life is evolving in round 2 upon the ruins of the destroyed old world. Now monsters from the Jurassic Era are out to kill, not to live.
Spinosaurus is an insatiable hunter killer. Dino butchers preying on lesser animals, spinosauri can hold their own in melee battle and against enemies with superior strength. Their jumps give them unmatched mobility, and their mighty roar can stun a whole group of enemies, leaving them open to deadly attacks.

3. Augmented ‚Äì On the border of human and machine, they are the best of both worlds. Human intellect mixed with advanced tech form a deadly combination.
Triceratops ‚Äì You don't want to get in his way when he's charging. Triceratops are always on the hunt for their next victim. Their razor sharp horns are tough to dodge in melee battle, and these beasts can even restore their own health if they need to.

Jurassic Monster World: Dinosaur War 3D FPS is free to download and play, but some in-game elements are available for purchase. The game requires a stable internet connection. Mobile internet will do, but Wi-Fi is best.

Join our community:
https://www.facebook.com/fullmetalmonsters/
summary: Dive into the crazy PVP action on dinosaurs, titans, and monsters!

comments: Loving the way things are coming. I know you said it wasn't in the works, but the option to pick match modes would still be nice. Lastly, it'd be super to add friends without needing a special code, or a chat feature that would allow for those to be shared for team building. Thank you so much for the added methods of collecting d crystals. Can't wait to see what you do next. Just had the thought of maybe allowing as many items or dinos to be upgraded as the player has riders. Or Engineers?

I'm curious as to if actual people play this game, or if it's all bots. Good game, but the bots just walk in circles. Usually its 5 v 5 but with the bots it takes forever for a match to end, which usually it's a person thrown in at the end of the match and they come sweep your game. Gameplay is good, but the shop items are too expensive and it takes a long time to upgrade things. Needs less bots, better matchmaking, and maybe a guild system to find actual people.

After update developer listened and make it more easier to blue collar worker to play and buy in this game know we have a chance against rich asian and middle east pockets with a bit of cash and everyday play you can beat those wallets well done developer only flaw servers are getting laged.

Initial rating, 3 star. Have only played 2 matches. It's a copy of war robots, another theme and some improvements, but waiting to see what the game can bring. Will increase amount of stars if the game delivers.

Loved the game and even the new additions being made to it...but there is insane amounts of lag nearly every session/match since the update, despite having consistently stable connections on my end. Its as if the servers are not able to handle the surge in players since the updates a few days ago. Would love to see this fixed.

title: Sniper Strike ‚Äì FPS 3D Shooting Game
description:
Intercept, eliminate and extract. It‚Äôs time to engage the enemy!

Sniper Strike is a high-octane sniper experience that pits you in battle across three gameplay modes and hundreds of missions. Experience a AAA rated sniper game like never before on mobile.

Scout through immersive environments, engage in rapid-fire combat and build the ultimate super-soldier as you customise their state of the art gear. 

Team up with Wolf, Jackson and the rest of Strike Force as you target hostiles and take down the evil Elite Order. Go head to head with friends in online combat and shoot to the top of the leaderboard.

‚óè Wipe out Elite Commanders and their henchmen with satisfying kill shots!

‚óè Buddy up with allies to cover Delta Team and rescue hostages.

‚óè Seek out online friends (and foes) and challenge them to LIVE sniper duels!

‚óè Join forces with Clan friends to smash missions, and prepare for the ultimate showdown with the Elite Order.

‚óè The more you win, the better you play ‚Äì upgrade and engage in harder, faster challenges that will send you flying up the leaderboard!

Whether you're engaged in live PvP sniper duels, rescuing hostages with breach specialist Wolf, or fighting to be the last man standing in arena mode, this is one epic FPS experience that you don't want to miss!

comments: I'm giving it 3 stars just because it is a very fun game and I play it fairly often. The lack of a 4th & 5th Star is simply because it is heavily geared (pun intended) towards pushing one to spend on IAP's. There are campaign zones, arena missions, PVP (this last is pointless once you get past the tutorial stage), and each zone or stage calls for certain weaponry, armor, perks, etc, which will cost you a lot of money as you upgrade equipment and buy better along the way. Fun game, but costly.

My review and correction needed: 1. Weapons are expensive. All players cannot afford this. 2. Normal rifle also should have relevant capacity like premium rifle at least in upgrade.3. Duplicate of opponent should be removed in PVP mode.4. Option to save the game so it can be continued when a mobile is changed.5. Option to buy gold through virtual money too. 6. In campaign mode, correction needed. If all these are taken into account and corrected then it is one of the world class games.

It's amazing and I couldn't think of anything else it's challenging it makes you think it's like a puzzle every time and when you do his shooting part it sad that you're shooting other people lessingham the game is like you're saving a country and an existing secure in the army or you're a soldier saving its family or everything is just gonna be so much fun and it's really interesting when you play, and I just I love it so much! And it's just amazing So this thing's amazing!!!

PVP is a waste. You play against the computer times I played. Developers will tell you otherwise, but they're lying. I quit playing it for the most part. No real sense playing when you're spotted as soon as you enter. You've no idea where they are, but they watch you for a few seconds then kill you. Or they'll disappear and appear elsewhere and get you. Better yet, you'll have one in your scope, he's looking down, as you're about to shoot, he looks up and shoots you. So the developers are lying.

it is very good game but the problems is missions are too short and easy.only I liked machine gun mission but in that also some rare of enemies are there to kill so it is very easy to play the game add some more action in the game .I dont like rifle,pistol,boss, missions.why because this missions are not challenging missions.only we have kill 2or3 enemies thats it.I want some challenging and tough missions to play .graphics are very good but add more things we do like blasting with rocket etc

title: Infinity Ops: Online FPS
description:
Infinity Ops
A multiplayer FPS in a sci-fi setting! 
The event of the game take place in the distant future, when humanity has surpassed the limits of technological development and the world has descended into the chaos of interplanetary warfare!
Player will face team PvP combat as classes like Recruit, Saboteur, Tank, and Assault! Each of the classes has its own features and abilities. 

Features:
‚ùñ Clans 
Create your own clan and invite other users or friends and spend time in the game together!

‚ùñ Armament 
A wide variety of weapons are available in-game, from assault and plasma rifles to laser machineguns and grenade launchers! Each weapon has its own unique properties and features.

‚ùñ Material interaction
Low gravity frees players to jump far and high, while universal gravity can affect running speed!

‚ùñ Jetpacks 
Use a personal flight device to more quickly and effectively conduct combat operations.

‚ùñ Fantastic 3D graphics 
Excellent, detailed 3D character and map modelling.

‚ùñ Optimization for weak devices 
The game is optimized for devices with low technical characteristics. Choice of graphics for different phones!

‚ùñ Easy controls 
Intuitive control and easy interface won‚Äôt leave you struggling to master the learning curve!

Game modes
‚âõ Team Deathmatch
Two teams battle for domination. The team with the highest score at the end of the round wins;

‚âõ Deathmatch
Free mode. You fight for yourself. The player with the highest score at the end of the round wins;

‚âõ HARDCORE
A more realistic combat experience with doubled damage; For true pro players!

‚âõ Custom game
Create a game with your own rules. Invite your friends to your custom game lobby and battle together!

More features
‚ò¢‚ò¢‚ò¢ MAGNIFICENT GRAPHICS AND OPTIMIZATION FOR WEAK DEVICES! ‚ò¢‚ò¢‚ò¢ 
Immerse yourself in the experience of online battles in the future with stunning graphics and perfect controls. Take to the frontline of each battle.

‚ò¢‚ò¢‚ò¢ IMPROVE ARMOR AND ARMS! ‚ò¢‚ò¢‚ò¢
Improve your character, upgrade weapons, reload time, armor and movement. Each character has its own traits. Buy additional gadgets, such as: mines, grenades, medkits, and shock-blades.

‚ò¢‚ò¢‚ò¢ A DAILY REWARD! ‚ò¢‚ò¢‚ò¢
Enter the game daily to receive free presents, quests, and tons of free stuff!
Do your daily quests and improve your equipment!

Dear users, the game is still in the post-development phase. Please share any bugs and errors you experience, as well as any requests and ideas you have through the support team.


========================
COMPANY COMMUNITY: 
========================

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/azur_games

comments: Full of ads, every after the game, there's no endless of ad. Why? I KNOW U need money but I think it's too much. Like every single time after the game ends. I'll give it 4 star for the graphics, awesomeness of the overall, but a game that you can't enjoy... I dunno.. Sad.

title: ‚ò¢ The Wanderer : A Post-Apocalyptic Survival
description:
‚ò¢ Wander the harsh wasteland as one of the last remaining survivors searching for supplies and battling any unwanted visitors in this 'Fallout' inspired 'idle text-based post-apocalyptic adventure survival' game.

‚ò¢ Gather supplies from Canned Food to Rare Candy as well as improving your gear.

‚ò¢ Trade your Caps with a local trader

‚ò¢ Craft items for exploration

‚ò¢ Look after a Pet 

‚ò¢ Speculate on the supplies you have against the dangers of the wasteland

‚ò¢ Increase your camp level and increase your overall storage capacity.

‚ò¢ Find all the missing Camper Van parts and use it to travel the world map a lot quicker

‚ò¢ Make tough decisions which could affect your Karma and leave you with the outcome

‚ò¢ Fight off bandits in a stats based combat system

‚ò¢ Tap Tap Tap away and see how many days can you last?

‚ò¢ Good Luck Wanderer!

Visit the Wiki for tips and detailed information - https://the-wanderer-game.fandom.com/wiki/The_Wanderer

Join the DISCORD and be up to date with regular updates and post bugs so that they can be sorted as soon as possible! - https://discord.gg/97av7Nf

comments: I really didn't think I would like the game based on the picture it looks kind of corny but it's actually really fun and addicting I'm having a really good time I've been playing for like an hour and a half straight now. Basically you search houses and look for loot. I'm currently looking for materials for my Camp so I can upgrade some things and build some work benches and stuff like that to be able to make tools and weapons. There's a really cool option to watch ads to get supply drops. (:

It's an okay game, it's definitely fun in the start but as the game progresses it gets super grindy, you have to search a LOT of buildings to get the materials that you need and it honestly becomes really boring after you've been to all the far cities on your map. After that it becomes a grindfest to upgrade your base and it's buildings

Fun and Unique So Far! I've only had the game for a day or 2. So, I don't want to overreact on the stars. However, the bit graphics are awesome (love the nostalgia). The buttons maybe could be a little bit more responsive, but being new that kind of helpa me from making mistakes (I'm sure it would be annoying the more experted you are at the game). Also, it would be MUCH more fun if you could choose the items you transfer!

Its honestly a pretty fun game, ive gotten lost in it for an hour or two a few times. Only thing i would have to say is if you break a part on your buggy and buy the part pack you should be able to stack the parts you already own. Besides that it's an awesome game!

Its great I love the combat the only thing I don't like is when a mutant bug attacks because pressing on squares is more luck that skill i do however like the combat were the bar slides along and you have to press at the right time to attack/dodge i have never had a problem with this game at least not yet great game tho totally worth 5 stars.

title: DEER HUNTER CLASSIC
description:
Return to the wilderness in the most visually stunning FPS hunting simulator on Android!

Travel from North America‚Äôs Pacific Northwest to the Savannah of Central Africa in an epic journey to hunt the world‚Äôs most exotic animals!

BRAND NEW CLUB HUNTS!
Join your friends in global cooperative challenges where teamwork is critical. Work together to complete hunting objectives and collect rewards!

EXPLORE A LIVING WORLD
Immerse yourself in diverse environments filled with over 100 animal species! Watch out for attacking predators including bears, wolves, and cheetahs! Hunting deer is just the beginning!

MAXIMUM FIREPOWER
Enjoy endless customization as you perfect your weapons. Upgrade magazines, scopes, stocks, barrels and more! Take hunting to the next level!

COLLECT TROPHIES
Compete for bragging rights as you bag the biggest animals with Google Play achievements and leaderboards!

High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!

It‚Äôs open season join the hunt today!

Developed for fans of FPS games, Hunting Simulators, and the Deer Hunter franchise.

Meh. Graphics are ok. Controls are a bit erratic. Some of the levels are designed to make you spend energy. Would give at least one more star if the reload button could be moved a bit. title: Sky Fighters 3D
description:
Climb into the cockpit of your favorite fighter aircraft, get ready to take-off, and soar into the skies brimming with visceral dogfights!

Fly solo as a lone wolf or command a fleet of acrobatic aircraft to establish air superiority over the battlefield. Perform dizzying acrobatic maneuvers, get the enemy in your sights and hit the trigger to shoot them down. Become the supreme lord of the skies in Sky Fighters now!

Game Features:
- 48+ realistic missions including air-to-air and air-to-surface combats
- Pilot 10+ authentic planes with rich weapons customization
- Amazing 3D graphics, intuitive controls and immersive gameplay

comments: Thise game is the best is just that I vu play in android but every 2 fight it kicks me out but the game I bin playing with it lately in ya need better update but the game is good in all ya just need more updates in the game is a little big lagging in every 2 fight it kicks me out but the game is really good is one of the best games of all is like the third best game but is really good the game there's a game between those game in a nother game is just that the other game is like a little bitter

While not terribly challenging, the game is satisfyingly entertaining. I would like to be able to time the kicks and punches closer together rather than punch, pause, kick, pause etc. Additionally, a broader, perhaps more contemporary selection of skins and accessories would enhance replayability. All in all, a very enjoyable game. üëç

This game is really fun, and it's stands out from those dumb cash grabs using cheap models and unoriginal ideas. However, there is a glitch that happens with bosses mostly, where your opponent can hit you once before you get to finish them off. This is frustrating as it feels really good to get a perfect victory against a boss, so please do your best to fix it.

The game itself is actually pretty cool. A lot of fun and a good way to kill time, but the dang ADS! Jesus...... Do we have to watch an ad after EVERY FIGHT! And it's the SAME one every time. At least break up the monotony with several different ads if we have to watch them. The other thing is the swipe system. It's a little sluggish. If I'm no good, I can live with that but getting my butt kicked because he won't move with every swipe is frustrating. Diverse ads and better controls.üëç

It's fun for awhile but the opponents dont seem to get any harder the further you get into the game. It's too simple. I usually win without them landing a punch. Its 5 strikes and then Finish Him! No challenge. Then its another ad I've seen dozens of times before. The skins and scenes are fine. Who cares? Just make the opponents more challenging. It's not small children playing this.

title: Gangstar New Orleans OpenWorld
description:
The gold standard for open-world action games is back, this time in the fascinating city of New Orleans. With hundreds of vehicles, an outrageous arsenal, explosive action and complete freedom to explore this vast city, you have all the tools to become a real Gangstar.

Biker gangs, crooked cops and even Voodoo priests prowl these streets and hide in the bayou. And you? You‚Äôre the least common Gangstar of all! Rule the underworld and claim the Big Easy as your own criminal capital‚Ä¶ by any means necessary.

AN OPEN WORLD BUSTLING WITH LIFE‚Ä¶ AND CRIME!
‚Ä¢ Have fun shooting your way through story missions in New Orleans's varied city districts: from the French Quarter to the slums to the mysterious bayou. Each district has its own unique flavour and action to discover.

‚Ä¢ Enjoy triple-A graphics and Gangstar New Orleans‚Äô amazing game soundtrack while you experience the city's action-packed, free-flowing atmosphere.

DEFEND YOUR GANG & RAID OTHERS
‚Ä¢ Exclusive to Gangstar New Orleans, Turf Wars bring fun GvG (gangster vs. gangster) excitement to your favourite shooting-game series.

‚Ä¢ Join the action and claim your turf! Then defend it from rival crime gangs; the free resources you'll gain will come in handy for future wars and when crafting new guns and items in the game.

MAKE YOUR OWN PATH!
‚Ä¢ Have fun customising your gangster using a vast array of options!

‚Ä¢ Equip, fuse and evolve hundreds of guns and vehicles to tailor your character to your personal style.

‚Ä¢ Free shooting game with tons of action and fun crime styles -- which one will you pick?

BUILD YOUR OWN LUXURIOUS MANSION!
‚Ä¢ Have fun claiming your own private island and expanding it into the ultimate housing complex! Show off your dream house, vehicle collection & expensive boats. Build runways and helipads for a quick escape!

For fans of open-world action games, the Gangstar series, fun shooting games, gangsters and free games.

recentChanges:
The Spirit Jars update is here, Gangstars! Check out brand-new features and updates:

‚Ä¢ NEW SPIRIT JARS: Check out 7 new Spirit Jars and their rewards! Collect Jar Pieces as you play, craft Jars, and get item copies in a new way.

‚Ä¢ GRAPHICS IMPROVEMENT: Experience updated visuals of New Orleans!

comments: Definitely deserves 5 stars. This is probably one of the most generous games that I have ever played. I was rewarded very handsomely for my grinds. I already own a handful of 5-star items as well as claimed 7 turfs, all in just about a week. However, I ran into a few issues which hampered my progress. The one that bothers me most is the lack of responsiveness of the acceleration pedals and the left arrow of the vehicular controls. This always made me lose out in vehicle missions. Please fix.üôèüôè

First I played the game in my old mobile (Galaxy M51)but now I am playing this in my new Galaxy Z FOLD 2. It is working too smooth, but the problem are the interrupting ads. I want request one thing, please do it. I want that we players can see each other during the game that we can play with another player see him and play with him. We can borrow things from our friends.

This game is ok. But there's some problems. some times when your driving the background gets removed or it never show up unless your close to the area that needs fix and also you can't even sit down or drink or eat or talk to people. That would be a great update & why he always carrying a weapon in free roam?? Lol just saying..

I am playing this game from three days and I enjoyed it a lot. It's definitely worth 5 stars. But I am giving it 4 stars due to two reasons. First, Controls lack clarity, controls should be more comprehensive and some more controls should be added so that we could enjoy a proper Gunfight.Second, whenever I Ride a Car or bike or any other vehicle, system should show the name of the vehicle and there is no speedometer. Gauging Speed in Speedometer while riding a car enhances driving experience.

I am playing the game currently, I played several games before but didn't find enjoyable like this. The game is full of excitement which is attracting me to spend more time. In a single word if say about the gameI I will say" It is just awesome". Just start to play than anything could be happened...............

title: Creative Destruction
description:
Creative Destruction is a sandbox survival game that features the utmost fun of building and firing. 

In the mood for a heart-stirring showdown? You will parachute into a vast battlefield where 100-player deathmatch is raging. Outplay your way to be the last one standing.

Build the best, break the rest! Jump straight in this do-or-die battle where you can wield creative weapons, race against snowstorms, and unleash your inner beast.

Varied gameplay modes, weather and time systems bring a new level of hectic fun. Whether you fight like a lone wolf or team up, there are always surprises waiting to be explored!

Come embark on a winner-takes-all slugfest in Creative Destruction today and show‚Äôem what you could be.

title: DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE
description:
DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE is the one of the best DRAGON BALL mobile game experiences available. This DB anime action puzzle game features beautiful 2D illustrated visuals and animations set in a DRAGON BALL world where the timeline has been thrown into chaos, where DB characters from the past and present come face to face in new and exciting battles! Experience the new story and save the world of DRAGON BALL!

DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE features a super refreshing and simplistic approach to the anime action genre! The epic anime-like battles feature simple yet addictive gameplay. Link Ki spheres during battle to attack your foes! Take your time and play at your own pace, it‚Äôs the perfect DB game to play on the go wherever you are! When you are ready and powered up, finish your enemies with powerful Super Attacks such as Super Saiyan Goku‚Äôs Kamehameha and many more to send enemies flying!

All of your favorite characters are here from all your favorite DRAGON BALL anime series! From DBZ to DBS, everyone‚Äôs favorite Saiyan, Goku and his friends are ready to battle Frieza, Cell, Beerus, Jiren, and more! Summon your favorite DB characters and create the ultimate dream team(s)! Train and Awaken DB characters to power them up!

Help return order to the DRAGON BALL timeline through Quest mode. Experience reimagined popular anime stories with DB characters new and old. Play in Dokkan Events and the World Tournament and face off against tough enemies! And for true hardened fighters, the challenges of Extreme Z-Battle and Super Battle Road await!

SIMPLE ADDICTING GAMEPLAY
‚Ä¢ Featuring a new take on the action puzzle game genre
‚Ä¢ Tap and link Ki Spheres to attack and enter Dokkan Mode to finish foes!!
‚Ä¢ Play at your own pace, planning your battle strategy is key

FINISH FOES WITH SUPER ATTACKS
‚Ä¢ Collect enough Ki Spheres to activate Super Attacks just like the anime
‚Ä¢ From Goku‚Äôs Iconic Kamehameha attack to Vegeta‚Äôs Final Flash, all your favorites are here
‚Ä¢ Experience them all in epic 2D illustrations and animations

YOUR FAVORITE DRAGON BALL CHARACTERS ARE HERE
‚Ä¢ From DBZ to DBS, many popular DB characters are available
‚Ä¢ Summon new and classic favorites such as Super - Saiyan God SS Goku, Vegeta, Krillin or rivals such as Frieza, Cell, Beerus, and Jiren plus more from the popular anime series

FORM YOUR TEAM OF POWERFUL WARRIORS
‚Ä¢ Organize your DRAGON BALL team and create the strongest fighting force!
‚Ä¢ Train your favorite DB characters and Awaken them to new realms of power!

A NEW DRAGON BALL STORY
‚Ä¢ Bring order to the DRAGON BALL timeline

descriptionHTML:
DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE is the one of the best DRAGON BALL mobile game experiences available. This DB anime action puzzle game features beautiful 2D illustrated visuals and animations set in a DRAGON BALL world where the timeline has been thrown into chaos, where DB characters from the past and present come face to face in new and exciting battles! Experience the new story and save the world of DRAGON BALL!

DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE features a super refreshing and simplistic approach to the anime action genre! The epic anime-like battles feature simple yet addictive gameplay. Link Ki spheres during battle to attack your foes! Take your time and play at your own pace, it‚Äôs the perfect DB game to play on the go wherever you are! When you are ready and powered up, finish your enemies with powerful Super Attacks such as Super Saiyan Goku‚Äôs Kamehameha and many more to send enemies flying!

All of your favorite characters are here from all your favorite DRAGON BALL anime series! From DBZ to DBS, everyone‚Äôs favorite Saiyan, Goku and his friends are ready to battle Frieza, Cell, Beerus, Jiren, and more! Summon your favorite DB characters and create the ultimate dream team(s)! Train and Awaken DB characters to power them up!

Help return order to the DRAGON BALL timeline through Quest mode. Experience reimagined popular anime stories with DB characters new and old. Play in Dokkan Events and the World Tournament and face off against tough enemies! And for true hardened fighters, the challenges of Extreme Z-Battle and Super Battle Road await!

SIMPLE ADDICTING GAMEPLAY
‚Ä¢ Featuring a new take on the action puzzle game genre

FINISH FOES WITH SUPER ATTACKS

‚Ä¢ From Goku‚Äôs Iconic Kamehameha attack to Vegeta‚Äôs Final Flash, all your favorites are here

YOUR FAVORITE DRAGON BALL CHARACTERS ARE HERE
‚Ä¢ From DBZ to DBS, many popular DB characters are available

FORM YOUR TEAM OF POWERFUL WARRIORS

summary: Dragon Ball game
recentChanges:
4.12.0
- Optimized the information displayed while collecting Ki Spheres in battle.
- Optimized the character list. Characters who cannot be added to teams will no longer take up character slots.
- Adjusted the user interface.
- Fixed some bugs.
comments: I've been playing this game since it's release, it's come a long way from a few years ago. The range of events for all players, the way it's a lot easier to get Dragon Stones (currency), the range in characters and the animation in the game has skyrocketed. The only real issue I still probably have is that the Super Attack Animations is in crisp 4k, but the sprite receiving that attack is still in 480p/360p, If that was improved the game would be next level.

Honestly, the game is pretty much the Dragonball community's collection game. That being said,this game has a lot to do. You will not be bored. I love the game play that they have, the custom versions of the same characters each with their our supers, the strategy needed for the harder levels and the creators always evolving the game. Ive been playing for since 2014 or so and still don't have a fraction of the cards. This game is just awsome! 10/10

Look. Its a great game. Is it pay to play? No it can easily be played without any money spent if you dont mind a grind and learning to spend your stones wisely. Are you going to beat everything without spending money? Most certainly not. The game is definitely locked behind a pay wall. And one that hurts more the longer you wait to pick it up. Featured units will come back, but they become harder to pull with every update. Game is worth playing as a gotcha game. It's one of the best even.

Dragon Ball Z: Dokkan Battle is a game I have a very mixed opinon on. The game itself is fun, and there's certainly not a lack of content. However, the game can be a bit repetitive at times, as the gameplay itself not super in depth. The animations in game are beautiful, especially with newer, or updated cards, and there are plenty of opportunities to get Dragon Stones to preform summons on the various banners. This game is certainly not for everyone, but it can be fun if you give it a chance.

Been playing for about 4, 5 years. I have a good opinion in this game id say. Its a gatcha game so unless you have money or time grind don't get it. It's very easy to want a new unit and everyone except you gets it. I've spent 600 bucks because I'm addicted and didn't get a single featured unit. Proceed with great caution for your wallet. It's a gambling game.

title: Warface: Global Operations ‚Äì First person shooter
description:
Dynamic battles await you in the universe of the world-famous Warface shooter! Enjoy various combat modes, easy-to-learn controls, and amazing graphics. Create a unique character and break into exciting multiplayer PvP battles designed specifically for mobile devices!

Warface: Global Operations is actively growing and developing: new maps, weapons, equipment and character skins regularly appear in the game, as well as unique new game modes and events in which you can receive valuable rewards. The team is constantly improving the game optimization and matchmaking system with each update, providing the best gaming experience for fans of mobile first-person shooters.

Warface: Global Operations is:
- 7 awesome maps for dynamic PvP battles;
- 4 game modes and more than 20 mini-events in which the conditions change every day;
- More than 200 types of customizable weapons and equipment;
- 15 skins to alter your character's appearance - and the list is constantly updating!

PVE MISSIONS AND CO-OP RAIDS
Get a series of brand-new special weapons and gear, and play as a team of four to smash through enemy hordes and dangerous bosses. Unearth the latest Blackwood plot and make the World a little safer!

Explore all game modes:
‚úØ Team Deathmatch ‚úØ
Kill enemy players and take the lead. Be the first to reach the score.

‚úØ Control ‚úØ
Capture zones to get more points for killing enemies!

‚úØ Plant the Bomb ‚úØ
One fight to three victories. Plant the bomb at one of the enemy controlled zones and don't let them blow up yours.

‚úØ Free-for-All ‚úØ
Every man for himself! Prove that you are the king of the hill.
 
Warface: Global Operations is a military team-based action shooter in which everything depends on your skill. Carefully consider your tactics for each battle, explore different locations and modes, develop your shooting skills, upgrade your equipment and demonstrate your superiority!

INTUITIVE CONTROLS
You can easily master Warface: Global Operations and quickly break into the heart of the battle. Even if you are new to the world of mobile shooters, you will become familiar with the game controls in no time.

SKILL DETERMINES EVERYTHING
The game provides dynamic team gameplay in perfectly balanced maps designed specifically for mobile gaming. Take part in exciting battles around the world and enjoy the intense action while our matchmaking system takes care of finding you a worthy opponent.

FULL CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION
Is it important for you that your character's appearance reflects your playstyle perfectly? Warface: Global Operations gives you this opportunity! Dozens of pieces of equipment and many skins will allow you to create a unique, memorable soldier and stand out among millions of other players!

CREATE AN ABSOLUTE WEAPON
In Warface: Global Operations, there are weapons for both natural born snipers and melee fans! There are hundreds of fully customizable weapons: assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, SMGs and much more will not leave you indifferent. Create the gun of your dream with a huge number of additional modules and a non-linear upgrade system, and then try it out in intense PvP battles!

If you have any problems with the game, please let us know: warfacego@corp.my.com

Join our communities to stay up to date with the latest game news:
VK: https://vk.com/warfaceglobaloperations
Facebook: facebook.com/WarfaceGlobalOperations/
Discord: https://discord.gg/ttJCTXW
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/c/WHALEKITGames
