comments: Love the game can't seem to put it down. No problems with my iPhone! The graphics on this game is amazing its clear not blurry like those othe war games. You can play pvp or pve (believe i have that correct). I think the best way to start out is with the in-app purchases or start out with what they give you. Overall a superb quality game! TRY IT OUT YOU'LL ENJOY IT!

Almost perfect dont want this game to flop because the problem is its a pay to win seeing players suffer from pay to win players that have more powerful guns like Athena, etc i think it would be great to fix it but take your time, respect the hard work done by the developers and the game is good for me but the problem is pay to win players bought microtransactions to get the best start possible But other than that i hope this game wont suffer from microtransactions, Take time to sort things out

(The updated halloween theme has made my game pretty much unplayable in all but plant the bomb mode. Controls are unresponsive, movement is laggy and glitchy.)Match making sucks, at level 75 and 261 power put in with whales that are 2 or 3 times my level.and thier power is 1, 2 or 3 hundred higher. I feel that it is pay to win. I wouldn't mind if I didn't have to be in match's with 3 or 4 or more whales at a time.

Not as good as other shooters.. yet. This has the potential to be a highly rated shooter, but it's too much of a cash grab. Not enough weapons to start out with, tiny maps, poorly made modifications for weapons, not enough settings for a personalized gaming experience, would be perfect for multiplayer story missions. There just needs to be more added content that makes this game more enjoyable, not for the players to have a crazy amount of armor and be unstoppable. Just a thought.

This is a really good game and is developing really well. The graphics are really good but the only thing this game lacks is the jump button. Please add jump button for better movement and logic. And also when adding it, please make it like when we tap the slide and jump button simultaneously, there won't be a time gap in between and we will slide jump. So yeah... Please add jump button

title: Beat the Boss 4: Stress-Relief Game. Hit the buddy
description:
Let off some steam in this action adventure game with over 20,000,000 + downloads from the creators behind Tap Titans 2 and Battle Bouncers.  

Get ready to aim, shoot, and destroy evil robot bosses in the smashing new update to the epic Beat The Boss franchise. 

Dealing with a cruel robot boss who‚Äôs nothing more than a bully? Looking at them just makes you want to beat the living daylight out of them.

Turn that rage and office stress into a therapeutic release as you fight against the clock to explode, beat, and destroy the evil robot Boss Joe. 

Crush enemies and your own personalized villains with custom crafted weapons. Release the mass havoc of monkeys, wield a samurai sword, or unleash the explosive power of a colossal diarrhea gun on your workplace foes! 

WITH BEAT THE BOSS 4 YOU CAN:
‚òÖ PLAY the relaxing interactive office simulator offline and at your desk
‚òÖ FIGHT against 200+ uniquely designed wicked bosses who make life miserable 
‚òÖ COLLECT over 190+ destructive weapons and build up your arsenal of ammunition 
‚òÖ UNLOCK the immersive world map, with over 10 hand drawn realms and 30 entertaining stages
‚òÖ CRAFT custom weapons from automatic rifles to fireworks in order to release your anger
‚òÖ PERSONALIZE your own custom boss, get ready to crush your real-life nemesis! 
‚òÖ LEVEL UP your boss fighting skills by collecting gold and diamonds to boost your destructive power

ABOUT BEAT THE BOSS 4:
Robo Joe is on a mission to make your workplace hostile and miserable! 
Don‚Äôt want to walk into that familiar office on Monday morning? Dealing with the unresolved stress from the last time your boss made your life difficult? Beat The Boss 4 is the healthy way of dealing with office stress and it's better than yoga! 

Get back virtually at your dentist, smash that high-school bully, or travel to space to defeat aliens in this interactive simulation action game. As you adventure down the scenic world map, find out where Robo Joe‚Äôs from and why you need to take vengeance and 
kick his ignorant robot buddies. Collect gold coins and diamonds with each hit as you whack your boss to buy hilarious and more destructive weapons, turning that office into a war zone!

From beehives to office supplies, and even grenades, the possibilities to get back at your foes are endless. Beware, don‚Äôt let your coldhearted android manager go into their shield! Customize weapons to unleash devastating attacks and let out that pent up anger in the ultimate stress relief game. 

Wage war with the evil Robo Joe and his machine buddies. Buckle up and prepare to riot as you grab your guns and assassinate an onslaught of horrible bosses in this funny fighting game! Drop and smash massive weapons on your robot foes, and reel in that satisfactory feeling from hunting your enemies! 

Your therapist and colleagues will thank you so start taking revenge and go have some fun!

TALK TO US!
Join your fed up coworkers on
‚òÖ Facebook: facebook.com/beatthebossgame
‚òÖ Discord: discord.gg/gamehive
‚òÖ Twitter: twitter.com/beattheboss4
‚òÖ Instagram: instagram.com/beatthebossgame
‚òÖ Blog: gamehive.com/blog
‚òÖ Youtube: youtube.com/user/GameHiveVideo

title: Bullet Man 3D
description:
Hey there, Bullet Man. Use your gun to perfect your lethal accuracy and shoot at as many bad guys as possible. 
Challenging obstacles make it extra tricky to reach your targets, so aim before you squeeze the gun trigger and shoot away.
Before you put your finger on the trigger and shoot, you gotta think like a sniper: how many enemies can you down in one shot?
You have many targets. Are you the sniper Bullet Man to save the day?

title: FPS Encounter Shooting 2020: New Shooting Games
description:
Want to be entertained alone? Then don't hesitate to step into the exciting and thrilling war as you shoot your way through one desperate situation after another to save the world. Step onto the battlefield and answer the call of your companion player being captured by the enemies. Create your own load-out from AR, Sniper and Grenades available in the Weaponry Store and test your skills in dynamic warfare against offline rivals from around the world. title: Zombie Gunship Survival
description:
Survive the apocalypse and play this zombie survival game. Unleash hellfire into the dead from your gunner seat in the AC 130 Gunship Simulator. In a world where most of the population is dead or turned zombie, a few men trained in zg survival games picked up real weapons to fight the zombie army attack.

Build up your defense in your base as the last shelter against the zombies. Help your ground troops who are left to survive with shadow strikes from your ac 130 gunship. The zg survival of your squad against the walking zombies is the key to glory. Become a legendary weapon collector.
Equip your AC 130 gunship with undead killing weapons and upgrade them for more damage. Shoot into the dead zombies from above to defend your army. Loot precious resources, gold and other rewards, bring them back to base and build your defense to repel zombie assaults with army games in this zg survival game

BUILD YOUR ZOMBIE AC 130 GUNSHIP ARMY:
- Play Assault, Demolition, Sniper and Scout and equip real weapons from your AC 130 gunship.
- Use gold to upgrade your defense, equipment and firearms to get more rewards the game has to offer.
- Unlock real weapons and build a base to defend with army games while ensuring humanity‚Äôs zg survival.

DIFFERENT TYPES OF ZOMBIES IN ZG SUVIVAL GAME
- Zombies with different killing abilities in the best shooting survival game to play.
- Zombie survival games with some zombies those can be extremely hard to kill.
- This Zombie survival games is the best zg survival Zombies shooting game.

ZOMBIES ARE AT YOUR DOOR:
- Collect gold and other rewards to build better defenses in your shelter.
- Upgrade weapons and guns for glory.
- Grab your realistic weapons and shoot to kill plague zombies in first person shooter gameplay, as you target zg survival games in the zombie apocalypse.

SHOOT FROM THE SKIES WITH SNIPER WEAPONS:
- Collect realistic sniper guns and weapons to play with and increase your efficiency of your AC 130 gunship.
- Provide air support from a mounted gun and lead army games of zombie survival troops against the dead hordes of zombies.
- Play zombie survival games to unlock new missions to play in sniper shooting game, increase your rank and get more gold

UNDEAD BASE DEFENSE WITH :
- Play and build up your remote airfield with the AC 130 Gunship as a base of operations and last line of defense against zombie survival games. Ready your gun and withstand the infected army of the dead.
- Upgrade your defenses, weapons and guns to defend your army base against zombie assaults in this zombie shooting game.
- Wage war with your army and play zombie survival games in a hostile environment. The ultimate survival shooter! Shoot undead zombies enemies!

SHARE WITH FRIENDS
- Discuss strategies in sniper shooter game with friends.
- Share your zombie kill scores and what rewards you got for more gold.
- Play with a vibrant community.

By accessing or using a flaregames product, you're agreeing to our Terms of Service (www.flaregames.com/terms-service/).

Parental guide
Zombie Gunship Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don‚Äôt want to use these features, please disable in-app purchases in your Google Play settings. According to our Terms of Service, Zombie Gunship Survival is allowed for download and play only for persons 16 years or more of age, or with explicit parental consent. You can read more here: 'http://www.flaregames.com/parents-guide/FESFES.

recentChanges:
*Added the M777 Repeating Heavy Cannon (RHC M777) to the game
*Additional functionalities for the upcoming Halloween Event
We are currently hard at work developing a major feature for the game that addresses a series of issues and improvements that have been long requested by the community. Our aim is to bring you the best experience possible with ZGS over the coming year.
comments: Fun but requires internet connection. The game play itself is fun, but I hate that I need to be connected to the servers to play. I had just finished a hard mission that I was having difficulty with, and when it finally ended with victory, the game said there was no connection and it didn't count. So now I have to do it all over again. Kind of frustrating, since the area I live in doesn't really have the best network and I drop connectivity quite often.

Been playing for a while now, and have built up weapons enough to get thru the harder levels. Really enjoy the game play, graphics are pretty good and it's a great stress reliever. It does take a while to receive the good weapons, and upgrading them does take some grinding. But regular events allow you to speed up the process, and watching ads helps get ahead too. Unfortunately at the moment I cant access the game. I get the "version out of date" message, but have no opportunity to update. First time this has happened so I'm hoping this is a temporary thing. Overall a great free game!

This game is just simply put.. awesome! In my case, replay factor is very high. I love mowing down zombies with the Gatlin Gun. And the BIG GUNS... forget about it! Great way to take out your stress and anxiety. they should have this game at the therapy clinics. For people who suffer with anxiety. There's an idea! üòÅ Take That You Bast#@ds! P.s. game is very user friendly. And that's saying alot considering all the options available. Thanks Flaregames!

Still playing. Been like 3 or maybe more years. Still not bored with it. Still. Can we do something with the blue boxes. My base has been totally upgraded for a long time. And haven't been able to use those resources. Can you widen the base map? Give us more obstacles? More defenses. To establish some F. O. B. s would be awesome. Forward operating bases.

The best game I play, you can spend on this game. but dont have to. I've been playing for a little over 3 weeks already and 've been able to build some impressive guns. The best are randomly rewarded for completing tasks and are not based on 1000 other players in competition. You can build any gun from the bottom of the barrel and create your own legendary gun. Just work on leveling up your current weapon, and keep moving forward while you wait for a crate to deliver one from awards.

title: Stick Warfare: Blood Strike
description:
Join the hot, fast-paced Stick Figure's gunfight!

Fight against enemy Stickmen armed with various weapons, and claim the victory!
Buy new guns, customize them, learn new skills, and raise the level of the Perks to enhance your combat abilities!
Avoid enemy attacks through quick judgment and response, and defeat all enemies to win the battle!
Improve your Stickman and challenge harder difficulty!

Recent Update:
‚óè New 30 Weapons Added!
‚óè New Grenade: Bouncing Mine
‚óè New Perks: Pyromaniac
‚óè Heavy Weapons for Juggernaut Perk

Game Content:
‚óè Easy Control: Avoid enemy attacks and shoot them!
‚óè Unique and powerful Perks: The Gunslinger, specialized in Pistols and Revolvers, with fast reloading speed with high damage capacity, The Juggernaut, holds out under enemy attacks with high physical strength and defense abilities, The Rifleman, specialized in Assault Rifles, a powerful all-rounder weapon, The Shotgunner, very powerful at close range combats, And the Assault Recon, specialized in avoiding enemy attacks and combat with SMG. The Machine Gunner specialized with keep firing with LMG, The Specialist, the perk with various combat bonuses, the Demolition, very powerful perk specialized using Explosive Weapons that can destroy obstacles and vehicles very quickly, the Marksman, specialized with DMR, rapidly neutralize multiple long-range targets, the Combat Sniper, super-powerful long-range damage output! The Pyromaniac, great damage dealer with deadly flame weapons!
‚óè Over 188 Unique Weapons: Automatic Pistols, Machine Pistols, Submachinegun, Assault Rifle, DMR, Light-machinegun, Shotguns, and now Grenade/Rocket Launchers! Now meet the Heavy Weapons: The Gatling Death Machine and 50 Caliber Machine Guns!
‚óè More than 36 unique and useful skills: Physical Skills makes your character stronger, Combat Skills that enhance your combat capabilities, Defense Skills that enhance your ability to survive, Luck Skills that provide various bonuses, And Avoidance Skills that reduce damage income by avoiding enemy attacks!
‚óè Is your character boring without personality? Decorate your character with a variety of Hats and Back cosmetics!
‚óè Various Game Modes: Bodycount, Gun Game, Onslaught, Zombie Invasion, and more...!
‚óè Global Leaderboard: Challenge your score with people in the world!
‚óè Continuous Updates: New Weapons and Perks, Skills, and Game Modes!

comments: Pretty basic, but entertaining. Definitely not a pay to win, it has good game progression, and the unlike Halo,and COD (Yes, I'm comparing it to these games), the guns feel different from one another. Some shot fast, and inaccurately, some shoot super far and accurately. Honestly, this game feels like it has more polished gun mechanics than any other shooter. What's the worst part of this game? The graphics and maps, mainly because everything is flat and look like stick figures, Still fun though

I absolutely love the game. I love the wide gun selection, but ask to add a bit more. I was really looking forward to seeing a SIG MCX Virtus and IWI Galil ACE Assault Rifles, a PM Makarov Pistol, and maybe even the SIG P365 Pistol. Besides, we currently have a SIG P250 (M250), but I really wanted to see the SIG P320 or the new M17 army pistol, even if it comes as just a simple rename and description change for the gun that is currently ingame. Please, add also a way for us to save our loadouts.

This game is 2good. Gameplay is awesome, controls are the best, and the things here are very affordable. No ads. Tho I do want a multiplayer mode, it's ok if your not able to make a multiplayer but it would make the game more fun! Anyways download this game or no cookie for you. (Spent atleast 6 hours on this game when I first downloaded it -_- I have no life.)

When i was installing this i though it was gonna be a bad game, i would uninstall it in like 10 minutes and that would be that. But turns out it's amazing, the frontline gamemode being a personal favorite of mine. If i were to suggest anything, make wave defense more interesting with new upgrades like a mortar or vehicles, and maybe a campaign. But it's still worth a download, no ads, great game.

I would like this game more if there were building and stairs and bascially a city place where you can jump climb and take cover more insead of white screen. I know that you won't be able to do this but i hope u get to it. There will be so much fun and experience with these graphics but any other than that. I still love the game because it doesn't take a lot of space. But when there is too much stuff going on in the game like too much humans around, it lags the game real hard. But thats fine.

title: Mask of Stick: Superhero
description:

 *Prepare for epic stick fight action with your super mask heroes and others stickman warriors in the contest of champions! 
 COLLECTING YOUR CHAMPIONS
 *Recruit your supreme team and form a galaxy of heroes powerful Mask of Stick: Super Masked Heroes and Super Villains like Iron Hit, Destroyer, Spy, Doctor, King, Kela, and more.

title: MaskGun Multiplayer FPS - Free Shooting Game
description:
MaskGun is a real-time online Multiplayer 3D First Person Shooter built for Mobile Devices 

‚ñ∫   Simple and Easy to Learn Controls:  Learn quickly as you get started, Progress  and dominate the leaderboards!
‚ñ∫  Skill based PVP Battles :  3 Game modes - DeathMatch, Team DeathMatch and Bomb Defusal Mode. Five new Maps including Diwali Yard, Ryokan, GhostTown and LightHouse 
‚ñ∫   Real Time Friends System:  Play with Your Friends when they are online, Join your friends in Battle in one click.
‚ñ∫  Missions and Achievements:  Complete missions and achievements to Level Up and Unlock content. Get VIP to boost rewards and progression
‚ñ∫  Player Gear Customization:  Customize your character using a variety of equipment, masks, armor and gear. Use a game loadout suitable to your play style. 
‚ñ∫  Beautiful graphics and supports all older devices:  Enjoy beautiful visuals on screen on even older hardware. Small download footprint. 
‚ñ∫  Free to Play:  Play as much as you want, no energy system 
‚ñ∫  Updated regularly:  New Content and Modes, Maps being added every month to ensure that you are engaged, Endless PvP action.

MaskGun is a competitive multiplayer FPS with great 3D graphics and gripping gameplay. It has simple to learn controls, but still skill based with its competitive gameplay and close battles. 

 Custom Game Engine

And I really wish there was more maps and more guns that are a little bit cheaper. And this game is GREAT!!! üëèüëèüëåüëåüëåüëçüëç

This game is on point. The graphics, realization of the characters, the realistic kills. I have a few complaints though. The game sometimes takes way too long to load. The sniper rifles should have their own game. The sniper rifles are one shot vs the automatics which takes four to several shots to kill. Plus when I use the sniper scope its all over the place and other shooters can use with point accuracy. Doesn't seem fair to allow the sniper rifles with the automatic weapons.

This game is cool runs smoothly üòÅ I absolutely love it üòç, I and my brother play all the time together and we don't get bored. But instead of buying money to get those special they should allow us to get them by doing challenges because I can't buy any pack. That is my only challenge üòù,apart from that the game is very good .

Great game!loads of fun! Unfortunately it crashes every level and it just won't load rewards or the next match. Gets on my nerves when you constantly having to restart the whole game. A colossal tease and a total pain in the ass. What a waste, the game is fun when it lets you play it. Uninstall is eminent.

Best game ever. I will be glad if you will add a diamond mine mode with diamond mine map. I find it difficult to save diamonds.Top player will receive 1000 diamonds, second Will receive 500 and soon. Every one keeps using it and it is ruining the game.Thanking you in advance. Please add these features. Will be ever grateful to you. Thank you.

title: Power Rangers: Legacy Wars
description:
Rita Repulsa, the space witch, has infected the Morphin Grid, creating virtual monsters and Ranger clones programmed to fight on her behalf. Fight back with your own curated team of legendary Power Rangers and villains from the multiverse! Unlock new Rangers, upgrade your best warriors and create the best team to defeat Rita, and save the Morphin Grid.

----------------FEATURES------------------------

BATTLE PLAYERS IN REAL-TIME
Strategize, dodge and fight against real players in real-time multiplayer PvP action and unlock different arenas from iconic locations across the Power Rangers multiverse, including Lord Zedds‚Äô Throne Room, Terror Spacecraft, Dino Lab and more. Test your skills against live players worldwide and move up on the leaderboard.

STUNNING CONSOLE QUALITY GRAPHICS
Experience your favorite Power Rangers and their iconic moves like never before in full-blown 3D with gorgeous visuals and animations. This fighting game looks stunning from the detailed characters to the incredible environments.

COLLECT NEW & ICONIC POWER RANGERS
Unlock new Rangers and collect 80+ warriors ranging from the new movie Power Rangers to classic Rangers across the Power Rangers multiverse. You can also collect villains, including Goldar, Lord Zedd, Psycho Rangers and more.

MEGAZORDS
Battle and brawl with giant Megazords, including Dino Megazord, Mega Goldar, Predazord, Thunder Megazord and more. Customize your Megazord with Mega Attacks. Equip over 12 Mega Abilities to help destroy your opponent. Take your Megazords and join in on the Megazord Alliance Wars where you will battle against other Alliances to lead your Alliance to glory.  

CUSTOMIZABLE TEAMS
Choose your favorite warriors and create the best team to fight for you. Upgrade your favorite warriors to join your squad. With your ultimate team, you can challenge top players in combat from around the world. 

GROW STRONGER
Upgrade your best warriors with Zeo Shards earned through battles, missions and more to increase your winning streaks and battle stats. Become the most powerful team in the world.

TEAM UP WITH YOUR FRIENDS
Build alliances to share, chat and trade tactics, strategy and combos! Watch replays to learn from other members and follow your favorite players. Request and trade shards with other players in your alliance. Take part in Alliance Missions where you can work together to earn Zord Shards, Energy and more.

RAIDS
Battle in the new PvE Raids feature against AI Heroes, Villains, and even Megazords. Join in either the Solo Phase or Alliance Phase where you can earn epic rewards. 

EARN EPIC REWARDS
Fight and battle in PvP and PvE to earn Morph boxes, coins and other rewards. Complete missions and events for exclusive rewards to upgrade your team of warriors and dominate your opponents.

CAPCOM STREET FIGHTERS CROSS-OVER
Fighters from the most popular fighting game of all time enter the Morphin Grid. Collect your favorite Street Fighter characters including Ryu, Chun-Li, Guile, Cammy, M. Bison and Akuma. 

************************************************************************
‚Äú20 Best Mobile Games‚Äù - Appolicious

‚ÄúTop 10 Best Android Games‚Äù - Tech Vs Entz

‚Äú11 Best Android Games That You Shouldn‚Äôt Miss‚Äù - Guilding Tech

Nominated for ‚ÄúBest Mobile Game‚Äù - Best Mobile App Awards

************************************************************************

Like us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PRLegacyWars
Visit us on Instagram: https://Instagram.com/PowerRangersLegacyWars

comments: Looks good, sounds alright (obnoxious soundtrack notwithstanding), definitely has the vibe of the show. The gameplay is interesting on paper, but after the first fifty times your taps fail because of (presumably) latency, you realize that perhaps the game is broken. Speaking of broken, fighters are built on pay to win. I know this because I paid and I won. Balancing between the fighter ranks may as well be non-existent. All in all, a frustrating time killer and nothing more.

I did rate this as 5 stars originally, but as of the past month, I'll face connection issues during my fights and even at the main home screen... But yet when I check my connection, I have full connection. And it really upsets me big time when it kicks me midfight saying sorry, check your connection, and I'm in a challenge fight. Please fix it, and I'll rerate it where it belongs.

Great game. I love getting to use some of my favorite rangers and villians to fight other players. Only REAL nit-pick I have is that there's no story mode. What was the point of these different storylines being cinematic only? Or give us a gaultlet style option that we fight to the end of and earn chests, crystals, and shards. Just a thought but would make it a bit easier for non-paying players to progress almost as quickly as paying players.

I love the game, (I have this on my kindle fire tablet, and Moto G7 Play, they have great accounts with lots of warriors on it!), But, THE LAG WITH THE GAME!!!!!!, PLS MAKE IT STOP, almost every other 3rd to 5th battle has lag, and then the other person can do what they want for the next 2-3 seconds (attack, taunt), NWay, can you pls try your best to make it where no one around the world has lag in this game!!!, Overall the game is amazing!!!, Could you make it to where you can merge accounts?

I love the game I hope you guys put alot of rangers on here like all the red rangers like Ninja storm red, dino thunder red, ninja storm and spd. I love this game and hope it gets alot of characters on it. The only thing I have problem with is core gameplay. Sometimes when I use moves they don't register I think that there should be a way to counter most things.

title: Brawlhalla
description:
Brawlhalla is a free platform fighting game with over 40 million players that supports up to 8 online in a single match with full cross-play. Join casual free-for-alls, queue for ranked matches, or make a custom room with your friends. Frequent updates. 50 unique characters and counting. Come fight for glory in the halls of Valhalla!

Features:
 
- Online Ranked 1v1 & 2v2 - Climb the ranked ladder from Tin up to Platinum and beyond! Fight enemies solo or team up with your friends. Matches you against players near your skill level.
- 4 Player Online Free for All - Casual matches where four fighters enter, but only one can win.
- Cross-play Custom Rooms - Invite up to 8 friends on all platforms to a huge variety of custom matches: 4v4s, 1v3, 2v2, FFA, and much more.
- Many Game Modes - Mix things up with Brawlball, Bombsketball, Capture the Flag, Kung-Foot, and many more fun party game modes.
- The Training Room - Practice combos and setups inside the Training Room! Look at detailed frame data, hitboxes, hurtboxes, and sharpen your skills.
 
Plus: Best-in-class spectating, match recording and replay. Dozens of maps. Single player tournament mode. An online brawl-of-the-week. Experimental mode. Millions of players for fast matchmaking. Regional servers for low-latency online play. Frequent updates. Tons of esports events and tournaments. Excellent support for keyboard and controllers. Career history and cool progress rewards. Ranked seasons. Friendly devs. Fun, fair free-to-play. And much more.
 

How we do Free to Play
 
Brawlhalla will always be 100% free to play, with no pay-to-win advantages and no in-game purchases keeping you from the action. None of the premium content affects gameplay.
 
The Legend Rotation of eight free to play characters changes every week, and you can earn gold to unlock more Legends by playing any online game mode.
 
You can also check out our ‚ÄúAll Legends Pack‚Äù that immediately unlocks every character we‚Äôve ever made and ever will make. Forever. Everything in the ‚ÄúLegends‚Äù tab in the in-game store would be yours to have. Note that this doesn‚Äôt unlock Crossovers.

Like on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Brawlhalla/
Follow on Twitter @Brawlhalla
Subscribe on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/brawlhalla
Join us on Instagram @Brawlhalla
Need support? Have some feedback for us? Contact us here: https://support.ubi.com

title: Cat Simulator - and friends üêæ
description:
Play as your favorite cat or dog in this wild adventure!

NEW FREE: Halloween Cat!! - look for Spooky Cat in the pet menu. 

NEW: Collect Coins and Diamonds as you Play in our exciting new locations to Unlock new Cats, Pets and Accessories!

NEW: the more days you have cat simulator installed the faster you collect diamonds and coins - unlock those pets and accessories even faster! up to 5x bonus!

NEW - Supermarket level - Cause havoc in the supermarket, play with the toys, chase mice, set off the fire alarm, fly on a plane, ride on a trolly and lots more!

Hundreds of fun interactions in great environments for hours of solid good fun.

Check out the accessories - hats, helmets, moustaches, glasses and loads more then take a photo and share it on Facebook or Twitter with your friends.

Realistic and easy to play cat game!

See if you can get the highest score or unlock all the achievements.

If you love to play cat game then this is the game for you!

CATS & DOGS:
With over 20 pets to choose from there's no end to the fun!
Free to unlock.

COLLECT FRIENDS
15 animals friends hidden in the game - can you find and collect them all?


LOCATIONS:

Farm Level : Lets help drive a tractor? Go on quests to help the crows and help the horses escape!
Playground: Want to fly on a kite, eat ice cream or go on the swings?
Schools out! Play Dominos, Ride on a skateboard, play in the gym.
Home: Dads playing golf - lets play too and steal the ball. Whats cooking in the kitchen? Interact with the family - If you're nice maybe they'll feed you in this fun cat simulator.
Garden: Chase ducks, help with the planting, make friends with the dogs in the garden or maybe the squirrels in the wild?
Beach: Jetski? set off some fireworks, play in a band, dig sand with a dozer, build a sand castle and more!
Supermarket level - Cause havoc in the supermarket, play with the toys, chase mice, set off the fire alarm, fly on a plane, ride on a trolly and lots more!


DRESS UP:

All accessories, places and pets can be unlocked for free, so dive right in to play with Porky Pig, Billy the goat, Shadow the dog, Sammy the tomcat cat or any of the many pets in your cat simulator.

GAME:

Use the joypad to move around and swipe the screen to get a 360 degree view of your pet.
Knock stuff around.
Prepare for catlateral damage in the cat simulator in their wild, fun lives.
New: play in HD or SD quality mode.
Click on the doggy in the bottom left of the screen to load.
Time Trial mode added!
Extra cat games levels added all the time.
What do they get up to in their secret time?
Neko Tastic!!
Super fun Cat Simulator!
Awesome super fun cat games!

title: CATS: Crash Arena Turbo Stars
description:
Build your own battle bot and unleash its power in this stylish PvP game!

From the creators of the hit games Cut the Rope and King of Thieves, comes the most ingenious and stylish battle bot constructor! Join more than 150 million players from all over the world and become the star of the Arena!

Features:
‚Ä¢ Be a master engineer: design, craft, upgrade, and improve the Ultimate battle bot!
‚Ä¢ Take the role of a mean street cat and fight against other players in fast and hilarious PvP action!
‚Ä¢ Discover dozens of crazy weapons, gadgets and body shapes, including Ultimate Machines! Outsmart your opponents with your unique battle bot design!
‚Ä¢ Create a powerful gang and rule the streets! Participate in gang battles to win unique parts, make new friends and share your secrets in your gang‚Äôs chat.
‚Ä¢  City Kings: Fight against real gangs from around the globe to conquer the city in cooperative mode.
‚Ä¢ Battle against real players and fight your way to the top of the World Championship!
‚Ä¢ Bet on other bots and share replays of your best fights!

Get the game now for free and become the star of the Crash Arena!

comments: I used to play this game alot but as the years have came, the game has gotten worse, some of the things u guys are adding, u shouldn't. There are a whole tone of ads, it used to not be that way. After I watch an add, the back ground music is different than the original sound, idk if that's just my phone but that's what it's doing. This game has kinda become a pay to win game also. I just wish u guys could put the game back the way it used to be, it was alot more fun and less complicated.

I am a prestige 60 player. Played this game over a year to achieve that. Watch all the ads everyday. I am a gang leader as well. But since the day they introduce the purple darts, which makes players with them almost invincible. This whole game becomes a very uneven playing ground. Of the developer is not going to make playing this game fair. I will petition to get a lot of players to forever quit playing this game. Very dissapointed that I wasted one over years on you.

Ok I don't even care anymore. This is honestly a great game. But tone it down with the forced ads a bit. And the tranquilizer darts are too annoying. Nerf them please. And also, I think you should add at least these things. 1. Add a drill weapon for the normal vehicle. (Not the ultimate ones.) 2. Make it so you get 3 - 20 free gems every day. (I will love you if you do this.) last one. Add mythic and secret rarity parts. Mythic chances: 0.01383% Secret chances: 0.0000112% (add mythic boxes too.)

I'm hooked, my son is hooked, my daughter is hooked. Genuinely the best mobile game I've played. The adds were a bit intrusive in the beginning, but it is a free game after all and the gameplay kept me coming back regardless. After a few days I payed to remove them. Lets face it, the developers deserve support for such an excellent game. **Edit 27/10/20: they've added a couple of items (tranquiliser gun I'm looking at you!) that have horribly unbalanced the game, ruining the fun completely.

Too much forced ads. I think watching ads to get a reward(ex. Skip 30mins opening boxes) should be enough. A forced ad every quick play is so annoying and will surely turn a lot of players away no matter how good your game is. Forced ads will give you a lot of money in the short term. But the amount of players you lost(and potential buyers) will be more visible in the long run.

title: Grand City Thug Crime Gangster
description:
Time to become the real hero in the open world crime city. The grand gangster city is the real action thrilling game for all the lovers of the grand crime theft mafia game. Come and enjoy the city of sin with different challenges to face as the real gangster hero. You are put on multiple missions lately. Enter into the world of freedom and play different modes of the real crime city grand gangster. Start your journey as the real crime gangster hero and start missions against the crime lord and godfather. Stop the grand wars and street crimes now. Show your driving skills as well as the shooting skills to be the real hero in the ultimate grand war gangster auto. 

Play the most wanted real gangster mafia thug life and eliminate all the crime gangster grand war from the open world city of sin. Accept different thrilling challenges of the grand gang star now. Move around freely in the thug city mafia now. Get into the car and complete the missions with stealthy moves. Accept the challenges and complete them within the time limit. Rescue the innocent citizens and kill the gangsters with the different guns. 

Time to take the revenge in the grand war crime city gangster. Play this grand shooting crime attack. You are on the grand crime war in the city thug life. Experience the best thug life that you have not been experienced before. Snatch and steal cars from the citizens in the free mode for the survival mission so that you will be able to save your friend! Complete the missions in the endless mode in which you can shoot as wander around the grand crime city freely. Add some adventure in the grand war mafia city. Use the grand helicopter to save the citizens from the real gangster war.

The grand gangster enemies are smuggling the truck of weapons to another grand crime city. You have been assigned the mission to recover that truck of weapons. Moreover, you have been given the map for the directions to reach to the targeted locations. Save your friends through the grand jail breakout and complete the rescue missions. Time to kill the agent of the grand god father of the most wanted grand gang who is indulge in the extreme criminal robbery street crimes. 

  FEATURES
-4 thrilling grand gangster modes in the open world
-Drive, shooting, free mode or challenge mode
-10 exciting levels in the challenge mode
-Time limit to complete the grand crime missions
-Engaging gameplay sound effects
-3 real hero selection for the open world theft missions
-Epic and addictive adventurous crime scenes

title: Snow Storm Superhero
description:
Do you you want to play as a Snow Storm Superhero? Now it's the time. Snow Storm has has special abilities such as freezing objects and people, they will stay temporary solid. This can help you in fights. If the fight is too much for you, you can simple use your rope and get away.

Don't mess with the police, they are the good ones. Dominate the city with a devastating firepower of advanced military vehicles or upgrade your hero to knock down enemies in a few kicks! Let it be a beautiful city, do not turn into crime city with blood and robbery. 

You are a hero that controls snow and ice. You can freeze anyone or anything. You will fight various criminals from America, Russia, China, Mexico, Japan etc. The game contains fully Open world Environment. Explore the big city, go off-roading to the mountains, steal and drive super cars, shoot guns and more in this free open world game. 

This game is a simulator of city. You can drive bike or cars. Try out all the supercars and bikes. Make stunts on a bmx or find an ultimate F-90 tank or devastating battle helicopter or robot. Your aim is to destroy criminal piles in the city? All your enemies are ready to rob, kill, shoot and fight all the cops and you. Are you ready for great anti criminal adventure? 

Stealing auto cars, racing through streets, and shooting down gangsters. To help release the city from mafia sinners you can buy equipment in shop. You can also work as a taxi driver or garbage man collector or fireman. Become a boss in a fight between evil criminals and justice.You play is a hero / legend and whole city fears you. You can shoot a rope to a building and climb over the building to the top. 



- beautiful graphics
- tons of character attachments and skins
- living city with a lot of people and cars
- minigames such a hairdresser
- 20 adventure missions
- great audio background

title: Tasty Planet Forever
description:
Play as a small cat with an insatiable hunger. Grow bigger and bigger by eating everything in Paris. Eat rats, baguettes, people, cars, trees, buildings, and more!

When you‚Äôre finished dining on Paris, there are seven more worlds to eat:
-Consume the Caribbean as an angry octopus
-Save the savanna as a heroic rat
-Devour the city as a big eyed bee
-Reclaim the Pacific Ocean as a basking shark
-Eradicate invasive species as an experimental dingo
-Stop the humans as a peckish penguin
-Munch on Mars as a ball of grey goo

For an extra challenge, play through the worlds again using the eight bonus characters: metal cat, moray eel, elephant, ladybug, killer whale, baby, chicken, and black hole.

This is the biggest Tasty Planet game ever. There are hundreds of different entities to eat and well over 150 levels. The scale of some of the levels is enormous; in one level you'll grow all the way from the size of a subatomic particle to the size of the universe.

Try out split screen cooperative mode on tablets. After unlocking levels in single player you‚Äôll be able to play them with a friend in two player coop mode.

comments: Pay or watch ads to progress. Even if you play nearly every level perfectly first try, you have to watch long strings of ads. Plus, eventually you get to a point where gems are required to progress. What I would recommend doing is making it so when you get a multiple of a certain number of stars, say 25-50 or so, reward with a few gems. Then the game would be much better. Also, if you get tired of the game, uninstall it, and a while later decide to reinstall it, you have to start all over.

Great game. But there us one thing I absolutely hate about it. So if I finish the cat levels then I have to complete them several more times to unlock the octopus levels. So I have to get 500 coins to play the octopus levels, it took me half a year to get enough coins for that. So I think you should change it to if you complete a series of levels, you unlock the next series of levels. Do it. But you won't because game companies never take advice from reviews so there was no point in saying this.

First I really love of how you can play as other characters Second I love the sprint button Third I really enjoy the visual update, it looks better from other game Fourth I like that the game is Free Fifth the control is gud What I don't really like us of how hard it is to collect cions and get 3 stars most of the time, that's all.

Controls. The only reason why I gave it a 1 star. It ruins the game experience on mobile. Joystick: Horrible. Too slow. Touch: Horrible. Very hard to control. Especially for level 9 in part 1. Trackpad: Bad. My finger will already reach the side of my screen when I walk a few feet. This means in quick times levels, it is harder because you have to reset your finger to the center of the screen. The rest of the game is awesome.

I would give 5 stars but everything is pay to win because if u don't have enough coins for the next set of levels u have to try and get 3 stars on every level which is super hard and that makes u what to buy coins but like no

title: Modern Combat 5: eSports FPS
description:
> ‚ÄúIt plays as good as it looks.‚Äù ‚Äì IGN
> ‚ÄúAmps everything up to the next level.‚Äù  ‚Äì 148Apps 
> ‚ÄúSharp controls, impressive graphics.‚Äù  ‚Äì Pocket Gamer 

War has evolved, and so has the best online FPS on mobile! 

Step onto the battlefield and answer the call with the title that raised the bar for first person shooter games with its great graphics, high-powered guns and intense online multiplayer action. Create a squad from 9 classes, add your friends for team play and test your skills in dynamic warfare against online rivals from around the world!

Prefer to work alone? Then feel free to step into the thrilling solo play campaign as you shoot your way through one dire situation after another to save the world as you launch an attack against a lunatic‚Äôs apocalyptic plans.

You won‚Äôt find more first person shooter fun in a free game anywhere!

9 CLASSES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS
> Customize and level up any of the 9 classes across solo play and team play modes. 
> Find the playstyle that suits you: Assault, Heavy, Recon, Sniper, Support, Bounty Hunter, Sapper, X1-Morph, or Kommander.
> Activate class-specific skills by earning and spending Skill Points.

HIGH-POWERED ONLINE MULTIPLAYER 
> Watch players engaged in live online FPS battles and eSports competitions with all the great graphics you expect in the new Spectator mode.
> Epic guns-a-blazing team play in Squad vs. Squad matches.
> Talk to other players to plan your online multiplayer strategies and coordinate an attack in the Global and Squad Chats.
> Top the individual and Squads leaderboards as you master your eSports skills.
> Win free rewards and cool prizes in limited-time events.

UNIFIED GAME PROGRESSION
> Accumulate XP and level up by playing both solo play missions and team play matches.
> Unlock higher-tier guns and other weapons by mastering lower-tier guns.
> Customize the perfect weapon using a host of attachments and jump straight into the free game action.

INTENSE SOLO PLAY CAMPAIGN 
> Engage in fast-paced story missions where the call will take you from Tokyo to Venice for a variety of first person shooter challenges.
> Play the new Spec Ops missions for a real online FPS adrenaline rush.
> Great graphics, music and voice performances perfectly adapted for a first person shooter game.

HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS
> Intuitive, highly customizable controls so you can play the game just the way you want.
> Modern Combat 5 supports HID game controllers. MOGA Pro is also supported, in mode B (HID Mode).

Modern Combat 5 requires an Internet connection.

So if you‚Äôre ready for the online FPS of your dreams, dive into this unparalleled free game that takes online multiplayer to new heights. Perfect for anyone hungry for solo play first person shooter fun, or team play eSports competition.

comments: When I go to download Chapter 3,4,5,6 in Campaign Mode, it shows that more than 60% of files (of these chapters) are already downloaded. It should be completely up to the player to choose to download these files. Already downloading 60% of files in advance for chapter 3-6 is useless for new players and for pro players (they only play multiplayer matches and campaign missions of chapter 1,2). Therefore, these people can save a lot of storage of their device.

Please restore my account. I haven't done anything wrong nor was I willing to do so. I worked so hard to get my rank and my achievements. Please don't crush everything in an instant. I was playing MC5 just like every other normal day when suddenly, out of the blue, I am told of trying to hack the game and thus being banned with everything reset. Please I love MC5 a lot. Please don't spoil it for me. I've been playing Gameloft games for 11 years or so. And I am not into hacking stuff.

This game is amazing I've played it for long enough now and seriously I've never seen any game with such great graphics, such smoothness and you even get to choose whether you want to watch an advertisement or not, I don't know what's with the other comments talking about how it has a lot of advertisements the only thing I'll ask is to just keep up the good work can not wait for mordan combat 6 lots of love and support

Gameloft should be shivering with embarrassment at this failure of a game. The game is overrun with cheaters who stand outside the map and kill everyone, or teleport and kill everyone. They have known about this for years but do nothing about it. Turrets still fire through walls, they have known about this for years but do nothing about it. This game is unplayable with this level of cheating and they have banned the reporting of cheaters now on their forum. This is not a game, it's a joke.

Forced ads. Everytime I go to play a mission I get forced to watch a 30 second ad. I learned that its faster to just close the game and try again, and hope I dont get another ad. And none of the ads are skippable. I once replayed a level and got an ad while I was getting shot at. The game did not pause while the ad played.

title: Honkai Impact 3rd
description:
[Augmented S-rank Battlesuit | Fervent Tempo Œî]
On that day, the Swan Lake fell silent and the sleeping beauty awoke from a nightmare. On that day, she had no choice but to embark on a long and lonely journey.
[Molotov Cherry]'s augmented battlesuit [Fervent Tempo Œî] debuts! Her codename is DELTA.
Log in during the event period to claim free [Molotov Cherry] or her Augment Core materials to unlock [Fervent Tempo Œî]!

[New Event | Honkai Quest]
Through countless dangers and toils, the adventurer and her companions finally defeated the Dark Lord and restored peace to the world, but the adventurer never returned.
To find her, her sister stepped into her own epic tale.
New event [Honkai Quest] unfolds! Venture out with Captains everywhere to earn Seele's new outfit [Dream Seeker], [Molotov Cherry] Augment Core materials, Crystals, and Ancient Willpower!

[ELF | Tesla ZERO]
To make the past the past and the future the future.
The zeroth masterpiece of a master scientist and the key to unlock the forbidden. ELF [Tesla ZERO] awakens!

[Story Chapter XX | Immortal Phoenix]
Kiana and Bronya arrived at Mount Taixuan and discovered a secret in the memories left behind by Fu Hua.
Story Chapter XX released! Explore to earn event set stigma, Focused Supply Card, and materials for Molotov Cherry's Augment Core!

[New Equipment]
Unleash unprecedented powers! PRI-ARMs [Sleeper's Dream] and [Domain of Revelation], blade [Nue of the Shadow] have joined the arsenal!
This pen will expose all that is unjust! Pen of Critic set [Dickens] has joined the arsenal!

Honkai Impact 3rd Subscription and Google Subscription Explained

1. Types of Subscription
[Adventure Commander] ($3.99 for 30 days)/($9.99 for 90 days)/($17.99 for 180 days) gives the following daily rewards during subscription:
Stamina Potion x2, 200 Asterite, 1000 Mithril, 50% Captain EXP Chip x1

[Valkyrie Guild] ($9.99 for 30 days)/($25.99 for 90 days)/($47.99 for 180 days) gives the following rewards daily during subscription:
Valkyrie Fragvyom x1 (Gives one of the following by choice: Night Squire Fragment x1, Stalker: Phantom Iron Fragment x1, Yamabuki Armor Fragment x1, Valkyrie Pledge Fragment x1.)
Valkyrie Lucky Chest x1 (Gives random battlesuit fragment x1 and ADV EXP Chip x1. Has a low chance of giving S-rank battlesuit fragment!)

2. Collecting Subscription Rewards
Subscription rewards are issued by in-game mail upon your first login daily. If you have not received your subscription rewards, please restore your subscriptions or log in again.

3. About Auto-renewal
Subscriptions on Google Play renew automatically unless you unsubscribe manually. Please note that uninstalling the game does not cancel auto-renewal. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before a subscription period ends. If you wish to cancel your subscriptions, you will need to turn off auto-renewal at least 24 hours before a subscription period ends. Failure to do so would result in your account being auto-charged for renewal.

5. User Agreement
https://honkaiimpact3.mihoyo.com/global/en-us/terms

6. Privacy Policy
https://honkaiimpact3.mihoyo.com/global/en-us/privacy

7. Canceling Subscription
Use an Android device to log in to Google Play with the correct account, tap the "Subscription" in "Menu" to find the subscription you would like to cancel (e.g. Honkai Impact 3rd), and choose "Cancel Subscription".

Customer Support
Should you encounter any issues, please feel free to reach out to our in-game customer support.
Customer support team: honkai3rd_global@mihoyo.com
Official site: https://honkaiimpact3.mihoyo.com/global/zh-cn/
Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/global.honkaiimpact/

comments: Albiet the given reviews for the individual components of the game, I'm utterly disappointed that whenever there is a new update and it's done, I always end up in square one a.k.a I lose everything inside that game. I have to start right from the beginning. This is the 3rd time I have installed this app. Despite everything, I still love this game for it's unique story, the element of mystery behind the true nature of Honkai, and lot more. Please, do consider the issue for this is what we want.

Really fun game. Easy to learn and great if you have not a lot of time. Only problema are that you're limited just a bit more in how long you can play daily, unlike other mobile games. The limited time gacha are also a bit hard to get as a f2p player. They come and go really fast, so it's best to save up in advance for them. Overall a decent game! Would recommend.

The game is really pretty!The grafics,stories,cutscenes everything!But i have something that just bother me a little.. When the game gets updated,it makes your game restart,logs out of your account and starts downloading the games data(i not sure but its downloading something..?).I feel like this is a bit unnecessary? But still,its a really good game.

Very, very good game. Definetely recommend. The characters are all so different, there's a lot of variations for them. There is a lot to do in the game without feeling pressured to actually do any of it. Fighting is very fun, mechanics are easy to figure out, and it looks amazing. The only, onlt problem I can think of is probably dialogue exchange in the story. The story isn't the best it could be, but it doesn't really ruin the game at all.

To respond to CS: I point your attention to the pop-ups on login that offer you bundles for B-Chips(BC). BC is a currency you cannot earn, it *must* be bought. When I first started playing crystals were the only currency. By just playing the game you could, eventually, buy anything. It felt like a reward for time investment. Now 90% of the shop is B-Chip only and you're constantly making events that reward spending money. It's disgusting and a far cry from the game I once knew.

title: Shadowgun War Games - Online PvP FPS
description:
Tactical multiplayer FPS (First Person Shooter) with outstanding graphics and intense PvP (Player versus Player) 5v5 battles. Work out your strategy for classic Capture the Flag or go in all guns blazing in Team Deathmatch. With intense multiplayer maps and modes, Shadowgun War Games is the best PvP experience on mobile!

FREE TO PLAY CONSOLE-QUALITY FPS
Tactical First Person Shooter action shooter with outstanding graphics, customizable controls, plus voice and text chat! Easy on-the-go FPS multiplayer shooter where everyone can experience truly competitive combat on their mobile device.

STUNNING MAPS AND THRILLING GAME MODES
Fight against players worldwide in arenas, maps and unique events across the Shadowgun Universe.

EASY CONTROLS
It‚Äôs fun and accessible for beginners and hardcore gamers will find plenty of challenge. Anyone can compete in Capture the Flag and Team Deathmatch game modes!

UNIQUE HEROES AND ABILITIES
From Blink and Shield for defensive players to Berserk mode for more aggressive tactics. Customize your hero with unique skins, emotes, charms, stickers, etc.

COMPETITIVE GAMEPLAY
Multiplayer PvP FPS that rewards skill and strategy in battle.  Team tactics will ensure victory in this free to play multiplayer PvP First Person Shooter.

UPDATES AND VARIETY
Regular updates will add more choice and complexity to the Shadowgun War Games PvP experience with the arrival of exciting new heroes, game modes, events, skins and emotes. The future of mobile gameplay is War Games!

ATTENTION ALL PLAYERS! We‚Äôd love to hear your feedback to help us improve the game. To leave feedback visit here: https://support.madfingergames.com/hc/en-us

Note: You will need an internet connection to play Shadowgun War Games  - Online PvP FPS.

¬© 2019 MADFINGER Games, Shadowgun War Games, Shadowgun Legends, Dead Trigger, Unkilled are trademarks of MADFINGER Games a.s. By downloading, installing this App, you agree to MADFINGER Games‚Äô privacy policy and terms of use. To view MADFINGER‚Äôs privacy policy please visit https://www.madfingergames.com/privacy-policy and for terms of use please visit https://www.madfingergames.com/eula.

comments: I love this game for the graphics but I felt it's taking too much time and several stage to load the game . It's little annoying. So many unnecessary things like the dancing of the character it's makes the game little girly. Also user interface is complicated . I am not sure how to upgrade the weapons . After one week I felt board because unable to upgrade the character and weapons as expected. Overall a good game but you will be board very soon and end with uninstalling it. Hope for the best.

I really like this game.. but I'll go with 3 stars because it lacks two things- 1. A mini map in the corner to see where the enemies are coming from- I get killed so many times coz I can't see the enemies coming from behind. 2. A crouch/sliding button - it'll help a lot especially in close range battles. Pls consider adding these features in future updates.

Awesome game, Congratulations to the creators, you did a phenomenal job. But I am giving it 4 üåü because it lacks some contents but I am hopeful that you will fix this in upcoming updates. Add crouch and jump buttons with immediate effects and also add some solo and duo game modes. This will enhance the gaming experience. Add battle royale if you can. Please Introduce a mode with vehicles.This will take this game on the whole next level. Gameplay and graphics are awesome.

I have only 1 issue....sometimes when I'm trying to score with the enemies flag the game doesn't recognize Im there hovering. I have hovered for a bit and suddenly I score and other times the game will end without granting me the win. Despite this I play.....its addicting and fun. I can't seem to put it down. I find myself impatient to start between matches , its funny.

Good game but theres thing i dont like 1. The tutorial is very annoying, its good if your new to these games but most of them is common sense and it also forced me to buy a pfp which is fine but it used my money 2. The controls are fine but it would have been better if there was a shoot button since its harder to shoot but it makes the game unique. Those are just small problems and the game is pretty good

title: Amazing Powerhero : New York Gangster
description:
Do you you want to play as a Powerhero? Now it's the time. Amazing Powerhero has has special abilities such as an anti-graviti, when you use this ability, you can throw cars or people in the air. You have also powerfull laser that can help you in fights. If the fight is too much for you, you can simple fly away.

Amazing Powerhero is a city simulator in third person view, where you drive an amazing cars or a motorbike. Try out all the supercars and bikes. Make stunts on a bmx or find an ultimate F-90 tank or devastating battle helicopter. Do you have enough guts to rise to the top of the criminal piles? Be ready to rob, kill, shoot and fight all the criminals. Are your ready for great anti criminal adventure? Stealing auto cars, racing through streets, and shooting down gangsters. You can also buy a lot of things in a shop to help you complete missions and release the city from all mafia sinners. You can also work as a taxi driver or garbage man collector or fireman. Become a chief on the streets of anti criminality in town. 

You are a Powerhero. You will fight various mafia gangsters from America, Russia, China, Mexico, Japan etc. The game contains fully Open world Environment. Most of the missions will be on streets, some will be in chinatown district and other gang lands etc. Explore the big city, go off-roading to the mountains, steal and drive super cars, shoot guns and more in this free open world game.Explore the crime city, full of gangs and aggressive fractions. Become citizen's hope as a standard of justice, or come to the city as a new doom knight. 

The style of city is similar to Miami or Las Vegas but actualy it's New York. Your legs also very powerful. Don't underestimate them. Don't mess with the police, they are the good ones. Dominate the city with a devastating firepower of advanced military vehicles or upgrade your hero to knock down enemies in a few kicks! Let it be a beautiful city, do not turn into crime city with blood and robbery. You play is a hero / legend and whole city fears you.You can shoot a rope to a building and climb over the building to the top. You have special real powers. You can shoot dangerous laser beam from your eyes.

comments: I like this game very much. But the energy of hero is low very fast . I think you have to make the exact energy . Thank you
Full time killer, please add sniper Rifle also and increase the area and graphics. Love it.
It is better then other games and I want that they should add more,houses,cars and missions

I it's a very good game game all here is fantastic but you need to make some more details and vehicles and there is one that whenever I play this game after some time it hangs my device and also it it also again and again it kick me off from the game Thank you
Super graphic I love it area's expand please sniper 10xscope please power and energy not largge very simple please power expand
